Summary: We spent 5 nights and the hotel was perfect. We had three rooms for our family.  Comfortable and clean! Breakfast exceeded our expectations!  So nice to grab some food before we headed into the park. So close to the park!! Will stay here again!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the compliments about the hotel. We are happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope to see you again the future.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for a quick trip to Disneyland
Summary: We love staying at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn when we need to stay overnight during a trip to Disneyland. It's right across the street so it's incredibly convenient to walk to the park. The rooms are clean and comfortable. Parking is free on property so that is very convenient, although it can be difficult to find parking at times. The breakfast has been modified for COVID but was still plentiful and tasty to go plates of eggs, bacon and waffles. Would recommend anyone visiting Disneyland stay here!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words. We are so happy you enjoyed all that we have to offer. We appreciate your loyalty and hope you will be back soon.

Summary: We stayed at The Best Western Olus Anaheim for out recent trip to Disneyland. Everything was great. Fast easy 5 minute walk straight to the gates. Clean room, friendly staff, good free breakfast. Internet was good. We did not have a car and there were plenty of things within walking distance. Would definitely recommend and stay again
Manager Response: Wonderful, thank you for the rating and compliments on our location. It's nice to know you enjoyed your stay and we hope to see you again.

Summary: Very good location for the park walking distance right across the street , restaurants near by, hotel was clean, rooms nice no issues, internet could be better, tv good selection of channels, breakfast area clean selection was good to get your morning started for the day in the park
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are so happy that you enjoyed our location, breakfast and tv selection. Sounds like you had a great time. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: We were not impressed with this hotel. We were expecting much better being that it‚Äôs so close to Disneyland. The beds and pillows were so uncomfortable and the linens didn‚Äôt smell clean. The room itself was so small, packed with furniture that didn‚Äôt even fit. They did offer a continental breakfast that was decent, but that is probably the only good thing I have to say about our stay. I personally wouldn‚Äôt stay there again.
Manager Response: We're sorry that not all your expectations were exceeded. It's never our intention to disappoint our guests. We're continuously improving our hotel and do hope to have another opportunity to win your loyalty. As much as we want to be a hotel for everyone, we know we can't. Different people value different things. Our hotel is normally known as a comfy home away home with an eager to please staff.

Summary: Amazing location Nextdoor to 24 hr Dennys. Rooms have bathtubs, large wardrobes and an amazing breakfast included. We will definitely be staying here again. Staff was super kind and helpful. Even called to check in if we needed anything.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience. We are so happy that you enjoyed our location, breakfast and kind staff. Please consider us your home away from home. All of us look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: Great hotel near Disneyland. It‚Äôs literally right across the street. Hotel was clean, managed well. Kind staff. Food was delicious for the breakfast. Brother used the gym, said it was pretty good for a gym at a hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for letting travelers know what they can expect. We are so happy that you had a great experience and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: This hotel was perfect for our visit to Disneyland. It‚Äôs right across the street and you can quickly walk over. The rooms were clean and everyone was friendly. The free breakfast was pretty solid as there was lots to choose from. All in all a great value for the price. We will for sure stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to rate and review your stay. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: The closeness to Disneyland can‚Äôt be beat!
Summary: We just got back from a fabulous stay in Anaheim. We were a 5 minute walk to the gates of Disney! The breakfast was fabulous with a great selection of hot, cold and to go items. I also got to use the fitness centre which had a good selection of treadmills, ellipticals and bikes as well as some weight machines. My only criticism was that the room felt a little small but we were barely there so that definitely isn‚Äôt a deal breaker! I also did find the beds a little soft for my comfort but the rest of my family had no concerns.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to rate and review your stay. We are honored that you had an amazing stay and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The room and staff were fantastic. The free breakfast was wonderful. The location to Disneyland is unbeatable. My family loves the hotel and would recommend it to everyone. The staff is accommodating and extremely pleasant.
Manager Response: Wow, this is such an amazing review. Thank you so much!! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay! We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Great location for visiting Disneyland. Short walk across the street to the parks. Front desk staff is top notch! Our room was clean and the bed and pillows were comfy. Not a lot of noise from other guests especially for the holiday season. We were able to see the fireworks each night from our room as well. Will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again soon!!

Summary: We enjoyed How close the hotel was to the park‚Ä¶ However, we did not enjoy the ants in the shower. Also the shower head has different pressure settings but doesn‚Äôt change to them. Breakfast was decent.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about our hotel. We are sorry to hear about your experience as we pride ourselves in the exceptional service that we provide our guests. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back and show you this experience was not norm.

Summary: Located across from the Disneyland entrance.  Best possible location you can stay and for a great price.  Free breakfast is fresh and delicious.  There is something for everyone.  Room was clean and comfy.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this amazing rating and review. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: We had a total of four rooms and all were clean and in good working order.  We always had clean towels and room if needed were cleaned.  Staff was nice and breakfast was better than most.  If I take family again I would for sure stay here for closeness to Disneyland and rooms I can trust
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this amazing review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Stayed here last year and loved it so much decided to stay here again. Due to my platinum BW status I was upgraded to a suite. It was very nice for my teenager to have her own room after being in the car together for a long drive. When I went to use the TV it would not work. I let them know and Joe was there is a few minutes to fix it. He was so nice and got it fixed. Something had been unplugged and had to reboot the cable box. HE was pleasant to deal with and I could tell he really enjoys his job. I think it is wonderful that there is a 24 hour maintenance tech available.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wholehearted recommendation. We sincerely appreciate your loyalty and support and the specific mention of Joe's outstanding service. We will be sure to recognize his efforts. So glad you felt cared by him while he fixed the tv. We look forward to providing another exceptional experience for you.

Summary: Clean rooms, great staff, and very good breakfast. Reasonably priced. The parking is the only thing that sucks, but it‚Äôs ok I drive a full size crew cab truck. The location from the parks is great, just across the street.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to rate and review your stay. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. We do know parking can be difficult at times but are glad you did not let that get in the way of having a great time. Thankyou again we hope to see you again in the future!!

Summary: This rating is NOT reflected in the staff in anyway. This is based strictly on the property itself. Staff was üíØ they can only do so much with this establishment.  **TIP- don‚Äôt stay in room 201, it‚Äôs below the breakfast room and you‚Äôll wake up to  chairs scraping the floor and stomping around early in the am.  **TIP- bring your own pillow Unless you get an amazing price this place is only good for the location, breakfast and staff. Rooms fall short in everything. Noise is definitely a factor with families walking by, especially ground floor. Security was an issue with doors being old and not able to lock (bring your own defense mechanisms). Cleanliness-carpet is gross so bring your own slippers. Pillows were pillowcases stuffed with torn up foam and formed into a basketball
Manager Response: Thank you for your genuine feedback. We are deeply sorry that you experienced disappointment in your guestroom. We are passionate,  about service and comfort, and we certainly do not want you to feel that the value was not there. Once again please accept my sincere apologies. We hope you will consider giving us another try in the future.

Summary: Check in & out was easy and quick. You physically check in at the desk, but you can participate in contactless checkout for no extra charge. Just call the hotel and check out. Property was clean and safe. Room was clean and well stocked with towels and toiletries. The AC is a until built into the wall, but it works really well. The beds were comfortable, but the pillows were too small. Like throw pillows on a couch. The beds could have used more blankets, and there was no spare in the room, but we managed. We heard a little noise from our neighbors later in the evening, but everything quieted down by 10pm. Walking distance from the property to the park can't be beat, even by Disneyland's own hotels. Walking from a 3rd floor room to security took less than 5 minutes.   Be aware
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this review and rating. We appreciate you letting travel planners know what they can expect when they stay at the Anaheim Inn. At any time you need anything including more blankets, please let our front desk staff know. They are always ready to help. Thank you again for this amazing feedback. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Your magic begins at this BW
Summary: Yes, it's right across the street from Disneyland, which makes it easy access. Yes, it's right on the strip with lots of wonderful restaurants and shops. But it's also one of the best BW experiences we've ever had.  Not just friendly and courteous, but EXCELLENT customer service. The rooms are standard BW rooms, but absolutely clean and comfortable.   The breakfast also was one of the best BW breakfasts I've had.  TWO choices of eggs, PLUS an egg sandwich option.  Not to mention all the other standard options. We have come here for the ease and convenience to the park, and will happily stay again because of the experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know we exceeded your expectations. We take pride in our attention to detail and I am happy that was conveyed to you with regards to cleanliness and the welcoming service you received. Looking  forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Stayed here for 5  nights to visit Disneyland . The location is excellent, literally opposite the park entrance with a Tony Romas , Denny‚Äôs and McDonald‚Äôs within walking distance . We had read reviews stating parking was scarce , we had no problems throughout our stay but the hotel staff said if we couldn‚Äôt find a space they would work something out .  Our check in was great , a really lovely receptionist , I didn‚Äôt get her name unfortunately but she was so friendly and welcoming . Our room was on the second floor of three , it was quite near the road but the noise didn‚Äôt disturb us. The air con unit is also very loud but didn‚Äôt stop us sleeping . Room was exceptionally clean and attractive . Maid service every day to clean bins and replace towels , if you require anything else
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this amazing review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us. You have outlined some great benefits of staying here with us. Please consider us you home away from home.

Summary: This is our go to hotel when we visit Disneyland. We love the location and the rooms. The beds are so comfy especially after a long day at Disney. Can't beat the location, beds, and breakfast! Looking forward to our next stay.
Manager Response: We appreciate your loyalty. Thanks so much for taking the time to share your impressions. We're delighted to hear that you've consistently received welcoming service. We know that people are our greatest asset and genuine caring is one of the most important aspects of excellent hospitality. We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: I‚Äôve stayed at this hotel a few times now. Fabulous location in walking distance to Disneyland.  Great breakfast with lots of options, both hot and cold.  Pleasant and helpful staff. This is my go to hotel for Disneyland trips.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know we have exceeded your expectations! We take pride in our attention to detail and we are happy that was conveyed to you. Please consider us your home away from home.

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel year after year on our Disneyland trips. The location is perfect and it offers a breakfast which saves us a few dollars in the park. The hotel staff is always very helpful and go above and beyond.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your loyalty throughout the years. We are so happy that you have consistently received welcoming service. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: We stayed in a double queen room on the 3rd floor. It was well stocked with double toiletries, tons of towels, super clean, and quiet hotel. The rooms USB ports all worked well. Internet was slow and the bed was uncomfortable but if I couldn‚Äôt get into my first choice hotel across from Disneyland I would stay here again. Staff was very nice and helpful and they bring anything you need to your room. No running down to the lobby.  Even though the bed was not the best, the hotel is located on Harbor across from Disney and it made for a quick short walk mid day and late at night.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience. We are so happy that you enjoyed our location, amenities and helpful staff. We apologize about the beds and are happy you did not let that take away from having a great time. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: The staff were extremely helpful and friendly, and they welcoming.  The location is excellent, especially for those older guests and those with families.  The hot breakfast was a wonderful bonus!  I would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to rate and review your stay. We are so happy that you enjoyed our location and friendly staff. Come back to see us soon.

Summary: The hotel is opposite to Disneyland main Gate great location for Families, the price is a little high but compared to most along Harbor Boulevard it is reasonable. The staff are friendly and helpful, and the hotel is clean and tidy. It is also one of the few hotels in the area that serve a hot breakfast as part of their service. There is a fee for parking. It has a laundry which is useful as is an elevator.  It has a swimming pool but to look a bit out of place stuck in middle of the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to rate and review your stay. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and found great value in the price paid. We value your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Rooms are not clean, nor did staff come when expected to clean the room and bring fresh towels.  At check in agreed to one day cleaning, but staff did not come on that day.  Had to call desk.  Carpet in room was dirty and appeared to not have been cleaned in some time.  beds nice and clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We are sorry to hear about your concerns. We pride ourselves in our commitment to service excellence but will utilize your feedback to continually improve our guest experience. We encourage you to contact us directly if you wish to further discuss your experience.

Summary: Awesome location if you‚Äôre going to Disneyland. Not so awesome to have a 5am wake up call two mornings in a row from the smoke alarm chirping. We were planning on staying 4 nights, but we only lasted 3 because of this issue.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your honest review. We are so sorry to hear about your experience. In future please call on our front desk staff so we can quickly remedy the situation. We are always here to help. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back and show this is not the norm.

Summary: So close to Disneyland front gate. Excellent free hot breakfast. I don‚Äôt think there is a closer hotel with a free breakfast (that‚Äôs why we stayed here). 10 min walk (or less) to the front gate makes it easy to take a mid day break and walk back to the hotel for some rest.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to rate and review your stay. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and that our location made things easier. We hope to see you again on your next Disney trip!

Summary Heading: Best place for a Disneyland visit
Summary: We‚Äôve stayed at this location several times and always go back if the have rooms available. Its location is convenient to the park, the complimentary breakfast is great, the rooms are super clean, and staff is friendly. We love this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your loyalty. It was our pleasure to host another successful Disneyland visit. We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: This was our first stay at this hotel and  it exceeded expectations. We‚Äôre passholders from up north  and have stayed in many hotels over the years but will definitely be back here. The rooms are clean and tidy, the location cannot be beat (literally across the street from the entrance to disney) and the breakfast was the cherry on top. Breakfast has a variety of foods hot and cold, coffee tea, juice, pancakes/waffles, eggs and bacon. It saved us from having to eat at the park first thing and definitely saved us $$
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know we exceeded your expectations. We take pride in our attention to detail and I am happy that was conveyed to you in regards to cleanliness. We hope you join us again on your next trip to Disneyland.

Summary Heading: Disney time means Best Western Time
Summary: Excellent location, steps away from Downtown Disney, Disneyland, and California Adventure.  It was a long walk over to the Anaheim Convention Center for the D23 event, but definitely recommend if you are able.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. We appreciate your kind words and hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Great location to Disneyland. Bigger pillows would be nice. Room was a little small compared to others. Breakfast was nice. Fresh and hot. Staff compared to other best western in area are way nicer. Parking is easy and not overly price.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to rate and review your stay. We appreciate the feedback on the pillows and will advise our team. We hope to see you on your next trip to Disneyland.

Summary: This was a family trip to Disneyland for overseas travellers. The hotel is great for location. I have stayed at this hotel more than once and with different people. We have always enjoyed this hotel and would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the compliments about our hotel! We are happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We‚Äôve tried other hotels around the park but this is the ultimate winner. Great complimentary breakfast, clean room, clean pool and jacuzzi, friendly staff. You can‚Äôt beat being able to walk across the street to sleep after a long day at the park!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words, we are so happy that you enjoyed everything we have to offer. Please consider us your home away from home. Looking forward to welcoming you back soon!!

Summary: Great room and super convenient to Disneyland, which was no more than a 10 minute walk, less if you catch the crosswalk at the right time.  Breakfast was very extensive, some of the best hotel breakfast on our month-long cross-country trip.  Truly no complaints other than unloading the car was a bit of a hassle because there is a barrier between the parking lot and the doors.  If that's the worst thing, there are really no problems!  Pool is small, convenient laundry that was secure enough to walk away from.  There were some homeless folks on the street from the hotel to the park.  They didn't bother us at all, but something to be aware of.  Would stay there again without hesitation!
Manager Response: Thank you for letting travel planners know what to expect when they book with us. We appreciate you taking the time to write this review and hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary Heading: Perfect for a short Disney visit
Summary: We were only in town for 40hrs (16hrs at Disney) and this property was a perfect distance and price point. We stayed early August, Monday and Tuesday. Parking was not too expensive ($15/night) and the breakfast provided a wide range of options. Very clean and comfortable space. The tao double bed room was a little tight for two teens and an adult, but for two nights it did the job.  Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you so much this amazing review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again soon!

Summary: My husband & I stayed here for 7 days while visiting Disneyland & the LA area. Staff are top notch, from front desk, housekeeping, breakfast area, & maintenance. Room had all we needed. Parking was always easy to find. Location cannot be beat. Breakfast was delicious and we specifically loved eating on the deck. We are reward members who usually stay in Hilton properties or the Candy Cane Inn, but we wanted to try this Best Western. It will definitely be our hotel of choice now in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the compliments on our hotel! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and found our staff friendly and helpful. We hope to see you again in the furture.

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a short stay at  DL & DCA
Summary: We stayed June 22 through the 25th. We had a wonderful experience at this hotel. It was great having a five minute walk to the parks for the two days we did DL and DCA. You can tell they are trying to maintain this hotel and keep it in great shape.   Checkin was easy in the lobby was very inviting and clean. We stayed on the first floor just passed the pool. I was worried it might be a little busy but we never had any issues with noise. Our room had two queen beds which were very comfortable. The room fell a little small for us but this was the first city of a two city trip so we didn‚Äôt unpack much and we‚Äôre always getting things out of our suitcases. We‚Äôre also used to staying in a larger room when we visit WDW but I realize that these properties have been here much longer and
Manager Response: Thank you for painting a lovely picture of your stay. We are honored that you had a great time and will recommend our Anaheim Inn. Please consider us your home away from home. See you soon!!

Summary: This is a great place to stay!  Very clean and spacious.  Right across the street from Disneyland & California Adventure. Different hot breakfast choices so you don‚Äôt  get bored of the food over a multiple day visit. Extremely helpful & kind staff! Would stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words, we hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great hotel option for visiting the Disneyland Resort
Summary: If you are visiting the Disneyland Resort the location of this hotel cannot be beat. It is a quick walk to the parks and close enough that it‚Äôs worth walking back during the hot and busy afternoon to take a break. It is also within walking distance to a variety of restaurants. The staff are are all very friendly and accommodating. The free breakfast has a ton of options and is delicious. We loved that the staff serve the hot food items so that everyone is not touching the serving utensils. The rooms are nothing fancy and on the smaller side, but are all updated and very clean with comfortable beds and pillows. A couple of items that kept us from from giving 5 stars  would be the air conditioning unit in the room and the lack of daily housekeeping. The air conditioning unit was a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your honest review. While we are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your our location, breakfast, d√©cor and staff. we regret that other aspects of your stay did not quite meet your expectations.  At this time we do not offer daily cleaning due to COVID, but we are looking to bring it back soon as our guests and staff are comfortable with it. Thank you for this valuable feedback and hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Perfect off-property Disney accommodations. Short walk to main gate. Clean and comfortable with a great included breakfast. Felt safe. Staff were very friendly and helpful. Rooms have recently been remodeled and were comfy
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this amazing review and rating! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and can't wait to see you again.

Summary: The Hotel is very clean, staff were friendly. The location was perfect to walk back from the park to go back and relax before heading back for more fun.  The hotel is walking distance to many restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this wonderful review. We are so happy that you enjoyed our location, cleanliness and our staff.  Looking forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: 5 mins walk from disney gates, great price great location with free breakfast before your day starts. Cheap parking- get there early to bag a spot. V clean rooms- basic but no complaints as you‚Äôre not in there if you‚Äôre doing disney! Deffo recommend if planning disney.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful rating and review. We are so happy that you had a great time and hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Hotel was a average place to stay, beds were comfy, ac unit at times felt like it wasn't cooling enough, but it did the job.  I wish they had Smart Tv's that way guest can watch their shows/movies from their streaming accounts.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay. Unfortunately we do not offer smart TV's but they have the input/outputs for plugging in a Roku or Firestick. We appreciate the feedback and will let our leadership know how we can improve. Thank you again and we hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: Right across the street from Disneyland, clean pool with towels, laundry room and free hot breakfast that you can take to go. Plenty of coffee and snacks. Great storage spaces too. Beds were pretty decent too.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this amazing review. We appreciate all the great compliments and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Front desk staff was very friendly and helpful. We were able to check in early.  5 minute walk to the front gate of Disneyland. Rooms were clean. Nothing fancy but the location can't be beat. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Booked due to the decent price for being across from Disney. For being a motel, it was in great condition. Beds were small but comfy (queens are truly doubles) and the AC worked well once it got going. Bathroom was clean. One downside was the window coverings are not true blackouts. They are plantain shutters so they do let in cracks of light which woke me up early but didn‚Äôt seem to bother the kids thankfully. Also, I could hear a lot of traffic/people/cars/workers by around 8am but again, my kids stayed asleep. Just things to be aware of. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know we exceeded your expectations. We take pride in our attention to detail and I am happy that was conveyed to you in regards to cleanliness, ambiance and our property's condition. We hope you join us again on your next trip.

Summary: Clean and friendly. Great free breakfast, clean pool, staff friendly and responsive, grounds well cared for, one block from Disney main gate. Parking a bit high, but it is California. Several great restaurants, and shops to get food and drinks for the room.
Manager Response: Greetings! Thank you for the wonderful recommendation. We're honored to hear that you had a great visit. All of us look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: From check-in to check out, the staff was friendly, knowledgeable and helpful.  Accommodations were clean, comfortable and very well maintained.  Convenient to the convention center and a variety of fast food and full service restaurants of all levels and cuisines within walking distance.
Manager Response: Wow, Thank you for letting travel planners know what to expect when they stay with the Anaheim Inn. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Very good stay next to Disneyland
Summary: My family and I stayed at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn. Staff was very friendly and helpful before and during arrival. They were very accommodating. Breakfast was free, which was the typical continental breakfast in most motels. The location was great being walking distance to Disneyland. They had a pool that we didn't use since we were next to Disneyland. The rooms were clean and nice. You can hear people walking by your room or the footsteps from the room above, but the place was usually quiet by 10pm. We would stay hear again and recommend the hotel to others.
Manager Response: There isn't a much better compliment than hearing you'll return. We're honored to hear that you had a great visit and hope we see you again soon!

Summary: Our room was very clean! Breakfast was great! We appreciate the fact that hot breakfast items were served by two employees. Grab and go breakfast options were perfect for families. Great customer service and very prompt response for extra towels. Parking is convenient but should not be an additional cost. Distance to Disney is very close!
Manager Response: Wow, thank you so much for this amazing rating and review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We stayed at this hotel in December 2021.  We were visiting the Disney Resorts and wanted some place close that was walkable to the entrance.  This hotel is perfect for that.  The staff is wonderful especially the front desk staff.  They are so helpful, nice and friendly.  In March this hotel was full and we had to stay at a different location not too far from this one and although we did enjoy our stay at that hotel we would have preferred to stay at this location.  We highly recommend this hotel if you are going to be in the area and if the need arises we will definately stay there again.
Manager Response: We appreciate your loyalty! Thanks so much for taking the time to share your impressions. We're delighted to hear that you've consistently received warm and welcoming service. We know that people are our greatest asset and genuine caring is one of the most important aspects of excellent hospitality. Looking forward to welcoming you back. Until then we wish you safe travels.

Summary: stayed 3 nights, we were pleased with our choice just outside the Disney gate.   got a room on the top floor, so pretty quiet wrt interior noise.   exterior noise not bad - parking lot is quiet at night.  nice little pool and hot tub.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this amazing rating and review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again soon!!

Summary: We arrived in the late afternoon without a reservation and asked for a room on the main floor. We were travelling on a motorcycle so wanted to ensure the parking was secure. There were no main floor rooms available but the young woman at the desk said they had an elevator & we could park right in front of the hotel lobby door so, no problem, we took it. üëç  The room was clean, bed was comfortable, usual Best Western toiletries which we like.  The Grab ‚Äòn Go breakfast  was good.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this great review. We are so happy that we were able to accommodate parking for your motorcycle. We hope to see again soon.

Summary: Rooms were clean, well maintained and the hotel over all was nice and quiet. Great proximity to the park, you can literally walk across the street to Disneyland. Stayed here previously and will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for these wonderful recommendations. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: The location is great for Disneyland, of course. The front desk was very nice and we appreciated that breakfast was included. Aside from that though, the bed comforters just weren‚Äôt comfortable- thin and scratchy. The AC was loud, but okay if you like white noise. The bathroom door is a heavy slider with an interesting lock. The closets need lighting. They were out of extra pillows. It lacked a lot, but you can‚Äôt get much closer to the parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We are sorry to hear about your concerns, as we greatly pride ourselves in our commitment to service excellence but will utilize your feedback to continually improve our guest experience. We encourage you to contact us directly if you would like to further discuss your experience.

Summary: Hotel was clean and the breakfast provided was amazing. Wifi was also fast and included. Hotel is walking distance to Disneyland. Will definitely stay here again. Staff was friendly and prompt. Walking distance to IHOP, Dennys and Mcdonalds
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this great review, we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Great hotel, location is spot on right across from the street from Disneyland, entrance to park Is just feet from the front of the hotel, the cleanliness of the room and grounds was excellent, staff were top notch! Don‚Äôt hesitate. Price is a bit higher but I assume it‚Äôs due to the location, we were able to watch the nightly fireworks right outside our hotel room, Rm 307
Manager Response: Wow thank you for letting travelers know what they can expect when they stay with us!  Please consider us your home away from home. We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: Great friendly staff and right across from Disneyland. Close to restaurants.
Summary: Great hotel. Clean rooms and staff was friendly. I liked they had breakfast and it was buffet. They had fresh coffee and a lot of varieties. Great location right across from Disneyland and down town disney.
Manager Response: I will be sure to pass on recognition to our staff! Thank you so much for this valuable feedback!

Summary: Hotel is super close from Disneyland so when the temperature went up to 100 degrees, we were able to take a break from the park and rest during the day in the pool and go back to the park. I did not walk any longer after a full day at the park. So it was perfect!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this great review, we are so happy that our location made your trip to Disneyland easy. We hope to see you again soon!!

Summary Heading: Just 3 businesses from the hotel to the crosswalk over to Disneyland - great location!
Summary: Stayed here in 2 rooms for spring break.  Just steps to the Disneyland crosswalk, Denny's next door, and IHOP, Subway, McDonald's and Panera Bread within a short walk.  Two and 1/2 blocks from Walgreens and CVS for water/snacks.  Less than 2 blocks to Garden Walk Mall if you need to kill time in air conditioned theater before flight home.  Our room was clean and quiet.  Note that they are not cleaning rooms daily during your stay (covid), but our daughter was able to get some new towels and sheets changed once during our stay by asking.  The grandsons loved the pool and it has a hot tub that we saw maintained daily.  Would definitely stay here again!  Just hoping they get some milk/gluten intolerance friendly additions to their breakfast menu.  Never a problem getting enough to
Manager Response: Thank you so much for letting our travel planners know what they can expect. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I read plenty of reviews leading up to our trip that made hope for a pleasant stay and we were very pleased. Parking was not an issue as seemed to be a complaint I had seen in other reviews. The room was clean and looked to be recently remodeled, very nice. The staff was kind and knowledgeable, Lucy checked us in and was so friendly - as was the rest of the staff and I regret not getting everyone‚Äôs names. The proximity to Disneyland is awesome! Such a short walk. It only took a couple of days in to a week long stay, to know this will be our go-to hotel for all future Disneyland visits.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. We are so happy that you have found your Disney hotel with us and can't wait to see you again soon!

Summary: Room was clean.  Housekeeping was quick to provide additional/replacement amenities as needed.  Daily breakfast service was very nice.  The only complaint is that the beds and pillows were not as comfortable as I would prefer, but that is typical for most hotels I visit.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write about our hotel. We are sorry you did not like the bedding, but otherwise it sounds like  you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Clean updated rooms comfy bed, full breakfast, great staff. Helpful front desk, Wi-Fi, hot food in the morning so close to Disney right across the entrance accommodating of our request. Called us when room was ready early. Easy parking
Manager Response: Wonderful thank you for this great rating for your stay. We're  happy that you enjoyed everything our hotel has to offer. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: I am a travel agent and trying to stay at most of the Harbor Blvd hotels across from Disneyland. This is definitely my favorite now. I like that it‚Äôs a smaller property. Pool area is welcoming and not quite so drab as its sister hotel‚Äôs is. Room was laid out well. Water pressure in the shower was great, which I didn‚Äôt think was a possibility in SoCal! Breakfast room is spacious, open, and I like the balcony dining area. I appreciate that the dining room is wheelchair accessible (Park Place Inn‚Äôs is not).  Nice selection of hot and cold foods. Guest laundry room is a plus. Notes that aren‚Äôt really negative: no freezer section in mini-fridge, and no clothesline in shower area for wet swimsuits. I didn‚Äôt park a car but seemed there were adequate spaces. Was able to get a room
Manager Response: There isn't a better compliment than hearing you've found your favorite Anaheim hotel in us. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Great stay and amenities for purpose
Summary: We booked this hotel since the other hotel we were looking at did not offer breakfast; we came to see and experience Disneyland and the hotel was perfect for our goals - close to the park and to a great range of restaurants and food fare. Will definitely book with Best Western on our next Disney California visit.
Manager Response: Hearing that you will be back is the best compliment. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and can't wait to host another successful stay!

Summary: Not posh, but, very clean and comfortable and friendly staff, but, the added bonus of being closer to Disneyland and CA than Paradise Pier and possibly Disneyland Hotel. It's small and despite our room being next door to the elevator we were completely undisturbed. Considering that at a Walt Disney World value resort you can hear your neighbours flush their toilets. I cannot recommend this hotel highly enough. Sure, the rooms could use some updating, but, that's a minor quibble. The breakfasts are simple,but, tasty and free and the view from the breakfast room balcony is terrific.  I can't wait for my next stay there.
Manager Response: Wonderful recommendations! Thanks a  bunch for letting travel planners know what they can expect when they stay with us. Looking forward to  welcoming you back soon!

Summary: The hotel is right across the street from Disneyland so it‚Äôs very convenient and the staff was very friendly! I would definitely be staying here again and recommending this hotel to others! Also, the continental breakfast was great! It was convenient and it‚Äôs great to start your day with that choice.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for letting us know we exceeded your expectations. We we hope you join us again on your next trip!

Summary: Check in went nice and smooth, very nice customer service. Our room was spacious enough. Very clean. We had a room towards the back end of the hotel which probably made it more quiet. The swimming pool area was clean and well maintained. We did not use the pool but noticed others were. The breakfast was just okay. Nothing special but we ate it and then headed over to Disneyland. With just a five minute walk it made this hotel a very nice place to stay. I would definitely stay here again and would recommend it to others.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review about our hotel. I'm sorry you did not enjoy our breakfast, but otherwise it sounds like your enjoyed your stay. We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: This location is our go to when visiting Disneyland. Clean comfortable  rooms, great friendly staff, nice clean pool and hot tub, and excellent breakfast, which saves alot of money for our family of four.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this amazing rating and review! We are so happy that you enjoyed everything we have to offer. Please consider us your home away from home.

Summary: This was our second stay here as our usual default hotel for Disney trips has been under renovation for several months. We initially chose this hotel for its proximity to the Disneyland front entrance gates and its overall reviews. Both trips have been fantastic. The front desk check-in is always extremely pleasant and our overall customer service experiences have been top shelf. It is an older property so, bearing that in mind, we had reasonable expectations for the condition of the rooms. The breakfast choices are excellent (the super crunchy bacon is my personal fav) and the dining room is large, modern, and very clean. We always prefer to stay on the top (3rd) floor and having the elevators to rely on at the end of the day is just super convenient. The air conditioners in
Manager Response: Thank you for the wholehearted recommendation of the Anaheim Inn's comfort, location and value! We sincerely appreciate your loyalty and support. We look forward to providing another exceptional hospitality experience for you!

Summary: Great location but the loudest hotel I have ever stayed at. We frequent Disneyland and the hotels on Harbor on weekends and this is definitely the worst for noise. We‚Äôve stay two weekends in a row here and won‚Äôt be back. The walls are paper thin, you can hear hair dryers two rooms away, kids screaming at 6:00am, people above you walking around sounds like they are going to fall through the ceiling. If you plan on sleeping later than 6am on a weekend, avoid this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay. Please accept my sincere apologies that your experience with us did not live up to the high standards for which we are known. We greatly value your insight and have taken the opportunity to shar your comments with the hotel's leadership team to improve the overall guest experience. Thank you again for your feedback.

Summary: Hotel is very very close to the parks. Very affordable rate. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Breakfast was good. Scrambled eggs (reconstituted not fresh), crispy bacon (yum), and potatoes. Beds were comfy. Real blankets on the beds, not thick sheets other hotels have gone to. Room was dates but very clean. There is an elevator which is great when you have a lot of luggage. Nice breakfast area to sit in. Staff called a day or two before arrival to ask if we had any requests and to ask our arrival time, which was good for us since our plane didn't land until 8pm. When we called to switch out towels, they were there in less than five minutes. Very friendly staff. Highly recommend for Disneyland.
Manager Response: Wonderful recommendations! Thanks a bunch for letting travel planners know what they can expect when they stay with us. Looking forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: The location was perfect. Place to sleep after Disney. Simple and efficient breakfast. Nothing fancy but not cheap feeling. Friendly staff. I am not expecting a resort but received good, basic care here.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience. We are so happy that you enjoyed our location, breakfast and friendliness of our staff. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I've been staying at this hotel for over 10 years now. Room is always clean, friendly and courteous staff. Disneyland is right across the street. I highly recommend if you're coming to Disneyland. Location couldn't be better.
Manager Response: We appreciate your loyalty! Thanks so much for taking the time to share your impressions. We're delighted to hear that you've consistently received warm, welcoming service. Looking forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: This hotel might look a bit tired on the outside but don't let the look fool you. It is very close to the entrance to Disneyland (very important on long days). The room was clean and had everything we needed (mini fridge, microwave, a bath tub). The breakfast selection was also good. Everything from warm option to fruit.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the compliments about our hotel. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: My daughter and I stayed at this hotel during a special birthday trip. Our room was clean and neat. I appreciated having access to a fridge and microwave.  The front desk was very friendly and quickly answered all our questions. We had a lot of trouble with our room key working and we really got to know the maintence crew. Both gentlemen were kind, good humored and very helpful. Every morning we picked up breakfast in the breakfast room, The servers were kind and open to meeting our dietary needs. I appreciated that they allowed us to take our breakfast plates to our room, thus reducing our COVID exposure. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for this amazing rating and review. We are so happy that our breakfast and maintenance staff were able to help. We look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary: room is so small with large furniture only 1 person can walk around in room at a time without running into other person, bathroom only enough space to turn around in too small also. office employees were very nice, informative, and helpfull.
Manager Response: Greetings! Thank you for the compliments on our staff and feedback about the room size. We hope you consider staying with us in the future!

Summary: Had an amazing experience nice rooms very clean breakfast was great and staff was amazing.  Great location to the park directly across the street from Disneyland.  We would definitely go back to stay again. Thank You
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. We are so happy that you enjoyed our rooms and location. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: This was an excellent stay for our family (2 conjoining rooms of 6 adults & 2 kids). Location can't be beat since it's right next to Disneyland. Rooms were big, clean, and quiet. Pool and hot tub we're refreshing and comfortable. Breakfast had a huge variety and was well organized. The staff provided extra towels when we ran out as we stayed for a week. The only suggestion for improvement would be a softer top blanket. We'd 100% recommend this hotel to others and be glad to stay at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your honest review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and that we were able to accommodate adjoining rooms for you and your family.  We would also like to thank you for the feedback on the blankets. We look forward to seeing you on your next trip to Disneyland.

Summary: The hotel is a great choice when headed to Disneyland. It‚Äôs super close which is needed after a day at the park. Yes there are other close hotels but this one is super CLEAN! Staff are super nice and helpful. Breakfast is quick and just right before heading to the parks!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to rate and review your stay at our hotel.  We are so happy that you enjoyed our location, breakfast and the cleanliness of our rooms. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Great deal for the value minded and as close as you can get to Disney!
Summary: Excellent if traveling to visit disney as it‚Äôs right at the entrance for a super short walk.  The room was clean and the kids enjoyed the pool.  Staff was extremely helpful providing a razor (forgot to pack), replacement batteries for tv remote and extra roll of toilet paper.  Recommend packing some paper towels, plastic utensils and plates if planning on making use of the microwave and fridge for lunches/leftovers (you can grab a few of these items at breakfast in the morning).  Continental breakfast was ok and to be expected providing pre made and packaged items due to Covid etc. (hot items: croissant sausage and cheese sandwich, bacon, eggs, waffles and potatoes. Also pre packaged croissants, danishes, fruit, granola bars, cereal).  My kids liked the waffles with Nutella.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting our future guests know what to expect when they stay with us. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and found good value in what we offer. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Literally a 5 minute walk to Disneyland!!  Everything was great during our stay! Breakfast was served daily at the hotel which was awesome. The only thing I didn‚Äôt like during my stay was that you can hear people upstairs stomping around . But other than that .. everything was perfect!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this great review and rating. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: the front desk were very helpful. the person who cleaned up our room came to give us my sister‚Äôs laptop charger that we forgot. a noce and lovely lady indeed. it‚Äôs super convenient if you are planning to visit disney!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share this great review, we are so glad that you enjoyed your stay and that we were able to find the charger before you left.  We'll see you again on your next trip to Disneyland.

Summary Heading: Great location about a 5 min walk to security check at Disneyland! Comfortable beds! Friendly staff!
Summary: Bring your own pillows or buy pillows when you visit. They are the size of a couch throw pillow and just as lumpy as one. Breakfast was pretty good except the bacon is stale tasting, i think it was the ready made kind, and they have frozen waffles.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are so happy that you enjoyed our location, comfortable beds and our staff. We'll also pass on the feedback on our breakfast and pillows. Looking forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: SUPER FRIENDLY STAFF!  Walking distance to Disney. Hot breakfast. Clean rooms. Fridge (super cold,) and microwave. Great water pressure. Free parking. Workout room and pool. Resonably priced for the area. Tony Roma's on one side and Denny's on the other, great location.  We stay here every time we come to Disneyland. So nice to park the car and not have to move it again for the duration of our trip.
Manager Response: We appreciate your loyalty! Thanks so much for taking the time to share your impressions. We're delighted to hear that you've consistently received warm, welcoming service. We know that people are our greatest asset, and genuine caring is one of the most important aspects of excellent hospitality. Looking forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: I don't know anyone's name but the entire staff was so helpful and accommodating. I was very impressed with the helpfulness of every team member. I hurt myself before our stay and they were more than helpful in making sure my stay was easy and enjoyable. Special thanks to the entire staff.
Manager Response: I will be sure to pass on the recognition to our staff - thank you so much for this valuable feedback!

Summary: Location can‚Äôt be beat. Pleasantly surprised at the room decor and how updated it was.   Only complaint was trash pick up at dumpsters at 6am every morning was very loud and disruptive. Nothing they could do about that and my only real negative about the stay.  Water pressure wasn‚Äôt great in shower but wasn‚Äôt horrible.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking he time to a review about our hotel. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and apologize about the noise. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: I picked this hotel due to its location to Disneyland and I really wasn‚Äôt expecting much more than that. However, I was pleasantly surprised by the helpfulness of the front desk clerk, the cleanliness of the room, the decor and the comfortable beds. The adjoining rooms made it fun for myself, my sister  and 4 adult children. Perfect Christmas vacation with family.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the compliments about our hotel ad staff. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope we see you again soon.

Summary: Staff was super friendly & helpful!  Very clean throughout all areas: Lobby, dining area, room.  Parking easy & just across the street from Disneyland Resort.  Beds were very comfortable.  Very pleased with stay.
Manager Response: I will be sure to pass on the recognition to our staff - thank you so much for this valuable feedback!

Summary: Great experience. My only issue was the bed was too soft. It felt like I was sinking in and was hard to get out of. The woman at the front check out was very friendly and made checking in and out a breeze.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to rate your stay with us.  We are so glad that you had a great experience and hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Great location in relation to Disneyland
Summary: Easy check-in and check-out. Staff were very friendly and breakfast was served to us each morning by friendly workers. Grounds were very well maintained and the overall cleanliness of the grounds was excellent. We did have an ant problem in our room. When we reported that there were ants all over our vanity area, they asked if they could come in and take care of it for us. We let the front desk know that they should get it sprayed before the next people checked in - because after they cleaned it there were just as many, or more than before. They were so apologetic - honestly the ants didn't really bother us - but it became worse as the days went by. They stayed in the vanity area and we just had to wipe down the sink and counter each time we went to use it.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review on your stay. We are so sorry about the ants but are glad we were able to take care of it right away. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again real soon!

Summary: It is so close to Disneyland and CA Adventure it is easier to walk here than the own theme park parking lot. Having Denny's next door is very convenient as eating in Disney right now is crowded and difficult. The breakfast provided was way better than I was anticipating as well!
Manager Response: Wonderful! All of us at the Anaheim Inn appreciate your generous review. . Please consider us your home away from home.

Summary: It was so close to walk to Disneyland . Breakfast was a little plain but enjoyed the coffee.room was a little small but we made it work .customer service at the desk was excellent. Overall I would recommend it for a clean and close room to the parks and I would stay again
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the compliments about our location, staff and cleanliness. We are happy that you enjoyed you stay and hope to see you again!

Summary: This is a great place to stay when visiting Disneyland. I timed it. 10 min walk from the gate at Disneyland back to the room. We were in the 2nd building just past the pool area. Staff was wonderful. At check in I was thanked for being a BW rewards member. Told about no housekeeping, breakfast, parking. Room was spotless and well equipped. In room coffee was really good. Grounds kept clean. Loved the shower area. Lots of spots to store shower supplies. Loved the little info card. In a nut shell, Kids are welcome here. If their happy feet bother you, ear plugs are available at the front desk. We never heard the happy feet. The only issue I had was, I thought the pool was closed. The gate closest to the 2 nd building would not open with the key. No one was in there. Later I saw
Manager Response: Wonderful! Thank you so much for your kind words. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and found good value on our hotel. We are so sorry about the pool lock, as far as I know it is working but will have it check just incase! Thanks again and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I chose BWP Anaheim because of its proximity to Disneyland's entrance- I appreciated the Denny's being next door- u appreciated how attentive the ladies at the front desk were- I appreciate I was able to leave my parked car in the lot while we enjoyed the park (check in, first- they‚Äôll give you a parking pass) & I appreciate how clean the entire area was. We didn‚Äôt use the free breakfast or fitness center-  just needed a clean, quiet place to rest our heads for the night.  -Fully functioning microwave, fridge, tv, comfy beds -Parking lot is a little snug but worth it (I parked next to the Escalade & Porsche- no one noticed MY car! lol) -It‚Äôs quick access to the a I5 freeway, once you leave. - I‚Äôm glad I took a chance with BWP Anaheim. We‚Äôll be back!
Manager Response: Wonderful recommendations! Thanks a bunch for letting travel planners know what they can expect when they stay with us. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: It was less than a 5 minute walk to the gate of Disneyland!  It made getting to the park so easy!  I would stay again for sure!  Staff was very accommodating!  Pool area was small but we spent our time at Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and it looks like our location made everything easy as well. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: We have stayed in many hotels around Disney but this one made the best impact in our trip!! We will be definitely chose only this one from now on! All staff were so friendly and welcoming. The pool was heated and everything was so clean! I had an easy check in and check out!! My family loved it and so did we! This must be the hotel you choose when visiting Disney
Manager Response: Fantastic! Thanks so much for taking them time to share your experience, and letting us know that we've won your loyalty. We aim to make staying effortless, and it looks like we are winning! We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Good spot to stay at while visiting Disneyland. 2 minute walk to crosswalk to front entrance. Free hot breakfast along with grab and go options. Staff is friendly. Hotel rooms are clean. Pool is nice and hot tub to soak after walking all day. Tony Romas and Dennys are located directly next door for dining options.
Manager Response: Greetings and thank you for taking the time to leave this positive review. It's encouraging to hear from our guests - and shows we are doing something right! We hope to see you again!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for our Disney vacation
Summary: This is our go-to for our Disney trips.  Staff is incredibly friendly and helpful, and very responsive to any issues.   Entrance to Disneyland/CA Adventure/Downtown Disney is literally right across the street.  Very nice when you are tired at the end of a long day and you don‚Äôt have to wait for a shuttle, or walk a mile back to your hotel.  Rooms are not huge, but they are very clean, and quiet.  Great breakfast options so you can start the day full and spend less money eating in the parks.  Our son enjoyed the pool.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wholehearted recommendation of the Anaheim Inn's comfort, location and value! We sincerely appreciate your loyalty and support and the recognition of our staff. We hope you join us again on your next trip to Disneyland.

Summary Heading: Don‚Äôt have staff book a taxi for you
Summary: Could not get an Uber to come to this location. Had hotel front desk call a taxi for us. Van showed up that was not a taxi. Refused to provide us a receipt. Forced to pay cash. Drove 80 on the freeway
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We are sorry to hear about your concerns. Unfortunately after COVID none of the companies that we used to use came back. Right now we are at the merci of the internet and call taxi company's that are near by.  We appreciate your feedback and will no longer use that company. Thank you again for your time.

Summary: Upon arrival, Carol at the front desk was friendly and professional. My room was clean and very comfortable. The breakfast had a great variety of food and beverage. They offer masks, hand sanitizer and plastic gloves near the food and beverage area, which made me feel they care about the safety of their guests and staff. I have stayed here before and I will stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wholehearted recommendations. We sincerely appreciate your loyalty and support and the the specific mention of Carol's outstanding service. We will be sure to recognize her efforts. So glad you felt cared for by our breakfast room staff as well. We look forward to providing another exceptional hospitality experience for you.

Summary: This hotel's location is amazing, very short walk across one street to get to Disneyland entrance. They have a free hot breakfast every day of your stay, the staff are very kind and attentive. The parking is a bit limited, but they do have an option to park offsite, if needed. The beds were very comfortable, the shower had plenty of hot water, the rooms included a microwave and mini fridge (which got so cold it froze our drinks, but this was okay). The hotel is a little dated, the bathroom doors are squeaky, the bed frame is a little squeaky and there are dings in the not quite complete wallpaper. There was a GREAT bathroom fan that really moved the steamy air from the bathroom, which is unusual for this area. Overall, this was a comfortable hotel room with unbeatable location.
Manager Response: Wonderful! Thank you for the rating, compliments on our location and the service you received. We are happy that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The staff was amazing, very friendly and very helpful. We loved the rooms perfect size super clean! The complementary breakfast was very good they had a great choices. We especially loved that the rooms were walking distance to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Wonderful! Thanks a bunch for letting travel planners know what they can expect when they stay with us. Looking forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Fantastic stay, clean, comfy, easy in easy out. So close to Disneyland. Great food. Easy to book on line. Called to confirm when the travel time was close, quick response, understanding personnel with a smile in her voice.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the compliments about our hotel and staff. We are happy that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again.

Summary Heading: Great alternative to a Disneyland hotel
Summary: We stay at the Best Western plus as an alternative to the Disneyland Hotel. On our previous visit to Disneyland we had the opportunity to stay at Disneyland hotel but for this visit we opted to save some money and stay somewhere else. Buy the end of the trip, my 8 yr said Best Western plus was best hotel ever. Is was super convenient to the park. Staff was friendly, rooms were comfortable and bed was too. It had a fridge and microwave that was a great addition for late night snacks. We will definitely stay there again and I hope it will be just as great.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know we exceeded your expectations! We take pride in our attention to detail and we are happy that was conveyed to you with regards to cleanliness, ambiance and our property's condition. We hope you will join us again on your next trip.

Summary: Great location close to the entrance of Disneyland.  Only problem we had was the 2 bedroom suite did not have a door on the bedroom with the King bed. This made it difficult for young children to nap/sleep with any activity going on in the main room with 2 Queen beds.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review about our hotel. I'm sorry the layout of the room was not explained in detail. Unfortunately some of our suites do not have a door and I can understand how this could be difficult. Thank you very much for your feedback and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: This hotel is a great option to stay at if you want to be close to Disneyland. It was a 5 minute walk to the gates. The rooms were clean and well-cared for. The staff was kind and very helpful. Breakfast was  tasty and there was good variety.  The pool is just the right size and there is a hot tub too.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the compliments about our hotel! I'm happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights last week and visited Disneyland and California Adventure. The hotel was just across the street from the parks. We were shocked and disappointed when we came back to the room after our first long day to find it had not been cleaned. A call to the front desk informed us that there was no housekeeping service. So, for 4 days, we watched our room slowly get messier with wet towels piling up, garbage cans overflowing and having to sleep on dirty sheets each night‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ Luckily, we could call the maintenance man to get a few clean towels each night‚Ä¶‚Ä¶. I consider daily housekeeping a BASIC hotel service and couldn‚Äôt believe that they didn‚Äôt inform us that we wouldn‚Äôt be getting this when we checked in‚Ä¶.. such a bummer‚Ä¶‚Ä¶
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Before COVID, housekeeping service would definitely be a basic hotel service but right now there is so much uncertainty that we are not offering this service as a precaution. This would be for the safety of our guests and our employees. We verbally let our guest know at check in and this is also written on the registration card that is filled out at check in. Please accept my sincerest apology if this was not expressed to you. We are constantly working with staff of their service levels and appreciate your feedback. Thank you for your time and we would greatly appreciate the opportunity to restore your faith in us.

Summary: I have been staying here for years. BW Anaheim Inn Plus always has clean beautiful well appointed  rooms, great full breakfast, refrigerator and great location. You  can walk everywhere for food, üõí , and the Disney parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty! It was our pleasure to host another successful visit to Disneyland! Looking forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: My family and I had a last minute change of plans which allowed a side-trip to Disneyland. We were never disappointed with a Best Western Plus so decided to try this hotel out as well.  The hotel and staff far exceeded our expectations. We were hesitant about the hotel stay given previous experience at other hotels during COVID, however, this place was amazing!  The staff were great, the rooms were clean and neat, and the breakfast was fantastic. Bonus is that there is an outdoor patio available to enjoy breakfast.  We will most definitely be staying here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know we've exceeded your expectations! We take pride in our attention to detail and I am happy that was conveyed to you in regards to cleanliness, ambiance and our property's condition. We hope you join us again on your next trip to Disneyland!

Summary Heading: Amazing staff and super clean room! Shout out to Sue Edwards! AMAZING CUSTOMER SERVICE!
Summary: My husband and I stay here every time we go to Disney! It‚Äôs perfect! The staff is always helpful and kind, the rooms are always clean and breakfast is always hot and yummy and it‚Äôs FREE!! The hotel is right across the street from the park with a convenience store super close and Tony Roma‚Äôs as well! We love their food and yummy cocktails! So easy all around and relaxing!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty and your kind words! It was our pleasure to host another successful visit. Looking forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel several times when visiting Disneyland. It is literally across the street from the entrance to the park and right next door to a wonderful Denny's that serves quick, delicious breakfasts.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty! It was our pleasure to host another successful visit to Disneyland. Looking forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: This Best Western is in a great location because the hotel is located directly across the street from Disneyland. Walking distance.The breakfast included has lots of options.  Hotel has a pool and hot tub.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great recommendations, we are so happy that you enjoyed your stay.  We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: This is one great hotel in the perfect location to Disneyland. It the only place we stay in Anaheim. It‚Äôs comfortable, clean, microwave, refrigerator and ample parking if needed. The staff is always so helpful, with COVID we were able to get services we needed in a timely manner. It‚Äôs a great hotel, we have stayed here for years and will continue to do so.
Manager Response: We appreciated your loyalty! Thanks so much for taking the time to share your impressions. We're delighted to hear that you've consistently received warm, welcoming service. We know that people are our greatest asset, and genuine caring is one of the most important aspects of excellent hospitality. Looking forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: Front desk was friendly and helpful. Room was nice and the beds were comfortable-really important to have a good night's rest before you tackle Disneyland. Room was clean, updated, smelled fresh and not musty. Breakfast is good, but try to get there early, as the line can get crowded. Parking is limited, but we did not have an issue. Location was perfect and close to Disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words. We are so glad you had a great time and enjoyed everything we offer. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: We stayed here too visit Disneyland. It‚Äôs super close to the park and you have Panera bread and Denny‚Äôs next door.  Disneyland is right across the street. Literally a 5 min walk. The hotel is very clean and the beds to me were quite comfortable. I slept well! The over all decor was nice and welcoming. Loved what they did with the window treatments. The front desk attendant was sweet and checked me quickly. Also check out was a breeze as well. I just dialed 0 then left my keys in the room. You can‚Äôt beat the price for everything that‚Äôs around and the quality of the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this wonderful review.  Also thank you for letting travelers know what they can expect when they stay with us. You've made some great recommendations! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The location proximity to the parks can‚Äôt be beat. If you‚Äôre looking for a place to crash at the end of a long day, this will work! If you‚Äôre looking to spend time in your resort, I might pick somewhere else. Nothing wrong with the hotel, it just isn‚Äôt anything special.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share this review.

Summary: I stay here often while visiting Disneyland. As an older person the location is great to get to the parks. Free parking, wifi, hot breakfast, pool, & gym. I like it also because it is not a massive hotel. Extremely friendly staff in the office, dining area, cleaning staff, handyman.
Manager Response: Wonderful! All of us at the Anaheim Inn appreciate your generous words. You've outlined some of the best benefits of location. Please consider us your home away from home!! Safe travels until we welcome you back.

Summary Heading: Nice staff. Quick check in. and very clean rooms
Summary: The hotel is right across from the parks and restaurants. The staff was nice friendly and helpful. Rooms very clean and smells fresh! Good breakfast. Even their Gardner greeted us kindly  I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone wanting to bring their family to Disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you s much for the compliments about our hotel, we are so happy that you enjoyed your stay . We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The best place to stay if visiting Disneyland!!!  FREE parking, FREE breakfast, 2 mins walk to park AND friendly, helpful staff. The room was clean, beds comfortable and it had a fridge and microwave. Would recommend and would stay again xx
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the compliments about our hotel! I'm happy you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope to see you again in the future!

Summary Heading: A walk in the park choice!
Summary: Excellent and friendly staff! Great breakfast, quick walk to Disneyland park and if you need a break, swim, or a nap it‚Äôs just a quick walk back to your room at a great rate! The Best Western is perfectly located we‚Äôre you want to be.
Manager Response: Wonderful recommendations! Thanks a bunch for letting travel planners know what they can expect when they stay with us. Looking forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Was so excited we were able to get this hotel for our recent trip to Disneyland.  This hotel did not disappoint. Rooms were nice, staff was nice, location, you couldn‚Äôt ask forcany better.  Would definitely recommend!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this wonderful review and rating! We hope to see you again in the future!

Summary Heading: Reservations People Are RUDE and don't want my business
Summary: I wanted to stay here  but had to change my reservation. The woman on the phone told me "I can't do anything with this reservation but cancel it!" And I said, that's okay but I would like to make another.,..and I heard the click of the phone hanging up. REALLY?????  Never again Best Western.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. I am sorry hear the service you received was substandard. We encourage you to call back so we can show you this is not the norm. Hope to hear from you soon.

Summary: We loved being so close to the parks. Breakfast before heading out was a huge perk. The front desk and housekeeping staff were very friendly and attentive. The room was a great size. We appreciated having control of the temperature in each room. We will be back!
Manager Response: I will be sure to pass on recognition to our staff - thank you so much for this valuable feedback!

Summary Heading: Great location, great service and good price!
Summary: We got the package deal from Costco and it includes 4d3n hotel stay, $145 Disney gift card and 4 days of park hopper tickets for everyone in our family. It was a very enjoyable stay at Best Western, staffs are very helpful. Disneyland is right across the street and it takes away the stress of finding parking and walking from the parking lot to the entrance. (There is no tram to transport right now.)  I will definitely stay here again as it is how Disney vacation should be: relaxed and fun.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the compliments about our hotel!! I'm happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: Pro: -across from Disneyland entrance   Cons: -worn/dated rooms  -do not stay here if you expect to keep your car there while at the park after check out. They will not allow it despite what is said on multiple blogs/websites  Wouldn‚Äôt recommend. Stay somewhere where you pay for daily parking, or a garage.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We are sorry to hear about your concerns and have double checked our websites. Both sites display our parking policy correctly. We apologize that the time we allow did not quite meet your expectations. We value your feedback and hope we have the opportunity to host your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: Stayed in a double queen room (1 adult and 1 child) and loved the close proximity to Disneyland entrance. I was in doubt since some people recommended another BW closer to the entrance, but they are really close to each other, 2 minute walk. The BW Anaheim was a 5 minute walk to the Disneyland street entrance (where line was formed in the morning) and probably a 12 minute walk total from hotel to park entrance if you didn't have a line.
