The room was reasonably quiet compared to other motels I've stayed at. Beds were fine, but I wish they had a lower profile pillow especially for my kid. With 4 pillows per bed, it would be great to have at least 1 per bed be low profile. Sink/mirror is located with the main sleep area which worked fine for us but may bother others. It allows a
Manager Response: Wonderful recommendations! Thanks a bunch for letting travel planners know what they can expect when they stay with us. Your tips are great too! Looking forward to welcoming you back to the Anaheim Inn soon.

Summary: Great Location, Friendly Staff & Great Room. 10-15 minute walk directly into park.  Very good free breakfast. Good AC in room and friendly staff.  Even if you have a pay more for this hotel - the pluses for this hotel are worth it. I will be coming back to this hotel if a room is available.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this valuable feedback, we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: I have stayed here a few times, the location is fantastic for going back and forth to the Disneyland parks. The property is clean, well maintained and comfortable. The room has nice amenities for families staying
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this amazing review and rating. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you again soon!!

Summary: We had the best time at this hotel clean staff is attentive. Bonus breakfast mins away from entrance of Disneyland you can come and go as you please.worth every penny. The kids loved the pool area. Would highly recommend this hotel !!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star rating for your stay. We're happy you enjoyed everything our Best Western has to offer. We look forward to welcoming you back again very soon.

Summary Heading: Conveniently located across the Disneyland Resort
Summary: Great location. Easy access. Plenty of parking if you‚Äôre driving to the hotel. Food chain restaurants located within walking distance like Denny‚Äôs and IHOP which is open 24 hours. Rooms are very clean and updated. One of the great Best Westerns around the resort.
Manager Response: Wonderful! Thank you for the rating and compliments about our hotel. I'm happy you enjoyed your stay with and we hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: Location was perfect to walk to Disneyland, to buy food , everything is nearby! Was nice and quiet I wish I didn't have to leave ! Would most definitely stay here again ! Best part not having to rush to enjoy the day out !
Manager Response: Wonderful! Thank you for the rating and compliments on our location! We hope to see you again in the future!!

Summary: When making the reservation,  remember to look at the address. There's 2 4 doors from each other. This is NOT the one right outside main gate Disneyland. I feel it's bait and switch. Not worth the price for the quality or location.  The staff was nice, the rooms were clean. The beds were terrible.  My hubby and I kept rolling to the middle of the bed. They are very worn. The breakfast was fine. Parking was stupid packed. We got the last spot, and the spots were super tiny.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review,  we are sorry to hear about your concerns. We will be checking the beds in room 115 so this does not happen in the future. Thank you again for your feedback. We hope to have the opportunity to host again when going to Disneyland.

Summary Heading: Nothing done when other guest smoke weed
Summary: The room next to us was smoking week all night and after calls to the front desk they ‚Äúcouldn‚Äôt find the room‚Äù even though the smoke was coming through our conjoining door. Not family friendly. Room was also not very clean. Hair in the bathtub. AC barley worked and the TV was hit and miss. Great walk for Disneyland, but that‚Äôs about it.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn and for bringing this to our attention. When alerted to any concerns the front desk will always try to look for a quick remedy. We are sorry that we were not successful in accomplishing our goal of total guest satisfaction. We appreciate your feedback very much as it will allow us to better service our guests in the future.

Summary: I always stay at this property when visiting Disneyland. It's a short walk across from the main entrance and the staff is friendly and accommodating. Martha at the front desk always has a cheerful good morning greeting and a professional attitude. There is plenty of parking and the rooms are large, clean and comfortable. The breakfast bar has many options and I love the fresh cup of coffee they offer.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty! It was our pleasure to host another successful visit!

Summary: The hotel was clean and the room sufficient.  They made a way for us to stay an additional night without any hiccups...even during this time when things are starting to get busy again.  It is conveniently located just a short walking distance from the park as well as many places to eat.  Elevators worked well and the overall property was well kept.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review about our hotel. Its sounds like you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you again in the future!

Summary Heading: Don't Count On Extended Parking Time
Summary: My family and I selected this motel based mostly on the location which is (almost) directly across the street from the Disneyland entrance on Harbor Drive. We were also hoping to be able to leave our car parked on property for the next day as we  were visiting Disneyland the following day after driving to Anaheim the night before. I would assume that 90 to 95% of the guests at this motel are staying there because they are going to Disneyland. Motel Management must be aware of this, right? We called before arrival and talked to the front desk person about the availability of extended parking time. We also asked about this parking time issue when we checked in. It appears that all employees have been instructed to be ambiguous about the parking availability until the last possible
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that not all your Best Western expectations were exceeded. We do our best to accommodate parking for inhouse guest as well as guest arriving that day and it can be difficult at times. We do appreciate your feedback and hope we can welcome you back soon.

Summary Heading: Right across from Harbor entrance to Disneyland. Great Value!
Summary: This property was very close to Disneyland- 1 min walk to the S. Harbor entrance. Rooms were very clean, the beds were very comfortable, ithad free parking ,a very good continental breakfast. I felt very safe there even though we are in the middle of a pandemic. Hand sanitizer was placed in various areas on the property. Pool area was nice and again very clean. This property definitely deserves more than 2.5 stars! I would say it‚Äôs a 3.5 star hotel.
Manager Response: Wonderful! Thank you for the ratings, and compliments on our location, the service you received and your room. It's nice to know that you enjoyed everything about our Best Western. We look forward to welcoming you back again very soon.

Summary: The customer service at this location is awesome, drove to Anaheim just to visit my grandson, I was willing to pay for my daughter‚Äôs parking because she was spending the day with us and Sue was awesome, she gave us a parking pass so my daughter can park her vehicle at the hotel. The Location is the best right across the street from Disneyland, we walked to Downtown Disney and were able to walk into Disney California to do some shopping and dined there as well. I will definitely be back
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the compliments I'm glad the parking worked out and you were able to enjoy Downtown Disney with your daughter. Looking forward yo welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Great location in proximity to Downtown Disney(Disneyland when they open)! Just walk across the street and your at security! The modified breakfast was lacking a sack of snacks but I'm sure during non pandemic times their breakfast is amazing like all Best Westerns. It was quiet and we felt safe. The room was a good size. Overall great experience!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience at our hotel. You've outlined some of the best benefits of our location, walkability to everything  Disney. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: I‚Äôm a BW Diamond Select Member & definitely was treated that way on check-in.  Elisabeth was SO VERY welcoming upon check-in.  I retired from a worldwide airlines & of course stayed around the world as a flight attendant.  Elisabeth made me feel important right away.  Disneyland is still closed... BUT when opened again- just across the street on Harbor Blvd.   Location is everything. I had appointments in the OC & needed a place to stay nearby.  I will return when Disneyland has reopened. GREAT Stay.  Rooms are very clean & disinfected.
Manager Response: Thanks a bunch for letting travel planners know what they can expect when they stay with us. We're happy that you found our location convenient and felt the warm welcome we're known for. Elizabeth will be delighted to hear your generous words about her service. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!!

Summary: Very welcoming and ready to help no matter what. Always greeted with a smile and how can I help you. With no maid service, they offered to get you whatever you need anytime. Very clean and sealed rooms on arrival.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know we exceeded your expectations! We take pride in our attention to detail and I am happy that was conveyed to you in regards to our cleanliness and caring staff. We hope you join us again on your next trip!

Summary: This is a great location.  friendly and helpful staff ( thank you Sue and Martha).    clean room.  great grab n go breakfast.  The only downside is disneyland isn't open but until then, great place to stay if you're visiting downtown disney / anaheim area.  can't wait to come back!
Manager Response: I will be sure to pass on recognition to our Front Desk staff. It was our pleasure to host another successful visit. Thank you for this great review!!

Summary: We went to Anaheim to drop off my daughter her baby shower gifts, we were looking for a hotel for 1 night and I happen to call Best Western right across the street from Disneyland. They didn‚Äôt disappoint, we were able to go to downtown Disney. We plan to go back in December when my grandson is born and will definitely staying at Best Western again
Manager Response: There isn't a much better compliment than hearing you'll return. Thank you for taking the time to review and rate our hotel. Looking forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: A great place to stay.  Even though Disneyland is closed right now, Downtown Disney is easy to get to from here.Walkable.  Takes only minutes.    Felt very safe and secure staying here.  Extremely clean room.  Nice Grab and Go breakfast.  Nextdoor is Denny's if you need more food.   Lobby was decorated for Halloween and it was so nice to see decorations out!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience at our hotel. Sounds like our location across from Disneyland/Downtown Disney made everything easier too! We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: this hotel is a croos st from disney land is on a good plase for the family  and you walk to a good restaurants and to the park dont need to take a buss or a car for everiting is closer from this location
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: I really thought I would like the hotel. We had a  Great room and it  had a  nice  large bathroom counter.  We travel as a family of 4 adults and my daughter and I always have difficulty finding room for all our personal items, make-up, medication, etc.  The hotel is really close to Disneyland and had free parking!  It was near some restaurants.  The problem was that the beds are really high and my husband and I had difficulty getting in and out of bed.  Also, because we are older we had to use the rest room during the night and had to repeat this procedure.  This hotel might be OK for younger families, but I will not be staying  at this hotel again.  I had planed to post this review earlier, but the hotel never sent me a form to comment on our stay, like most other hotels I've
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Between Disneyland and the Nixon Library
Summary: Nice, clean with friendly staff and very good breakfast. Front desk and breakfast staff were very friendly and helpful who also gave good recommendations for restaurants. Parking was underground with lot's of parking space. .
Manager Response: none

Summary: We went for a family vacation and the location was great, just a few steps away from disney, breakfast was awesome, staff was nice, great location for other places around the park. Weather was awesome
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very clean room with plenty of space, outlets and chairs to relax in.  A lot of choices for the free breakfast.  I always prefer to stay at this hotel for my Disneyland vacations because it's really a nice place to be.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your feedback and business.  It's always heartwarming to hear that our guests enjoyed the breakfast.  We are always trying to add more choices to choose from.

Summary: Great location - if Disneyland is your focus. Close to familiar/basic restaurants. Nice remodeled rooms. Way above average breakfast. Friendly and knowledgeable staff. Free parking.   It's a noisy place and the pool is nothing special.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your feedback and business.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: The place is great in location, the free breakfast was hot with tons of options for the kids and adults. The staff was friendly and rooms were clean. My only complaint is parking lot is small not much room for bigger vehicles and tight spots close together.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your feedback and business.  So nice to hear that your liked our breakfast.  We have many options to choose from.  I will be sure to let my staff know they were appreciated.

Summary: Very close walking distance to Disneyland! The staff was always super helpful and cheerful. Breakfast changes on certain items day to day which was nice so it never got old. Just know you can't take any of the food back to your room. Not a deal breaker though. Rooms were very nice and clean. The garbage trucks can be a bit annoying but that's not the hotel's fault just something to be aware of. This place is worth the money! Free breakfast, free parking, and walking distance!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your feedback and business.  We are always happy to hear that our guests enjoyed their stay.   Our breakfast has many items available and we are always trying new things.  We look forward to seeing you on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Very friendly staff. We arrived in the morning and even though our room wasn‚Äôt ready, we were able to pre-check in, register our vehicle and park it in their lot while we went to Downtown Disney for lunch and shopping. We came back in the afternoon and got in our room which was clean and adequate. Nothing fancy, but fine for our needs. We were a little concerned about the noise level as people were checking in, wheeling luggage down the corridor, slamming doors and such. We walked over to the Garden Walk area for a quick dinner, then a movie at the AMC theater. Very convenient and felt safe walking at night, just be aware of your surroundings as you would in any city. A nice surprise was being able to see some of the fireworks from Disneyland over the roof of the neighboring
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your feedback and business.  We are happy to hear that you liked our location and my helpful staff.  I will be sure to let them know they were appreciated.

Summary: Great Location.  It allows you to main attraction as well as great restaurants. We needed a handicapped room and the room was spacious and well appointed. We really enjoyed out free breakfast, scrambled eggs, sausage, waffles, yogurt and oatmeal.  Thank you Best Western
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  It's always heartwarming to hear the good things about our breakfast.  We have many items available and we are always looking for ways to improve it.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Directly Across the Street from Disneyland
Summary: As evidenced by the hordes of kids wearing mouse ears at the (good quality) breakfast, there is only one reason that travelers stay in this hotel - it is right across the street from Disneyland.    Given the amount of walking involved with a visit to Disney, we hugely appreciated the close proximity of the hotel, and with a third floor room we were even able to watch Disney's 9:30 p.m. fireworks from our hotel window.  The hotel is not fancy but is clean and comfortable, and the breakfast is nice.  Parking is free but the spaces are in very tight quarters, so it's best to find a parking space and not touch your car again until check out.    Overall this was a nice hotel in an ideal location at a far better price than the "in park" Disneyland hotels.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your feedback and business.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Great location right across from Disneyland and California Adventures the staff are excellent the cleaning staff kept out rooms clean and stocked breakfast is good the price is worth it and affordable will be definitely returning
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your feedback and business.  I will be sure to let all of my staff they were appreciated.  I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time here as well.

Summary: Wonderful place! Staff was great. Nice rooms, great breakfast. And loved the short distance from the park! Only complaint is that they need to clean their a/c units. Dirt piles would form on the ground when turned on, pretty gross. But we never complained about it, figured the cleaning staff would catch on as they cleaned it up everyday. Would absolutely stay again though!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your feedback and business and look forward to your next to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Clean, thoughtful hotel in outstanding location
Summary: Our family of 5 really enjoyed out stay in their 3rd floor suite. The rooms are thoughtfully furnished and the AC units provide white noise, making it surprisingly quiet right next to the elevator. The breakfast is generous and the location by the entrance of Disneyland is even better than Disney's own Paradise Pier hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your feedback and business.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Very clean & comfortable room. The bed was extra comfy. Very quiet. Front desk staff was very friendly & professional. Easy check in & out. The included breakfast was outstanding. Wonderful choices. Everything was yummy. Great coffee. Clean. Friendly breakfast staff. Super convenient access to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  I would also like to thank you for taking the time too compliment my staff.  We value your feedback and business.   We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: This hotel is directly across from Disneyland entrance with a short 5 minute walk! Great free breakfast to get ready for long days in the parks. Clean area with helpful friendly staff. Room was clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your feedback and business.  It's always nice to hear good things about my staff.  I will relay the message.

Summary Heading: Clean room, good breakfast, close to Disneyland
Summary: The room is clean. There is free breakfast with variety of food. The hotel is very close to Disneyland. You can leave your bags at the hotel lobby if you want to check out in the morning before going into the Disneyland park.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your feedback and business.  It's always nice to hear our guests enjoyed their stay.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Great family hotel across from Disney
Summary: We highly recommend this hotel. It is directly across the street from Disneyland with great options for food right next to the hotel. They offer a hot breakfast every morning. This hotel suited our needs and exceeded our expectations.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your feedback and business.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.  I am glad you enjoyed your time here with us.

Summary: This hotel is located right across the street from Disneyland.  Easy and free parking.  Customer service was excellent, with friendly staff.  The breakfast is one of my favorite things about this location!  They have a separate room with anything you could want for breakfast, including hot foods like eggs, sausage, bacon, along with the usual cereal, yogurt, pastries, and bagels, topped off with a variety of juices, water, coffee and tea.  Great start to the day before entering Disneyland and saves some money, too!  You can also get Disneyland tickets and tourist information in the breakfast room. This will be my go-to hotel for Disneyland trips.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  I am so happy you enjoyed your time here with us.  It's always nice too hear good things about our breakfast.  We are always adding new things to our menu.

Summary: Our family had a blast great hotel comfortable beds clean !!!!!we had a lot of space for 3 teenagers to spread out and not be crammed together. The food was fresh and good variety. Definitely will be going here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  I am glad you enjoyed your time here.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Good customer service.  Clean room. Easy parking. Couldnt hear neighbors which is a huge plus. Great access to Disneyland!!! My only complaint is it was a bit pricey for a Sunday evening. But location is worth paying for to not pay to park at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your feedback and business.  I will be sure too let my staff know they were appreciated.

Summary: This hotel was right across the entrance to Disneyland.  We crossed the street and we were there! The rooms were very clean. I would stay again because of the location.  We traveled in February so we did not use the pool. It is very small.  The rooms were great though.  Breakfast was ok.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your feedback and business.

Summary: Room was very nice & comfortable and the short walk to Disney was perfect. Don't expect to sleep in and it's not because of the kids. Every morning we were woken up by trash truck in front of and behind our room at 6:00 AM.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your feedback and business.  We are looking into the arrival time of the trash company.  Thank you for your time.

Summary: Our stay was wonderful! The hotel is very close to the entrance to Disneyland. The room was very clean, beds comfortable, breakfast more than expected. No fee for parking, and we were able to keep our parking spot until 6:00 pm the day of checkout. Many restaurants near to the hotel. We will be staying there whenever we go back to Disneyland. Thank you for a great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your feedback and business.

Summary: Always our go to place to stay. Location is perfect, however, location has become second to the wonderful staff. Rooms are always clean and very comfortable. Breakfast options for everyone is also a plus. Kindness truly matters!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We always look forward to seeing our returning guest.

Summary: We are on family vacation and stayed 4 nites from the Christmas Day 2019.  The location of the hotel is across the street from Disneyland parks about a five minute walk was the main consideration when I decide to book this hotel.  I must say that everything was excellent.  As for the room, is modern, clean and the bed is comfortable.  Also, room is equipped with refrigerator and microwave.  Complimentary breakfast is more than I expected.  Great Hot Breakfast with many choices and taste delicious in a good restaurant room on the 3rd floor.  Services are great and there are lots of parking spaces for hotel guest. The king Bed is in a separate room off the main room (no door to this though) and has its own tv. The main room had 2 comfy queens, tv, a fridge and a cupboard. Loved that the basin was outside of the bathroom. With 3 adults and 2 kids we could have people washing hands and brushing teeth while others were showering.  Rooms were super clean.  Laundry was open 9am til quite late and cost $2 for the wash, $2 for detergent and $2 for the dryer. Takes quarters which the front desk can change for you.  Breakfast was great. The kids loved it and so did we. Simple but nice. Fresh fruit, hot options, pastries,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  On behalf of my staff and myself we would like to "Thank You" for staying at our location for you vacation.  With our location being across the street, it is a great location to stay.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: We had a great stay at this hotel. The rooms were clean, comfortable, quiet, and easily accessible. Pool and hot tub were adequate for our needs - we were there for Disneyland, but the hot rum was great after walking all day!  Breakfast was good. Lots of choices.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  I am glad to hear that you enjoyed our pool and hot tub.  We recently renovated it and glad it has paid off.

Summary: This has become my very favorite hotel when visiting Disneyland.  It's closer to the gates of Disney than 2 of the 3 on-site hotels, and much less expensive.  The price includes breakfast, the rooms are always clean, express check-out is super convenient, and I earn points toward a free night stay with every visit!  There's no room service, but there is a 24-hour Denny's next door and you could always have a pizza delivered. :)
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your feedback and business.  It's always nice to see our returning guests.  We value your loyalty.

Summary: This is my second home. The pool and hot tub are a good size but normally we are at the parks. Breakfast is a very good way to save on cost since its included in our stay. Hot and Cold items and plenty of space to eat. ( we like the outdoor patio with view of Guardians of the Galaxy and Space Mt.   This is the only place I stay when at Disneyland, we live 6 hours away and stay every 6-8 wks 2 to 4 days at a time.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  It's always nice to see our returning guest.  We feel that you are part of our family.  We hope that you feel the same way.    We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Modest but nice and very close to Disney
Summary: This motel was part of a Costco/Disneyland package so I don't know the non-package pricing but it should be competitive.  A three story external entrance building with a large room (with terrace) for the enhanced continental breakfast included.  AC unit is NOT by the bed which eliminates a direct breeze.  Practically across the street for the east entrance to the Disney complex but also in walking distance to other restaurants and stores.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  So happy that you enjoyed your stay here at our property.  Our location is conveniently located only 5 minutes from the Main entrance to the park.  You can come back to your room and take a break before heading back.  We are located by many restaurants for your dining.

Summary Heading: Anaheim Inn is the ONLY place I stay when I go to Disneyland!
Summary: I have stayed at this hotel dozens of times over the past 20 years of my Disney addiction.  I have always found the staff extremely pleasant to work with and have rarely encountered any issues. I recommend this hotel to any of my friends and family who are planning a Disney trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We love seeing our regular guest here as well as the new.  We feel like you are part of our family.  We look forward to seeing you.  We always value your feedback as well.

Summary: I had a very good week's stay here and was pleasantly surprised at how close to Disneyland this hotel is [over the road!] There is also a Dennys Diner next door and a Cold Stone ice cream parlour, [bonus] My room was large with plenty of drawers and shelves and I had a king sized bed with 6 pillows to chose from. Fluffy white towels and free toiletries, an iron and ironing board, a fridge, microwave and hair dryer all provided. I was just a tad disappointed with the breakfasts, [paper plates!! what's that about?] although it was free. I am a vegetarian and struggled to find vegan food. I did suggest to the staff that I would have liked to find tomatoes, beans and mushrooms, hashbrowns perhaps... there was however a range of juices and milks, eggs, pancakes, bagels, muffins,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your business and feedback.  I am working with the breakfast staff on providing more options for vegetarians.  I am hopeful that we will have more options in the next months to come.

Summary: This hotel was clean and had all the necessities. I thought this was a great location right near Disneyland and able to walk there. Ample parking. They had great breakfast options, fresh and awesome coffee!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  It's always nice to hear that our guests enjoyed their stay.  We always value your feedback.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Disneyland with a stay at the Best
Summary: Thank you "Best Westren" for allowing us to park at the hotel before check in.  This saved us from moving our vehical three times during our stay, as well as, saved us $$.  This feature was huge! Your kindness has left an impression on us and we will most diffently be looking at you for further stays.  I was a surprise to also receive an up grade to our room, as well.  Your staff went up and beyond their duty to shows us kindness.  We also enjoy the hot breatfast with your sweet staff ready for service.  Thank you, The Clark's
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  I am glad that my staff was able to make your trip more enjoyable and memorable.   We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Would highly recommend staying at the Best Western. We have stayed at various places in Anaheim (from Australia), however we have rebook the last three stays at The Best Western, we recommend this to all of our friends whom also are travelling to Anaheim. Great service, fantastic location, friendly staff and reasonable price
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We always look forward to seeing our returning guests.  We value your continued support.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Great pillows! Nice tropical plants on grounds. Famous restaurants on both sides of hotel with many more in walking distance. There was a small convenience store a few properties away. Location, location, location! Not to mention the the happiest place on earth a few minutes walk away. As well as nice clean comfortable rooms. Good fro everyone!  There was a cute small pool that we didn‚Äôt have time to check out.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey.  I'm glad that you liked our location.  Hopefully next time you visit Anaheim you will be able to enjoy our pool.  We recently renovated it and look forward to you enjoying it.

Summary: Made reservations several months prior to taking trip. During that time we experienced a family tragedy. To try and help I last-minute invited some other family member children if they would like to accompany us. I knew we would be rather crowded in the large suite that I had reserved but I figured we'd be in the park all day anyway so it would be OK... maybe even fun. It did not occur to me that we now had more people in the suite than what I had originally reserved.... that is, until the hotel staff was exceedingly rude, condescending and accusatory to my wife when she went to see if we could get a fold-out bed/cot. "We counted and you have more people in that room than what you had reserved so no, you may not have a fold-out bed." Wow. Thanks. And my wife had one of these
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  I am sorry to hear that you had to deal with a family tragedy and your experience here was not a good one. Without knowing more about the experience, I would just like to stay that our staff should  have done a better job in accommodating your needs.

Summary: Pros: - Excellent location, just across from the Disneyland entrance - Free breakfast (which isn't high quality, but the price is right) - Clean, modern rooms  Cons: - The rooms feel very damp/humid. No amount of AC can make up for it. I don't even know how it happens, given the SoCal climate. - No safe in rooms for valuables - Exterior entry to rooms - Noisy AC makes it hard to hear anything else  Overall it was a good stay and I would consider staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your feedback and business.  I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed our location, breakfast, and rooms.  We recently added bacon to our menu, which gives our guest more options to choose from.  We are currently looking into the cause of the humidity in the room.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay when visiting Disneyland
Summary: We booked 2 nights at this location because of it proximity to Disneyland. It did not disappoint! This hotel is right across the street from Disneyland, offers free parking, free wifi and free breakfast. The rooms were nice and clean. The beds were comfortable and there is a small pool on site. Breakfast was delicious and they had a great variety of things to choose from. We definitely would recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your stay.  I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay.  We value your feedback and business.  Our location makes it nice to come back and rest.  Our hot tub and pool is open until 10:30 pm so our guest can relax at the nights end.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: First of all, I've been to plenty of hotels, namely Best Westerns in the past year and this experience was single handedly and by far the absolute worst I have ever had at ANY hotel EVER.   Before I even leave town:  Me and 5 friends purchase a room for 6 on Expedia. The night before we leave I receive a message through Expedia from management (at least I assumed it was a manager) asking me to 'reconfirm' my reservation and provide an email AND my physical home address.   Not once in my life have I had to provide any of this information before my stay. What if I had not seen the Expedia message? I have a very busy email inbox and could have missed it. Would this have cancelled my reservation only to find out after driving 4 hours from Las Vegas to Anaheim? I can understand
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  Please accept my sincere apology for the problems you experienced while staying with us.  You are correct, no matter what they were, there is no excuse for poor customer service.  I want to assure you that I have addressed your concerns and are looking into our policy concerning Suites and parking.  I appreciate you bringing it to my attention so I can make sure it doesn't happen again.  We look forward to seeing you on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: There is a terrible smell of humidity in the rooms. especially on the ground floor. The beds were wet.  Internet was slow. No windows in the rooms.  Location sis good and nice restaurants near by. lllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllll
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your business and feedback.  We are currently looking into the cause of the humidity in the room.  The windows do have locks on them and that is why you may have thought they didn't open.   Please accept my sincere apology the the problems you experienced.

Summary: Excellent location. Disneyland is right across the street. The room was clean  and spacious. The bed was a little bit too soft for me, but the rest of my family enjoyed the beds very much.  Parking is free. The complimentary breakfast buffet tasted good. The staff was nice and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  It's always nice to hear that our guests enjoyed the breakfast.  We just added bacon to the many items to choose from.    We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: This hotel is great for a trip to Disneyland.  It's across the street from a main gate, it's clean and well kept. The free breakfast buffet is fantastic, good variety of food, well-stocked and clean plus it has outdoor seating which is great. The breakfast staff is awesome, they stay on top of replenishing and cleaning throughout the breakfast rush. The rooms are super clean and spacious, plenty of towels, the cleaning staff is great.  The beds are really comfortable, lots of extra pillows.  For the money you save staying here instead of a Disney property it's well worth it.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We our happy to hear that your enjoyed your stay.  We value your feedback and business.    We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: We chose this hotel for the location and for the price we paid it was perfectly fine. Good breakfast. We stayed in a 2 bedroom suite but the second bedroom had no window. Because of that the air quality could be better. However for a short stay when you spend all your day in the parks this hotel is a excellent choice.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We are happy you enjoyed your stay.  We recently added bacon to our breakfast menu.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Great breakfast and right across the street from Disneyland and California adventure park and downtown disney! Wonderful pool and hot tub... They have a laundry room as well! Just bring your own laundry soap.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  So happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay.  We value your feedback and business.

Summary: This hotel is the next best thing instead of staying at an actual Disneyland hotel. Super short walk to the park. Great breakfast, there are options for any eaters! The room was clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  So happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and took advantage of our breakfast.  We recently added bacon to the menu.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Friendly staff with an excellent location!
Summary: We recently stayed here for a week in July.  The front desk staff were friendly and honored our request for a room near the front of the hotel.  The housekeeping staff kept our room spotless and well stocked.  The staff in the breakfast room were helpful and courteous and the selection of both hot and cold items was wonderful.  Breakfast is available from 6:30 until 10:00 and no matter what time we went for breakfast there was always a great selection, and they refill anything that is running low immediately.  Parking is tight, but no matter what time we arrived back to the hotel there was somewhere to park.  I would definitely recommend this hotel when visiting Disneyland and surrounding area.  It is close to many restaurants and stores.  My only disappointment was that there
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your feedback and business.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel because it was recommended by a friend and it certainly didn‚Äôt disappoint. The hotel is located across the road from Disneyland, the entrance is a minute away. The location was handy considering we were travelling with a 5 year old.  The hotel isn‚Äôt 5 star fancy, but the facilities are great. The rooms are spacious enough, the beds were so comfortable and the staff were lovely. The buffet breakfast was plentiful, with lots of options including waffles, bacon, eggs, bagels, cereal, toast etc, the options vary daily. The buffet food is constantly being refreshed when the food runs out.‚Äô  The hotel is also located near lots of dining options, I totally recommend Tony Roma‚Äôs next door or Mimi‚Äôs Cafe down the road. The Cheesecake Factory is also a 13 minute
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your business and and feedback.  We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay.  Our location is very conveniently located near restaurants and convenient stores.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: We stayed the night here while visiting Anaheim.  This place was really nice.  It was clean.  The beds were comfortable!  The staff was courteous.  It was an amazing stay for a very low price.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your feedback and business.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Our stay was relaxing, very pleasant and perfect
Summary: We were very happy to have a large room with plenty of space for our things. The bed was very comfortable. At breakfast we could sit outside. The juices were refreshingly chilled and the blueberry bagel  tasted very good with cream cheese. The location of the hotel is great because it is only a few steps away from Disneyland.

Summary Heading: Clean & Comfortable - Very Close to Disney Main Gates
Summary: Stayed 3 nights at this hotel and we will definitely stay here again while visiting Disney Land! Clean rooms, comfortable beds, nice & friendly staff, and a decent hot breakfast. Also a very close walk to the main entrance of Disney. They also  have a nice warm pool and Jacuzzi (small, but very clean). Only complaint was the room was on the small size, with a ton of furniture crammed in. Made fitting all of our belongings tough, but we managed. We are a family of 4, with a stroller and play pen for the youngest.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your feedback and business.  It's nice to hear that your enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: I was really disappointed in this hotel room. The price was cheap but so was the room. The bathroom was very small. Almost didn't have room to close the door. The beds are advertised as a double, but in real life it is a full size bed from the 70's. Two adults could just barely lay side by side in it. The up side to the bed was it was clean unlike the floors. I have never seen floors that dirty. I went swimming with the granddaughter then straight to the shower and my feet were black from the carpet. I would look around a bit before booking at this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  It's really unfortunate that you were disappointed by the size of the room.  Sorry that you weren't satisfied.  We sincerely hope that you found accommodations which met your expectations on the rest of your trip.

Summary: This is one of the best hotels we have ever stayed at. The hotel is directly across from Disney land. The  Continental breakfast  Has a wide variety of food that has something for everyone to enjoy.  If you plan to visit Disneyland. This is one of the closest hotels unless you stay in the park. We were able to leave the hotel and get into Disney within 10 to 15 minutes of walking. Super close.  The staff was extremely knowledgeable and even when we had one problem they fixed immediately.   This was really one of the best hotels we have stayed at.  I don't always give 4 to 5 stars but the Best Western plus Anaheim inn definitly  deserves 5 stars. If you are planning a trip to Disneyland , staying at the Best Western plus Anaheim inn will be one of your best decisions
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your feedback and business.  We are so happy that your enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: This location is literally right across the street from Disneyland Harbor entrance. Be complete hot breakfast they offer each morning make such a difference with not going into the park hungry. Rooms are great and staff are very kind and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your feedback and business.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Best place to spend.your money, when you know you have choices to make, dont have to think hard about this one, This hotel is by far if not is the best to get your money's worth, super close walking distant to theme park, No valet to worry about and have to pay extra or excess dollars for, the best think of this hotels was the privacy, couldnt even here or feel others guest as they walked or scurries by, like your "other" hotels near you..
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your feedback and business.  It's always a pleasure to here the stay was enjoyable.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Very friendly, helpful staff. Breakfast varies slightly day to day, but had pancakes, waffles, potatoes, toast, doughnuts, English muffins, Danish, sausage, yogurt, fruit, etc. Comfortable beds. Really low water pressure in the shower, but have this problem almost everywhere we go. Right across the street from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your feedback and business.  So happy to hear that you and enjoyed our breakfast.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Free parking, and perfect location makes this place a great choice for visiting Disneyland. The room was clean and spacious. Minor cosmetic blemishes keep it from a 5 star rating, but very happy with our stay here. You can hear and see the Disney fireworks from your room.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your feedback and business.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Convenient stay.  Close to Disneyland (walking distance) and a few restaurants to chose from.   It was a perfect stay for us.  My parents a bit older and it was nice to have them walk back to the hotel when they got tired.  Room was nice, breakfast was good, and the staff were friendly.  I'll definitely consider another stay.   My only complaint is the noise at night. People that were coming back late night (we got in just before midnight).  People could be heard running/stomping around and slamming their room doors.  Since we stayed during the week day, we could hear trucks working in about 7 am.. either dump trucks or construction.   Obviously the noise is not in the hotel management's control but thought I'd mentioned it for those light sleepers.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  So happy that you enjoyed your stay.  Our location is great too come back and rest before the nights activities at the park.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Stayed here for a Disney trip. The location was amazing, right at the front gate. The hotel was nice, pretty quiet, though there was construction that started bright and early behind it. Breakfast was great for a continental fare. Pool was small, but hot tub was big, used that at night. I feel like the rooms had way too much furniture in them for the size they were, but they were clean and everything was nice looking.  Parking for one car was included, but the parking lot was small and cramped, hard to find and then get into spaces, though we did find one every time. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  So happy that your enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Great hotel, great breakfast, amazing proximity to Disneyland
Summary: The hotel is very close to Disneyland. Just a few minutes to walk from the hotel to the entrance of the park. You can even see the fireworks from the hotel. The breakfast was delicious with a wide variety of choices. The room is a little small, but we were only there to sleep so it was perfect for myself and 2 kids. The staff was very friendly and welcoming. We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your business and feedback.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: If you want a place to stay for Disneyland this is great value! Great rooms, a nice pool, and breakfast in the morning. The park being across the street was convenient for kid napping schedules and when it got to hot, we just ran to the pool.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.    We value your feedback and business.  Our location makes it easy to come back and rest for the night activities.

Summary: I love this place. The staff was amazing. Quick breakfast, so we wasted no time waiting for food and losing precious Disney time. Rooms were comfortable and housekeeping respects your privacy. This is my official Disneyland hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.    We value your feedback and business.  We always look forward to see all our returning and new guest.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Stayed here in with my family on one of our many trips to Disney land.  This hotel was very clean and the staff was very friendly.  We had a small issue with the tub not draining but maintenance took care of it immediately.  Breakfast was good and we enjoyed eating on the balcony that overlooks the street.  We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  So happy to hear that your enjoyed our breakfast.   We have many options for everyone.  Looking forward to see you on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Location! Location! Location! This has to be the best hotel location wise when visiting Disneyland.  We were a family of 2 adults and 2 children - 11 and 13 years on our first trip to Disneyland. We were in a Mini Suite - 2 queens and a sofa bed. This room was perfect for us.  Spacious given the 4 of us in one room along with our 4 large suitcases. Our room 272 was on the 2nd floor towards the front. The room was fairly quiet considering it‚Äôs a middle room and relatively close to the road Although quite strange having the basin and mirror area in the main room rather than the bathroom, it worked quite well as it freed up the bathroom There‚Äôs a coffee maker in the room which I used a couple of times. And a vending machine downstairs next to reception and a couple near the pool
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time for filling out the survey regarding your recent stay.  Happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay.  While reading your review I noticed that you stayed in Room 272.  You and your family stayed at our sister property down the way.

Summary: The walk to disneyland main gates made this our choice as it was our first visit staying off property. However the walk was so fast and easy. Araceli (spelling?) At the front desk was always pleasant and wonderful to deal with. Breakfast was standard but gets food in the belly! I just wish we didnt have to stay in the dining room, having a toddler who only eats a few bites at a time especially early made it take super long for breakfast or having to buy something in the park early. Would have like to taken her banana and muffin with us when we were done however saw multiple people stopped from taking food out. Overall it was a great inexpensive option to stay offsite but super fast walk. Pool &spa were clean, only used the spa which needs to be resurfaced as it pulled/ruined our
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your feedback and business.  Our location makes it easy too nap during the day for the night time activities.

Summary Heading: Loved staying here. So close to Disneyland. The Hotel staff were lovely. Breakfast nice. Enjoyable stay.
Summary: Walking distance to the main Entry to Disneyland. Staff lovely very helpful. Breakfast nice. Overall I could not fault this Hotel. Nice clean Modern Rooms. Easy accessible to Restaurants near buy. Would love to come back.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  So nice to hear that you had a pleasant stay.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Great Hotel, Great breakfast included and the beds are very comfortable!!! Right across the street from Disneyland. Walking distance. Kinda pricey but worth the stay and location. Could offer better deals since I stay at a Best Western all the time!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your feedback and business.  It's always nice to hear that our guests enjoyed their stay.  We look forward to seeing you on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: I was quite pleased with my stay at Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn. The room was clean, spacious and had nice bedding. I like that the window coverings are wood shutters instead of drapes. The bathroom counter was spacious enough for all my necessities. The bathroom itself was large and spotless. The only thing missing were additional hooks to hang the bath towels. The towels hang over the toilet so an additional rack or hook would have been nice. Honestly, that is my only suggestion for improvement.  We arrived quite a few hours before check in and our room was not ready. We were able to stow our bags and head to the park. Our room was ready at 3:00 as promised.  The walk to Disneyland was quick and easy. We did not come back to the room during the day but it would have been
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay at our property.  I am really glad that you liked our rooms.  We recently renovated them it are happy that our work paid off.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: This hotel is clean and close to the parks. Employees are very nice. We had a noisy broken thing in our toilet when we checked in. They had it fixed before we got back from dinner. Breakfast is ok. Fresh waffles or a pancake machine would make it better. But it works. The beds are ok, it would be nice to have a queen bed instead of a double but I am not sure the rooms are that big. Sleeping was hard we are used to a king bed.  One of my 4 year old granddaughters favorite things was the basket of apples in the lobby. She loved sneaking in and getting an apple.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your feedback and business.  Please let us know in the future regarding bed size.  We do have rooms with Queen beds as well as Kings.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Hotel is literally 5mins away from the Disney parks. Which is great for taking mid day breaks from the parks. The breakfast buffet is nice. It has so many options for everyone. Right off the freeway too which is nice when you venture off and about.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  It is always nice to hear that our guests enjoyed their stay.  We value your feedback and business.

Summary: We chose this property for the location to Disneyland and the very complete breakfast.  Hot and cold cereal, toast, fruit eggs, meat, pastries, and beverages.  After a full breakfast we're ready to hit the park without the cost of an expensive restaurant.  Like other properties in a vacation destination, there are, what I call 'garbage fees',  attached to the room rate; there is no escaping them.  This is our hotel of choice when going to Disneyland, and really is worth it, because of the breakfast!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your feedback and business.   It's always nice to hear that our guests enjoyed the breakfast.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Stayed for 5 nights in a 2 bedroom suite.  Room was clean with lots of room.  No door on separate bedroom which would have been nice. Wi-Fi worked great.  Quite noisy but it is an older motel, which has been renovated.  Very good location to Disney.  Only disappointment was they have a strict rule, no food can leave breakfast area.  We have teenagers who want to sleep in which makes things more enjoyable for us, but this meant we had tho wake them up or eat elsewhere. There is Denny's and IHOP within a very short walking distance of less than 3 minutes for evening dining if you want to avoid paying for food inside the parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent visit.  It's always nice to hear that our breakfast was appreciated.

Summary: This place is the only place to stay when visiting Disneyland! The breakfast is amazing, and the rooms are super clean and the staff are very friendly. Even though we are from Australia, we hope to stay here again when we visit in 2020!
Manager Response: Thank you for filling out the survey regarding your recent stay.  It's always a pleasure to hear that our guests enjoyed their stay.

Summary: SO close to the Disney gates! We certainly enjoyed the short walk to our hotel room after a long day in the park! :)  The service was excellent and the free breakfast was yummy! The next time we visit we will for sure stay here!

Summary: We couldn't believe how close we were to Disney property when we arrived at this hotel.   Check in was quick and painless considering we had just flown from London and battled 5pm traffic! Whilst in the breakfast room it doesn't sound like a lot of noise, it certainly did when you're below it. After 3 mornings of this I cracked and asked to move rooms for the next 2 evenings. We don't have kids and we enjoy a sleep until it's necessary to get up (park opens at 0900 whilst we were there). I understand that some don't mind these rooms though! Anyway, the hotel staff were
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay at our property.  We value your business and feedback.  I'm really sorry that your stay was compromised by noise from the breakfast room.  We are doing everything we can to minimize the inconvenience.  I am happy that you spoke to the Front Desk and they were able to accommodate you.  We look forward to your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: Hotel is right across from Disneyland and we were able to see the fireworks from the hallway in front of our room at 9:30 pm each night during our stay last week in December. Keep in mind there are 2 Best Western Plus hotel directly across from Disneyland. This one does not charge for parking, and the breakfast area is in-house on the third floor with friendly staff and warm food (eggs, sausage/ham/turkey patty, potatoes).   Our 2 double beds room on the second floor were relatively clean with the usual Best Western amenities. Our room has a connecting door to the next room. This hotel appears to have been well
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay at our property.  I am so glad that  you had a goo experience checking in.  Our front desk clerks are always ready to help our guest with any questions or purchasing of tickets.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Excellent location to Disneyland and the convention center.  Beautiful property.  All of the staff were extremely friendly and helpful.  Would highly recommend this property!  AND great free breakfast and FREE parking - hard to find that in the resort area!  Will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your business and feedback.  We look forward to you next visit to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay across the street from Disneyland
Summary: We stayed here around Thanksgiving holiday.  Since it was a last minute booking, we reserved a room with a roll-in shower as that was all that was left.  It was nice that our room on the second floor was at the front of the property.  The bad part was that this room was right under the breakfast room on the third floor.  At 6:30 am we go a wake up call with all the footsteps and chairs moving from the floor above.  It would have been ok if we were going to Disneyland in the morning but we had planned on sleeping in.  Not that morning.  Have to remember for next time.  Also with this type of room, we didn't have a regular closet.  Yes, there was a place to hang your clothes but it was in the bathroom and shower area.  Next time, I will try to stay in a regular room without the

Summary: First time staying here with my husband and 5 year-old. Summary Heading: Great for early risers if you can sleep through the noise.

Summary: Across the street from Disneyland and free hotel parking make this a very good choice. We parked in the hotel parking lot for 2 days and walked to the parks without having to move the car. The breakfast was standard free hotel breakfast but that was nice and easy for the morning.

Summary: My husband & I stayed here for a four night stay for our bucket list, Disneyland trip. Manager Response: Thank you for completing the survey regarding your recent stay at our property.  I am so happy that my staff made your visit to Anaheim pleasant.  I will be sure and let them know how much you appreciated their service.    We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Stayed here for 4 night during a Disneyland visit. Super good service at the front desk. I arrived late but I was given a nice room. There are 2 buildings separated by a small guest pool, with the breakfast room on the second floor in the first building on Harbor Boulevard. We requested a top floor room in the

Summary Heading: Nice hotel across from Disney enterance
Summary: We stayed one night here in November. The room was updated and clean. There was free parking which was nice. They let us keep our car there until 6pm after checking out in the morning. It also included a breakfast. The dining room was huge, no issue finding seating. They had lots of hot and cold options. Very pleased with what they had to offer. There is laundry that we used. Overall we would definitely stay there again, if the rooms were a little cheaper.

Summary: My reviews on here only seem like I complain... I have a much more rounded profile on yelp.  The room was a standard motel room. My wife and mother got quite sick from the mildewy air conditioner. Also, we called ahead before we came and were told we could leave our bags at the front while we go into Disney, but they, in fact, lied to us: you cannot leave your bags after you've paid. "Sorry, we already have your money, so screw you," was the feeing I left with.  There are too many hotels around here to waste time with the poor customer service and uncleanliness of this one.  The room itself needed updating, and possibly a change of carpets. I passed by one room that smelled like stanky weed, but other than that one time, never smelled it there again.  Other than the front desk,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey regarding your recent stay at our property. Summary: Right across the street from Disneyland. Parking was great. Staff is terrific. Room was super clean; bed and pillows are so comfortable. Like home away from home. 3rd floor request was met. Summary: This is the best hotel to stay at for a Disneyland vacation.  The staff is extremely friendly, the breakfast is perfect before a day at the park, the rooms are comfy and clean, and the location is great.  We love this hotel.

Summary Heading: great location, disney entrance across street
Summary: Hotel was great (room, location, staff, value, never had a problem getting a parking stall). Only dislike was the breakfast. Tried it our first morning and was disappointed; never went back. Not a deal breaker for me. Would return if I ever go back to Disneyland.

Summary: After a nightmare experience with a nearby Airbnb we were able to book a two room suite. The free breakfast was decent. The proximity to Disneyland (the purpose for our visit) was pretty good. You can easily catch a local shuttle or use Lyft/Uber. The rooms were clean with wall a/c units. Beds were okay. The biggest complaint was the hot water didn't took a long time to heat and didn't get very hot. However I wouldn't mind staying here again since we were spending most of our time at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for completing the survey regarding your recent stay at our property.  We were happy to have a room available for you.  We are happy you enjoyed your stay and looking forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Great breakfast buffet with newly updated rooms!
Summary: The rooms looked newly updated and were clean with all the basic amenities.  We enjoyed the selection of foods with their complimentary breakfast buffet and the motel is located only about a 3 or 4 minute walk from Disney's main entrance crosswalk.  We like to return to our room midday for a nap when the parks get crowded however and the walls were quite thin so you could frequently hear children yelling (or crying) as they walked back to their rooms or played just outside our door.  Aside from that issue it was a good visit and we would happily stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for completing your survey regarding your recent stay.  I am glad you like our rooms.  We recently remodeled them and happy to hear that our work paid off. Summary: Another wonderful stay for our family Disneyland trip. Front desk staff was amazing as usual! Summary: We chose this hotel based on its location and proximity to Disneyland. We did 4 days at the parks and the close walk was amazing. The room was quiet and the beds were comfortable. Summary: We stayed here for 5 nights to go to Disneyland.  It is across the street from Disneyland, within walking distance to the main entrance- just past the shuttle parking lot. Summary: 1st time checking out the BWPA. It did not disappoint. Short walk across the street every morning and the continental breakfast top notch. My family of 5 ate out on the terrace each morning before we headed into the park. We really enjoyed the pool and hot tub even though the pool was a bit small. It was vacant when we went to use it as most were in the park so it worked out. Room was plenty big for my family of 5 with 3 teenagers with a rollaway bed. You may want to request a larger room or suite in advance. Found out they offer these types of rooms after already booked. Then had to call every day up to the time we arrived. Everything else was perfect and thanks for a great stay. Will be back again.
Manager Response: Thank you for completing your survey regarding your recent stay at our property.  We are so happy you enjoyed it.    So happy that you were able to enjoy one of our suites.  They do book up fast, so when you do decide on your next trip give us a call.  Looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: This is the best location for Disneyland as it's right across the street, and take five minutes to get to the gates from the hotel.  The staff was excellent, and seemed to want to serve.  The breakfast was really good, and had lots of variety of hot and cold items.  The room was pretty spacious, but the A/C unit didn't work very well.  (The fan worked, but the actual A/C didn't kick in.)  The WiFI was pretty slow (~2 Mbps), but we weren't there much, anyway.
Manager Response: Thank you for completing your survey regarding your recent stay.  We value your business and feedback.  We are happy you enjoyed our breakfast and variety.  Our staff is always ready to help and make your visit enjoyable.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: I stayed here with my daughter and our friends for her Grad Trip to Cali and Disneyland. Staff were helpful and friendly. Love the layout of the room - sink and mirror outside the toilet/shower room, which is very helpful with 4 girls trying to get ready.  Comfy beds and surprisingly quiet rooms. Pool on the small side but very clean. Breakfast is way better than most - HUGE selection and always re-filled.  We loved the fact that we were a 5 min walk to the front gates. And while parking at the hotel is limited, it is free which is awesome!  Will def be back
Manager Response: Thank you for completing your survey regarding your recent visit to our property.  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our rooms.  They were recently remodeled.  It's always nice to hear that our guest enjoyed the breakfast and the options available.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: This is the perfect home base for a short Disneyland Trip. We generally visit 3 nights in Dec, and don't need a suite or pool (although they have both).  We are happy with the breakfast room they revamped/expanded several years ago, and the short walk to the parks. Free parking is also a wonderful feature. Nice to know the parking is tight, and limited. But once parked, we vernally don't need the car again during our trip. There are several connivence stores to visit if needed with more than your average milk and soda. And a target roughly one mile away.  We find this hotel clean, convenient and well priced. We just booked out next stay, making this 8 years in a row we have chosen this location for our Disneyland get away.   My husband has even had birthday cupcakes delivered
Manager Response: Thank you for completing your survey regarding your visit to our property.  We value your business and feedback.  It's always nice to hear that our guest enjoy our breakfast options and variety.    Our staff is always available to make your trip special.  We look forward to your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: I was pleasantly surprised, extremely surprised with the location.  I thought we were farther down the road, so was really happy that we were pretty much across the street.  The breakfast was great.  The hotel was very nice and super clean.  Very happy with the pool.  Very enjoyable.
Manager Response: Thank you for completing the survey regarding your recent stay at our property.  It is always heartwarming to hear that our guest enjoy our amenities.  We have recently remodeled our rooms and did some work on our pool.    Looking forward to your next trip to the area.

Summary: If you want to go to Disneyland and stay close by, this hotel may work for you. I am a business traveler and have stayed near Disneyland in the past at different brands of hotels and been content with the experience. This hotel doesn't have sufficient parking so they allow cars to park in areas that make the regular parking spots hard to get into and out of. I had a room with two beds which had a table and two chairs crammed in against one of the beds - there was absolutely no room for that. If I had needed the second bed, I would have had to put the table and chairs outside of the room! The room seemed newly remodeled, but it was not very clean. For business travel, I would not recommend this hotel unless you need to be in walking distance to Disneyland for your business

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for Disney!
Summary: Great location!  You can't find a short walk to the Disney gates.  Parking included in the price and you can stay till 6pm on checkout day.  We had a room that had been mostly renovated.  Nice and modern!  Room size was still a little small with suitcases for a family of 4 but certainly workable.  Fast wifi too.  Breakfast was slightly better than a normal continental breakfast.  Enough variety that anyone could find something to eat.  Only complaint/warning.....if you want to sleep in some morning, do not let them put you in rooms 201, 202, or 203 directly beneath the breakfast room.  You will be woken up by noise from people eating breakfast early before the parks open.  Overall: we will be back in Dec!

Summary Heading: Great Hotel so close to Disneyland.

Only a 5 minute walk to the front gates of Disneyland, very convenient to family restaurants McDonalds, Ihop, Dennys, Cold Stone Ice Creamery, The Pizza Press, Tony Romas etc ... Room was clean and serviced daily throughout our stay, clean and comfortable beds. We used the pool and spa daily which was kept clean throughout. Pool towels are available in the pool area for use. Daily Breakfast Room was good with continental & hot options. Overall, we would stay here again ... We had a great experience.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel is located 5 mins walk from the main gate of Disneyland!  This is the hotels biggest +, aside from that the hotel itself is also quite good. Breakfast was good and the room itself was clean and comfortable. The only problem with the room was the noisy AC and parking is limited when the hotel is crowded (July). said that, we arrived quite late and were still able to find a parking space. After that, if you are planing for Disneyland, you don't have to move you car :)
Manager Response: none

Summary: By far this has been our best experience with a BW Disneyland area hotel.  The breakfast is very good and has a lot of variety and the location is easy walk to the main entrances for both Disneyland and California Adventure.  The location also provides parking up to 6 p.m. on checkout day which is great for not moving car and doing a quick visit to the parks.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Outstanding location, great value for money.
Summary: We based ourselves here for a trip to Disney and southern LA as well. You cannot beat the location of the hotel. The breakfast was pretty good and the hotel provided great value for money. The rooms were clean and comfortable and had all the facilities that you need. The hotel is certainly not five star, but for a family stay at Disneyland it is perfect. The pool was great for our kids and I found the staff extremely professional and friendly.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were very pleased with our room and the breakfast. With the proximity to Disneyland, this hotel is a great value and we will definitely consider staying here again! We have made several trips to Anaheim, and this hotel was the closest we have ever been to the park gates.

Summary: Staff was great. Location of hotel was great for Disney visit.  Beds were not very comfortable and very small. Room size was pretty small.  Not the cleanest  hotel rooms but worked. Free breakfast and fridge in room.

They have hot and cold food included in the price of your stay. I've stayed many times as a group but also just my granddaughter and I and have always felt safe.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I love Best Western hotels and this is one of the first I check for on availability when booking a SoCal trip; I am an Annual Passholder.  Friendly staff, good breakfast and close to Disneyland so the end of night walk is not bad!

Summary: Staff here are always super friendly. Great breakfast on the balcony. All the flowers were in bloom and well cared for. Right across the street from Disneyland. Hotel close to everything walking distance. Super clean

So welcoming and friendly and always asked if I needed something. Breakfast was awesome. Hot and cold choices which would have been very expensive if bought at a restaurant every morning. Rooms were clean and the best part, a five minute walk to the park entrances.  Trying out the pool tomorrow, but it looked nice. Free parking. Would so recommend this place for the avid Disney goer.
