Manager Response: As much as I would like to take credit for this review it sounds like you stayed at our sister property, the Best Western Stovall's Inn.  They are the ones that have the topiary garden.  I'll share your kind words with them.

Summary: We stayed with our family for five days and thoroughly enjoyed the experience.  Having the provided breakfast early made it easy to get to Disneyland early to avoid long queues. The room  was spacious and kept  very clean and the bed was very comfortable.  The TV was full HD quality and it was good to be able to watch from the table and chairs.
Manager Response: It's nice to hear that you liked our new TVs, something we all seem to take for granted.  Thanks for letting us know.

Summary Heading: Great room, nice location for a Disneyland adventure
Summary: The room was large, with a lovely big comfortable bed. (Room 327) There is an elevator to help with luggage, and the rooms are set back from the road which reduces some street noise.  Located 5 minutes walk from the entrance to Disneyland. A light breakfast is served every day included in the cost of the room.
Manager Response: I have to admit, the top floor is the best if you want a quiet room.  Glad you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: The location couldn't be better...right across the street from the park entrance, with Denny's, ihop and Tony roma's steps away. More shops and restaurants are just a few blocks away. The hotel was clean and nice, with comfortable beds. The employees were friendly and very helpful. The pool was a bit small, but perfect for a dip to cool off between visits to Disneyland.   Only negative was we could hear footsteps from the people above us.  I would still highly recommend this hotel for families and as a great place to stay near Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for making the Anaheim Inn your home during your visit to Disneyland.

Summary: An easy 5 minute walk from the Disneyland main gates, this is a great hotel for a family on a budget. Unlike some other properties, they have complimentary breakfast, with a variety of hot, pastry, cereal, and fruit choices. You also have in room mini fridge and microwave. The only downside for me was the pillows are extra firm, and I prefer mine squishier, though I will say this is better than the paper thing pillows you see some other places. The AC is a little louder than I would prefer, but you can bring ear plugs for that. Staff was very friendly, attentive and helpful. There is a pool and hot tub, though the pool is on the smaller side, but fine for kids to splash around in. We were right next to the elevator, but I didn't notice any noise from that during the night.
Manager Response: On you next visit please ask for softer pillows.  We keep some that are not so firm for guests like you!

Summary: Hotel located right across street from Disney so we could walk, needed a wheel chair and was able to rent one at the hotel, dining available next door and free breakfast each morning, great service and very clean
Manager Response: Thank you for your view, I'm glad you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: This hotel location was perfect! Located across the street from the entrance. Has many different returaunts in walkin distance. Also has great pool/ hot tub area that my kids loved. We also got to watch the disneyland fireworks show from the balcony!
Manager Response: It's true, it's all about the location.  Thanks for staying with us.

Summary Heading: Great breakfast, right by main gate
Summary: Really great value. We chose this hotel based on its location to Disneyland. It is right across the street, no more than a 5 min walk. We were very happy. Only issue was noise from neighbors (thin walls) in the AM but that is to be expected with happy kids. Would definitely stay again for the price (Used AAA)
Manager Response: It's hard keeping excited kids quiet when they know Disneyland is across the street,  I'm sorry if they disturbed you.  Next time we'll try to get you in a non connecting room.

Summary: It was a great room and right across from Disneyland. The only issue we had was the maids had cranked the a/c full blast.  (it was not even really warm out) when we returned to our room at 3:45amnot only was it freezing and we could not get the heater to work, but there was a huge condensation puddle we discovered the next morning covering the microwave and coffee maker area.  Could have been a fire hazard.
Manager Response: My apologies for the problems with your air conditioner, I will bring it to the attention of my housekeeping staff so that it doesn't happen again, thanks for letting me know.

Summary: I've stayed at this hotel in the past and the service is always the same and right on point.  Anytime that I've needed something they have always accommodated me.  The breakfast area is nicely remodeled and has an updated feel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words, We appreciate your loyalty.

Summary Heading: Perfect for your trip to Disneyland
Summary: Super close to Disneyland ( 3 min walk ).  Good value.  Clean and comfortable rooms.  Helpful staff.  Satisfying complimentary breakfast that includes hot and cold items.  Will be staying here again for our next visit!
Manager Response: We're looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: Efficient check in. Wonderful friendly staff. Location location location to Disneyland. We think that we got real value for money. A comfortable two twin beds self catering and with all the amenities we could possibly want all close by. Buffet breakfast was included and that clinched it for us.
Manager Response: You traveled a long way to come to Disneyland, thank you for letting us be a part of it.

Summary Heading: Extremely convenient and clean motel for Disneyland visitors.
Summary: Usually stay at higher level properties but the proximity to Disneyland made this ideal and would stay there again. Could literally walk to Disneyland entrance in 5 minutes.   Pool and hot tub served the purpose, nothing fancy and breakfast was adequate to fill up with warm or cold options prior to the park.   I would only stay here if going to Disney as that is the reason why.
Manager Response: Thanks for giving us a chance.  I hope we'll see you on your next trip to the Disneyland Resort.

Summary Heading: Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn - great place
Summary: The room was clean, bed was comfortable and the breakfast was huge plus - not just continental - so that was great for us.  The free internet was a nice plus, too.  I would recommend this hotel if you want a good value and it's convenient to Disneyland - you walk across the street.
Manager Response: Thanks for staying with us!

Summary: Couldn't ask for a better location (across from Disneyland), the staff was extremely helpful and friendly. The continental breakfast offered a big variety of food, including hot plates (which were luke-warm, my only complaint). The pool was great aswell. I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Sounds like we need to watch the temperature of the hot food, thanks for bringing it to my attention. Glad to hear everything else was good.

Summary: We certainly enjoy staying at this location.  It is so close to the entrance to Disneyland and easy 5 minute walk.  Safe!!! Pleasant and helpful staff.  Clean!!!! Kids enjoy the pool after a day at the park.  Would recommend this hotel....or maybe not, will keep it our secret....not really.
Manager Response: Please don't keep us your secret, there's plenty to go around.  Thanks for finding us.

Summary: Located 1 block from main gate of Disneyland.  Room was clean, staff were courteous, parking and breakfast was included.  Pool and hot tub were clean and temperature was perfect.  What more could you ask for...a great value!
Manager Response: I have to agree, location matters!

Summary: I felt like I got great quality for the money I spent. The breakfast was great and a perfect way to start the day. The room was clean when we arrived and was kept that way by the staff.  The check in and out process was very easy and smooth.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments, glad to my staff took good care of you while you were here,

Summary: This was great being just steps away from the entrance to the park. The breakfast which was available from 630 to 10 am had a wide variety of foods to keep you full until lunch time. All of the staff was pleasant and quickly brought towels to our room upon request. We could see the fireworks from our hotel room.
Manager Response: Next time try our balcony for firework viewing, it's great!

Summary: Average place to stay.  Room was a little smelly but I didn't have to stay in the room for very much time.  Breakfast was the same every day, powedered eggs, slices of ham, soggy waffles, toast/bagels, with pretty good coffee, but if you aren't picky it is fine.
Manager Response: While we can't be everything to everybody, I'm sorry to hear that you thought we were just average.    Thank you for giving us a try.

Summary: Within walking distance to Disneyland which is the best perk! Also free breakfast which included eggs, ham/sausage, premade waffles, juices, coffees, bagels, breads, & donuts. Also free parking which is another added bonus! Our family will definitely stay here again for our next Disneyland visit.
Manager Response: Looking forward to your next visit, thanks for staying with us.

Summary: This motel has a perfect position from which to visit Disneyland with good sized rooms which are clean and well serviced. Breakfast is included with a reasonable selection of cereals, juices, ham, scrambled eggs etc.   Plates are paper as are cups and cutlery is plastic but it works to keep costs down.   We had rooms 201 & 202 and unfortunately these rooms are directly underneath the breakfast room and chairs scraping across the floor commencing at 6.00 am make for a sad wake up call.
Manager Response: I'm sorry you had such a bad wake up call.  We are working on resolving the noise issue in those rooms.  If you plan to return give me a call and I'll reserve your rooms in another area.

Summary: It was so convient to go next door to Disneyland.,  Clean however the beds were so hard that even after a hard day at disneyland they were uncomfortable.  Otherwise great.. food was good in the morning and easy to bring little ones back for naps.
Manager Response: I'm glad to hear you enjoyed your stay even though our beds didn't work for you.  Sorry they didn't work for you.

Summary: This hotel was exactly what we needed for our visit to Disneyland. It was a 5 minute walk to the park gates. We loved the breakfast that was included (scrambled eggs, waffles, ham or sausage, hard boiled eggs, yogurt and other standard breakfast items- pastries, cereal, oatmeal, etc) Eating a big breakfast at the hotel was a great way to save money. We bought food at Walmart (just a few minutes away) and stored it in the refrigerator in our room. This was also a huge money-saver. We took our own snacks and lunches into the park each day and this saved a lot of money. At the end of each day at the park we were so thankful to have a short walk back to the room and we all slept great. We also saw fireworks from our balcony 2 nights during our stay. This is the perfect basic hotel
Manager Response: On you next visit ask the front desk to open the breakfast room to watch the fireworks at Disneyland.  The balcony is not a bad viewing area and we're happy to do it.

Summary: my daughter and i really enjoyed our stay! loved the convenience in walking to Disneyland. the staff was kind and friendly. couldn't have asked for a better stay! i would stay here again in a heartbeat!
Manager Response: Thank you for bring your daughter to Disneyland and staying with us.

Summary: A+ Excellent positive service and staff. Over the top breakfast with ham, sausage, eggs, waffles, and then the usual you find at other hotels...donuts, fruit, toast. So very convenient to Disneyland and bus system...just a few steps to either place.  Excellent daily maid service.  Excellent value!
Manager Response: Thank you for the A+!  I'm so happy you enjoyed your stay.

Summary Heading: Good value, right across the street from Disneyland
Summary: For what it is, this property was great.  On their website, they even show their history, dating back to Disneyland's beginnings.  Yes, older with smaller rooms, but remodeled with all we needed.  Good breakfast (enjoyed the additional outside seating), refrigerator and microwave in room.  Parking was free, but they charge a 5 dollar resort fee.  We were able to leave our car later in the day, even after we checked out (I think they allowed until 5 or 6).  Vending machines reasonably priced so bought drinks to take to the park.
Manager Response: I hope you were able to get your adjoining rooms. It makes traveling with family so much easier and we're happy to accommodate your request if you give us a little notice.  Thanks for staying with us.

Summary: My family and I didn't stay at this particular Best Western, we stayed at Best Western Stovalls Inn. However if you are walking to and from Disneyland this one is closer in walking distance. I wanted to mention that the young man Akash, at the front desk was extremely helpful to my husband and I as we were leaving Disneyland and trying to find our way back to our Best Western hotel. He gave us directions and even drew a map for us. We are extremely grateful for his kindness. Great customer service is why we prefer staying at Best Westerns when traveling.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for you comments.  I will take great pleasure in sharing them with Akash.  I hope you stay with us on your next visit!

Summary: Clean, well maintained and quiet. Great breakfast, across street from DisneyLand. Great value. Highly recommended. Located next to Denny's for convient dining. They provide free high speed Internet. Easy checking/checkout.
Manager Response: I have to agree, you can't beat Denny's for convenient dining.  They're a good neighbor.  Hope to see you on your next visit.

Summary: This was our first time staying at this hotel (we've previously stayed at Disney properties). We had a room with two queen beds and it was clean and comfortable. There was free parking, free wi-fi and a free (full) breakfast which meant we could fuel up with eggs, toast, yogurt and fruit before a long day at the parks! It's in a great location and we felt like it was closer to walk from this hotel than to walk from Disneyland. You're across the street and about one minute down from the entrance to Disney. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks for trying a non Disney property, we look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: I think the title says it all. The room was very clean, the price was good for right across the street from Disneyland, and it includes a self serve hot breakfast. What more could you ask for at this price point? I would definitely recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words.

Summary: Disneyland is right across the street.  We stayed here in 2011.  We recently stayed here again in April 2015 - this location now serves a hot breakfast.  The wifi was good.  The pool and hottub were great.  We also brought a guest who needed a scooter and the hotel staff made arrangements for a scooter to be brought to the hotel for less than what Disney charges.  We also needed a transfer to another BW in Hollywood and the staff called around for different price transfers.
Manager Response: Thanks for coming back to stay with us.  I'm glad you liked our breakfast addition.

Summary: Hotel is old, loud, noisy, poor breakfeast, beds are hard, no bathroom fan, noisy A/C unit, a lot of exterior noise, could hear foot traffic on balcony and stairway, next to the pool, noisy.   Convenient to Disneyland and that's it!!!!!!
Manager Response: I'm sorry I wasn't aware that you were unhappy with your stay while you were here.  Had I known, I would have been happy to help you find accommodations more to you liking or at least moved you to another area in the property.

Summary: The Best Western PLUS Anaheim Inn in Anaheim, California, was a wonderful choice for our 2015 Spring Break vacation to Disneyland!  There are nice food choices close by for afternoon and evening meals, the pool is nice, and the selection for breakfast is wonderful.  It is a nice and easy walk to the gates of Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for spending your 2015 Spring Break with us.

Summary: The location of this hotel is literally a 5 minute walk into both CA Adventure and DisneyLand.  A 10 minute walk to Downtown Disney.    All was fine for our overnight trip except the following morning they literally had a guard at the dining room entrance prohibiting you from removing any food or drink.  My husband and kids went to breakfast while I finished getting ready and they could not bring me back a bagel.  A bit ridiculous for a $190/night motel-style experience.
Manager Response: We do have a policy that breakfast is to be consumed in the Breakfast Room, I'm sorry that didn't work for you. I hope that you'll consider staying with us again.

Summary: Actually,we had a pleasant stay in end March. But,it was shocked that there is a additional $75 on my credit card slip charged by this hotel, which was already three weeks later.I called the hotel and the front desk said the charge was for three damaged towels. We didn't damage anything of the room.I asked them to provide any proof or avidence. They didn't. Also,the hotel GM never return my call. They just ignore my request. I am so upset and unhappy. I contacted Best Western customer care.dept.,they did nothing at all. How come the hotel took my money without any notice!I will never stay at Best Western anymore!
Manager Response: I am very concerned by your comments.  I don't recall charging anyone for towels or getting a call from any guest.  Please give me a call here at the Anaheim Inn (714-774-1050) so that we can get this resolved as soon as possible.

Summary: This hotel was very good, breakfast option was excellent. Room was very comfortable, pillows a little hard, but a very good stay. Kind of exspensive, but right across the street from Disneyland, walking distance.
Manager Response: Sorry to hear that you had hard pillows.  I wish we would have known and been able to furnish you with softer ones, next time let us know.  Thanks for staying with us.

Summary: Great hotel; excellent location just across from Disneyland entrance.  Hotel is flanked by a Tony Roma's and a Denny's.  Just a few doors down are IHOP, Coldstone, McDonald's and an all you can eat buffet.  Hotel is nice and clean, but not luxurious.  Staff is good.  Hotel has an on-site cafe where a free breakfast is served from 6:30-10.  It has quite  a nice spread: breads, doughnuts, coffee, juice, cereal, eggs, sausage and ham (alternating days) potatoes and fruit.  Nothing gourmet, but definitely filling and fast.  Breakfast must be eaten in the cafe.  Hotel has a heated pool and spa.  I would say that my only complaint is that the windows in the rooms are single-pane and you can plainly hear people and cars outside.  We solved the problem by turning on the fan to the AC
Manager Response: I have to agree, you can't beat the location.  Thanks for staying with us.

Summary: My family and I just spent 4 nights here, was super close to main entrance, the breakfast room was great to start your day out correctly ( everything from eggs , waffles, different meat daily , dounuts, coffee juice and much more. The rooms were nice & clean, location is everything with this hotel. nice to walk out of Disneyland & only have a few steps to your hotel. the only suggestion I have is leave the pool & hot tub  open later- as after 13 hrs walking in disneyland, it would be nice to have a hot tub or swim. needs to stay open until midnight? spoke with a few others staying there and they had same comment. We will be back, thanks for everything, best western.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  I'm glad you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: We stayed in the 3 bed mini suite. It was small but served its purpose. 5 minute walk to Disneyland. Good breakfast! Children loved it and want to come back next time we come to Disneyland.  The ONLY thing I didn't really care for was their coffee. But you an get coffee from anywhere else along the way. That's just a personal opinion anyways!  I would recommend staying here if you have children/family and want a close place to walk to Disneyland and back (with free breakfast!).
Manager Response: I look forward to making your reservations your next trip to Disneyland.

Summary: Comfortable, clean and only a 5 minute walk to Disneyland. Great staff, free parking and an incredible breakfast in a spacious room with a balcony. We arrived before the 11:00 am and were able to leave our car in the parking lot and do all our check-in except get the keys. Good value. Good restaurants within walking distance. We were there to enjoy the park which we did.
Manager Response: I'm glad to hear you were able to park your car before check in so you could head over to the park.

Summary: Highly recommend this hotel.  The hotel is 5 minutes walk from Disneyland. Front desk staff are very friendly and helpful with advise on places to visit, places to eat and booking tours.  The breakfast room is exceptional.  Lots of items to choose from - hot and cold. The cleaning staff take great care cleaning your room and little surprises like a swan, fan and basket made from towels and facecloths.  The pool and area are very clean.  Thank you everyone for making our visit so wonderful.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!

Summary: The front desk staff are very friendly and helpful. The hotel is perfect for a family visiting Disney. It's clean. Comfortable beds. A TV with plenty channels for that early morning, mid-day rest. Good shower and cleaning products. Breakfast is great. A bit for everyone. Clean and constantly replenished. Right across the road to the Disney enterance. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words, I'm glad you enjoyed your stay.

Summary Heading: Best choice hotel to visit Disney Land
Summary: This hotel is very conveniently located to visit Disney Land on foot; just across Harbor Blvd in front of the hotel. We were permitted to park a car in their parking lot from the noon, although we checked in about 4 hours earlier before the normal checking time.  We got a room with 1 king and 2 queen beds for our family in the top floors, but we had no problem to carry up our luggages as they have elevators; we had a lot of luggages because we are from Japan and we have stayed in the US for more than 9 days before visiting Disney Land.  Actually, this was my 2nd time to stay in this hotel and I was very much satisfied with this hotel on both occasions.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again, we look forward to having you here on your next trip!

Summary: A tired hotel / motel - clarion hotel much better across the road. staff helpful - not best value in my opinion. needs upgrading. rooms tired - breakfast area small - small reception - small pool area.
Manager Response: It sounds like you have the Anaheim Inn confused with another Best Western located across from the Clarion, 3 blocks south of us.  Next time I hope you'll stay with us.

Summary: I stayed here for my trip to Disneyland with a friend recently and I couldn't be happier. This place was a last minute reservation with the cheapest price for the best location. And I was pleasantly surprised at how nice our room was. The hotel was literally right across from the Disney parks. After a long day in the parks, the last thing I want to worry about was my accommodations. With this hotel, it was a simple 5-minute walk across the street. We even came back mid-day to refresh. I chose a room with 2 double beds (for the same price of a King, already a great deal!). Complimentary warm breakfast was decent and plentiful, a great start of the day before hitting the parks. Fast wi-fi and parking were also included. There was a pool area but we didn't use it since we were in
Manager Response: Last minutes are the best, so glad you made them with us!

Summary: The hotel breakfast was amazing. There was real eggs, ham, potato's, yogurt, cereal, fruit, bread items, milk, juice, and coffee. The room was clean and staff was nice. It is just across the street from the entrance of Disneyland, so when your feet are tired it makes it easy. I recommend this hotel to anyone on a budget. Price was good for the 3 nights we stayed.
Manager Response: We do have a lot of options at breakfast, so glad you liked it.

Summary: This place is right across the street from Disney (I stayed @ Disney resort previously) and this place is closer better access and super clean, great friendly staff. We were able to park before check in made it super easy to get to the park instead of having to park @ Disney.
Manager Response: I'm so glad you liked the Anaheim Inn, thanks for staying with us.

Summary: Good Hotel ,great staff close to disneyland would stay there again , breakfast food not the best but we chose it because of location.  Front office staff organised shuttles for us and gave us great advice
Manager Response: I'm glad my staff was able to assist you with shuttles, we hope to see you on your next trip to the States.

Summary: My family of 4 (2 teenage sons) stayed here March 2015. The best features of this motel are the location, it is just a 5 minute walk to Disney, and the very good free breakfast every morning. The breakfast room is very clean and nice, with hot and cold breakfast choices that everyone in my family liked.  The staff is also very friendly.  The room had bit of a "stuffy"  odor, nothing horrible and got better when we turned on the A/C. It was clean and having the refrigerator and microwave was nice. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: With two teenage boys I can see where our breakfast worked for you!  Happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.

Summary Heading: Don't be tempted by the 3-bed suite
Summary: Preface: We are 2 couples in our late 20s who wanted to share a suite so we could have our own rooms yet would be able to all hang out while getting ready.  TL;DR: Suite was not worth it! Should have gotten 2 separate rooms at the Hotel Indigo for the same price, or paid slightly more for a suite at the Anaheim Desert Inn. Waste of hard earned money.  Location to Disneyland is great, but our suite was the very first room as you enter, so basically right next to the lobby. Gap under the door was ~1inch, so we heard everything going on on the main road, and all of the foot traffic on/near the primary staircase that was located directly outside of the room. We could also smell a lot of smoke from outside (this hotel allows smokers), since nearly every other guest in the hotel had
Manager Response: I am sorry to hear that our suite didn't work for you and your friends.  We have no other suite that large at the Anaheim Inn so moving you to a comparable suite would have been impossible, I'm sorry.  I do hope that you will consider staying again.

Summary: We stayed 7 nights with our three boys, ages 11, 7 and 7.  This is a Best Western so you know things are going to be good, but we were a little disappointed with some things.  We booked a room for 5 people and were given a room with 2 small double beds.  We did ask for a room with larger beds, but they said all the rooms had the same size beds. We asked for a cot and they wanted to charge us $17/night extra.  The room was small but clean, although the top of our armoire was dusty.  The bathroom was fine but lacked an exhaust fan.  As we had four people who used the pool daily, there were bathing suits perpetually hanging to dry in the bathroom.  With no fan, our room was always quite humid.  The pool/hot tub area is very small, but clean.  We stayed at the Howard Johnson a few
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay with us in March at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you on future trips to Disneyland and the Anaheim area.

Summary: Directly across the street from Disneyland, literally a five minute walk. Parking if FREE, there sister hotel has a $10.00 charge nightly for parking. Perfect FULL hot breakfast, very spacious; included, eggs, ham, sausage, potatoes etc...Hot and cold cereals, donuts and pastries. Saved us about $50.00 every morning before we headed out. Will stay here again, kids loved the heated pool. CVS was about two blocks down and had everything we needed; sunblock snacks & drinks. They also have a balcony that they open when Disneyland has fireworks we were able to sit and watch them from there.
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay with us in March at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn. I am pleased you found the amenities of the hotel helpful during your stay.  We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you on future trips to Disneyland and the Anaheim area.

Summary: Perfect location across the street from DL. I tried to bring a bagel out of the breakfast room and told it wasn't allowed.... Average rooms with a great location, nice staff. I would stay again. Decent breakfast selection daily so you save on $$. $10 parking but internet was free.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review however I believe you might have stayed at our sister property the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn and Mini Suites as we do not charge for parking at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.

Summary Heading: Great Place To Stay For Disneyland
Summary: Clean, comfortable hotel 5 minute walk to Disneyland.  Great staff, free parking and free hot breakfast. We arrived before the 3pm check in time and were able to leave our car in the parking lot and do all our check in except get the keys.  Good value.
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay with us in March at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.   I am happy to hear you found our location and staff helpful during your stay.  We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you on future trips to Disneyland and the Anaheim area.

Summary: Close to everything for me to do business.  Incredible breakfast in a spacious room and a great wifi to keep up with work. Definitely will be back to go to the park across the street. Front desk super helpful and friendly
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay with us in March at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  I am pleased you found the amenities of the hotel and our staff helpful during your stay.  We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you on future trips to Disneyland and the Anaheim area.

Summary: We decided to take another quick trip to Disneyland in February and stayed at the Anaheim Inn because the nightly rate was competitive and, of course, the location is great.  We got a room on the 2nd floor, right below the breakfast room and by the stairs.  It worked for us (we like to be first in the park in the morning and the last ones out at night), however if you want to sleep in, that is not the area to stay.  The room was small but fine for the 2 of us.  I have to add that the staff was just as friendly as the first time we stayed here.
Manager Response: Thank you for your return visit with us in February at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.   We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you on future trips to Disneyland and the Anaheim area.

Summary: Great location to stay if you are going to Disneyland. We were able to check in a little early because our room was ready. The breakfast in the morning was great...we were just a few doors away from the breakfast room. We were able to store our bags after check out until our airport shuttle arrived. We enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay with us in March at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are pleased you found our location helpful during your stay.  We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you on future trips to Disneyland and the Anaheim area.

Summary: BEST WESTERN PLUS, Anaheim Inn. We stayed here so we could be close to Disneyland and leave the car at the hotel  I use an electric wheelchair so it had to be accessible.  We had a great room on the ground floor, easy to get in and out of, the parking was right outside.  So that was easy too.  And the car was in the shade.  Breakfast is on the third floor of the first building and there is an elevator.  They has a really good hot breakfast as well as cereals, fruit, breads, juice, coffee, etc.  We sat on the balcony to eat.  Considering how close to Disneyland the hotel was it was quiet.  We were in the farthest building from the street, tho.  They did have a small pool and what looked to be a hot tub, it looked nice but we did not use it.  Bed was comfy, no problems there.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are pleased you found our location and breakfast helpful during your stay.  We truly do have a great location.  We look forward to seeing you on future trips to Disneyland and the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: The hotel was good ... No real complaints. The room was clean and comfortable. The breakfast was tasty, with a great selection.  The location is great for Disneyland (visited Downtown Disney), within walking distance of the convention center. There are restaurants nearby (visited Cold Stone Creamery, IHOP).  We didn't use the pool.
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay with us in March at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you on future trips to Disneyland and the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Clean Convenient and Comfortable Three-Night Stay
Summary: I liked this hotel because it was conveniently located to the LA Convention Center which was my destination.  The staff was cordial and accommodating.  My room was clean:  the floors, the counters the bathroom, and my bed was very comfortable & clean.   I've stayed in Best Westerns before and appreciate having the refrigerator and microwave oven at hand.  It's so convenient.  The cost was a little more than I usually like to pay, but I'll probably have a roommate next trip to split the difference.  Thanks Best Western for an overall good stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  Our location is a short walk to Disneyland but to the Convention Center as well as you mentioned.  We are pleased you enjoyed your stay while here on business and hope to see you on future trips to the Anaheim area.

Summary: This hotel was perfect for us! It was right across the street from the park, so we could easily walk with our 4 and 6 year old. The breakfast was great, and kept us going until lunch. Our room was probably in need of a minor face-lift, but it was clean and quite, what more could we ask for! We had enough space for everyone, and a mini fridge to store the next days lunch/snacks for the park. The staff were excellent, and very accommodating. We won't even look at other hotels next time we visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are pleased you enjoyed the amenities of the hotel and our location during your stay in Anaheim.  We look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.

Summary: The Best Western Anaheim always makes us feel like we are coming home when we return from the Disneyland Resort at the end of each day.  We get a great start in the morning with a variety of breakfast options and return to a very comfortable room in the evening.  The staff is friendly and helpful and responsive to any requests.  The recent renovations have made the property even better.  The location can't be beat.  Not too close to the noisy intersection going into the park yet close enough to be only a few minutes walking distance.  Situated between two restaurants makes for great dinner choices.
Manager Response: Welcome home.  We look forward to each and everyone of your visits and have for years.  Thank you for always thinking of us when you visit and during the Holidays.

Summary: This Best Western is located across the street from Disneyland and is comfortable walking distance to the Convention Center. It is situated between a Denny's and a Tony Roma's restaurant and is representative of a typical American hotel. It is not fancy, nor up-scale, but is well-maintained and the staff is first-rate. I would go so far as to say that it is a great value for the price. The shower has been modified to accommodate tall people and the shower rod bows out to allow more space that a bathtub insert usually allows. The pillows were very comfortable. The room was clean and it included a microwave and a drip coffee maker. The flat screen TV was standard, with fairly recent offerings in the 'On Demand' menu. The breakfast was included, with standard American fare. I
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn and your wonderful comments.  We are pleased you enjoyed your stay and the amenities of the hotel.  We look forward to seeing you on future Disneyland trips and stays in the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: Very nice hotel, clean inside and out,  room was spacious, bed was comfy, bathroom was big enough for two people, area was safe, ample parking, breakfast was fit for a king, nice pool area with hot tub, staff was friendly and helpful, great location.   Will stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn and your wonderful comments.  We are pleased you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: I cannot say enough great things about this hotel and stay. We arrived early in the morning, left our luggage. We returned after a 12 hour day at Disneyland to find they took all of our luggage to our room. Clean, well appointed rooms! Breakfast the next morning was great. Very friendly staff. Will certainly return in the future! Location is excellent for a Disney vacation.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  I am pleased to hear our staff was helpful during your stay and your bags were waiting for you in  your room.  We look forward to seeing you on future trips to Disneyland and the Anaheim area.  Thank  you again for your business.

Summary: Really enjoyed it here. Arrived early 10:30am. Was not able to get early check in (understandable), but they did let us use the free parking. This was helpful as we went to Disneyland right away.  Super close to Disneyland. This was convenient to be able to go back to the room and eat dinner outside the resort.  Front desk super friendly! They even called us to ask if we needed anything.  Morning breakfast was perfect variety.
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay with us in February at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  I am pleased to hear our staff was helpful during your stay and we look forward to seeing you on future trips to Anaheim.  Thank you again.

Summary: Overall our experience was great.  The beds were very comfortable, the free hot breakfast was very good with plenty of seating.  Directly across from the entrance to the parks and only a 5 minute walk.  This was the nicest of the 3 motels I stayed in across from the parks and least expensive.  They made the motel experience feel more like a nice hotel stay.  Our room was updated and clean.  The bathroom was normal motel size and clean feeling.
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay in February at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are pleased you enjoyed your stay and the amenities at the property.  We hope to see you on future trips to Anaheim and thank you again.

Summary: Where to start?  All the staff were very friendly from the time we arrived to the time we left.  The rooms were clean.  The price was reasonable, especially for the location of it. The breakfast was delicious and had a good selection of hot and cold foods. Great location across from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay in February at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn and your very kind review.  We do have a great location and our staff takes care pride in the rooms and customer service.  We hope to see you again on return trips to the Anaheim and Disneyland area.

Summary: We enjoy coming to Disneyland 2 or 3 times a years.  This hotel is such a pleasure to stay at.  Close walking distance 5 min tops, clean!!!, friendly, helpful staff.  The new breakfast addition is a major bonus.  Good selection of breakfast foods, hot and cold.  This is our home away from home.
Manager Response: Thank you for always thinking of us when you come to Anaheim.  We enjoy each and everyone of our return guest.  I am pleased you are enjoying our new Breakfast Room as well, we are excited about it ourselves.  Thank you again and we look forward to see you again.

Summary: People were nice.  Pool was clean and so was the hot tub.  The room was great but the sink and toilet were backed up and needed attending so they could be used properly.  The location of the facility was great in relation to dining etc. I was greeted properly and the reservation was as I expected.
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay in February at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  I am happy to hear you found our location and pool area enjoyable during your stay and apologize for any issues you might have had with maintenance.  I will speak to my staff regarding these items.  Thank you again for your recent stay and we look forward to seeing you on future trips to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Very convenient, so glad booked this hotel.
Summary: I was in Los Angeles with a friend for the week.  Drove to Anaheim for Disneyland resort.  Arrived at Disney early Sunday morning.  Contacted hotel by phone at check-in time and was politely told no need to leave the park.  My room is available they are there 24 hrs.  Check in was a breeze.  Room was clean, a bit noisy but didn't bother us. Walked to Denny's next door for late night snack.  Next morning had breakfast provided at hotel, many selections. walked to theme park very close.  Was so thankful we were able to leave our car at hotel until 6:00 pm even though check-out time was noon.  Will definitely stay again next trip to disneyland resort.
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay in February at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are so pleased you found our location, staff and breakfast convenient for your trip to Anaheim and Disneyland.  We look forward to seeing you again on future trips and thank you again.

Summary: Great place to stay if your in town for disneyland/california adventure. It is across the street the main entrance to both parks. Very convenient. next door there is a dennys, a tony romas.  Close to everything. Friendly staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay in February at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  I am pleased to hear you found our hotel and staff helpful during your say and we look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Disneyland/Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: We cannot believe the level of service we received from all of the staff at this hotel.  They are personable, professional and caring.  The complimentary breakfast was a great start to our day and the pool and hot tub, a wonderful finish.  The proximity to Disneyland is perfect.
Manager Response: Thank your comments on the service, I will be happy to share them with my staff.

Summary: The best thing about the hotel is the Location: in front of the main gate of Disneyland (walkiing distance). Everything else is what you expect from a best western: simple but big and clean rooms.  we could park our car inside the hotel for free. Also, a good brekfast was included in the Price of the room. Very Nice experience.
Manager Response: Thanks for staying with us, I glad you enjoyed your stay.

Summary Heading: Disneyland - Hotel across the street with good breakfast and small rooms. Friendly front desk.
Summary: We spent 12 nights at this hotel. It is a good option if you are going to Disneyland and Disney Adventure parks in a very short stay. Main highlites: breakfast, proximity to the parks and friendly staff. A good breakfast included in dayly rate, serving waffles, scrambled eggs, sausage, bagel, bread, orange juice, etc, at a reasonable price. We were visiting LA with family and rented 2 rooms. The rooms are small - not too much space for people and luggage - mainly if you are in a long staying term - with a small microwave. There is a guest laundry, coin operated, with time  restrictions for use due the vicinity of other rooms. There is no safe in the room, and you are obliged to keep your valuables in boxes located at the front desk - no problems when you think in keeping your
Manager Response: I can see that some things worked for you and some things didn't, but that overall your stay was good.  Some of your concerns we could have helped with, and would have been happy to change the location of your room or checked on your air conditioner.  I do hope that you will consider staying with us on you next vacation to Disneyland.

Summary: Our family typically stays at one of the 3 Disney hotels, but this time around I wanted to stay somewhere that didn't break the bank while still being close to the park entrance.  I have to say that this Inn exceeded expectations.  Room was clean with ample space for family of 4.  Cleaning service was great, new sheets and clean room by the time we returned from our early afternoon break from the park.       I think my favorite part of our stay was the full complimentary breakfast offered every morning.  I am big breakfast person and need more than just a quick bagel in order to survive the park with the kids.  Good quality eggs, pork, potatoes, and grains, along with all the other usual breakfast options.  And it is fast which is important when trying beat the crowds to the
Manager Response: Thank you for trying us.  We can't compete with the Disney properties but we can offer a clean room,  a good hot breakfast every morning, and a short walk into the Resort.  I hope you stay with us again.

Summary: We were so impressed with the service of this hotel.  We went to Disneyland for 3 days and this hotel is right across the street.  They have added a full Breakfast with fresh scrambled eggs and a big slice of ham, plus all the other great items to start our day.  They just added the breakfast and a wonderful workout room.  The pool was warmed to just the right temperature.  It was very relaxing after a busy day.
Manager Response: Thanks for your kind words, so glad you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: This time we stayed at the BEST WESTERN PLUS ANAHEIM INN, to go to Disneyland for 3 days.  We had a Suite so had 2 beds in one room and 1 bed in the other.  It was extremely comfortable.  Since we were last there, they added a full breakfast and a workout room.  We had a nice slice of ham and scrabbled eggs every morning.  Great for our kids and us too!
Manager Response: Glad you liked our additions.

Summary: The rooms were clean and comfortable, the staff helpful and friendly.  They also have a large breakfast room with plenty of good and healthy food.   It was convenient to walk to Disneyland.I definitely would recommend this Best Western for family and friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and for recommending us to your friends.

Summary: I chose this hotel for a short business trip to convention because of price and points available.  The staff is very helpful and friendly. This hotel is across the street from Disneyland so there are lots of families and children.  However the room was very quiet, well appointed and a very good price.  There are several hotels on South Harbor Blvd so the competition has kept the price down.  If you have to be at the Convention Center  this is a very good option.  The only problem is parking, all though you are guaranteed a spot...if you drive anything much larger than a Ford Focus..it will be tight.  Again ..it was a very good price for the room. The second best item is that it is right next door to Tony Roma's Ribs restaurant  with a great bar and the usual great ribs!
Manager Response: I'm glad our location worked for your business at the Convention Center.  You are correct, Tony Roma's next door is great, all ways a good meal!  Thanks for staying with us.

Summary Heading: Free Parking and large Breakfast included!
Summary: I really enjoyed staying here. It was clean safe and they have very friendly attentive staff. Breakfast included sausage or ham (depending on the day).Everyday had scrambled and hard boiled eggs , potatoes, waffles ,bagels, english muffins ,donuts, pastries, yogurt, fruit. Juice coffee tea cereal milk. It's nice when you stay so many nights that you have lots of choices. The pool and hot tub were clean and well maintained. We did have to ask several nights in a row for more towels but they always filled it right away. The pool is open from 9am - 10:30pm. We used the hot tub every night and it really helped our feet after all the walking in the park. We reserved 4 nights but my son was exhausted and not feeling well so we remained an extra night and spent an entire day relaxing
Manager Response: Please give me a call so that I can look into the charge for the extra night.  If we told you one price and charged another, I 'd like the opportunity to correct the mistake.

Summary: This was a nice hotel. It is walking distance to Disneyland. It was clean, quiet and nice. We enjoyed the included breakfast. Parking was good, beds were comfortable, room was quiet, 4 pillow options to choose from. Clean rooms w/ air conditioner. Had a microwave and flat screen TV.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for staying with us, I glad you enjoyed your stay.

Summary Heading: So nice stayed an extra night
Summary: Normally we've only stayed at one of the Disneyland Resort hotels. This time we were going for a quick two day/night trip to Disneyland so I decided to book the Best Western Plus, we ended up staying another night. The location is great, right across the street from both parks, actually closer then resort hotels. The breakfast included is a great option, all in all it was a very nice stay.
Manager Response: I'm so glad you decided to stay with us on your last trip to Disneyland, I hope you'll continue to stay on the "other side" of the Park.

Summary Heading: Free parking Free Wifi Good People Watching Balcony for Breakfast
Summary: We stayed here of 5 nights for the NAMM Show. The hotel is situated opposite Disneyland Resort which is extremely convenient for travellers with children. Parking is a breeze. Considering other parking costing as much as $20 per entry at most Anaheim Theme Parks and convention centres, free parking and shuttle is a welcome treat. The streets are safe as the Liquor stores is on the other end of Harbor boulevard where people tend to get rowdy and pan handling could cause a slight discomfort for new visitors to the area.  Breakfast at the balcony area of the breakfast rooms was a relaxed experience as you people watch happy faces on their way to Disneyland.  Highly recommended for visitors on a conscious budget not splurging on the comfort of a 5 stars hotel stays
Manager Response: Nice to have you folks from NAMM stay with us, it's nice to know that our location work out for you.  Hope to see you next year.  Love your picture from our breakfast room!

Summary: Hotel was across the street and very close to the entrance to Disneyland and California Adventure. Breakfast in the upper level was very good and not your typical pastries and cereal. Eggs, ham, sausage, waffles, etc. Nice way to start your day before going to the park. Parking was free.  The rooms have outside entrances and we were located in the farthest building away from the park. You could hear some of the I-5 traffic and I would say the walls are a bit thin as we could hear conversations/coughing in the next room.  The convenience of being so close to Disneyland and great breakfast made our stay very enjoyable. The noise was only a factor the first night as you are so tired from playing at Disneyland, we both fell asleep pretty easily.
Manager Response: Glad to hear you had a good time at Disney and that you enjoyed our breakfast.  I hope you'll be back when you return to Anaheim.

Summary: I reviewed this place while back and thought it was excellent.  And as for location it still is.  We stayed here during the Star Wars marathon and it was very convenient to just walk across the street.  It was also nice that part of the route ran in front of the hotel so we could cheer on our runners.    Since I've been there they remodeled and now have a great free breakfast.  Eggs, ham or sausage, waffles or pancakes, bagels, pastries, juice, coffee and other items even yogurt.  We had breakfast there for 2 days and each time there weren't too many people there and the food was all hot and tasty.  They have a little TV in there too that shows Disney Jr so that kept the kids occupied while we gathered all their food.    The only reason I gave one less star is not for the
Manager Response: I'm so sorry to hear of the problems you had with your reservations.  We try to accommodate all requests but if we run out of rooms our hands are tied.  I hope you'll be back for the next Disney Marathon.

Summary: My wife and I stayed at this BW the first week of February. We stayed for six nights as part of our 30th Anniversary year celebration. We have stayed at several different hotel properties around the Disney resort in the past. I would have to rank this hotel as AVERAGE. Nothing to write home about or any big complaints. The hotel's proximity to the theme parks and the adequate hot breakfast are nice perks. The paper thin walls and connecting-room doors do allow an extraordinary amount of noise to come in from the adjacent rooms. My wife and I agree to recommend this hotel to anyone wanting to stay very close to the park entrance, having a hot breakfast, free parking and who don't mind the neighbors listening in on your conversations!
Manager Response: I'm sorry that your stay at the Anaheim Inn was just average.  I would like to say that we could have moved you to a room that wasn't connecting but all of our "king" rooms do connect, so that wouldn't have helped you.  Thank you for staying with us on your 30th anniversary, congratulations to you and your wife.

Summary: This hotel is not only steps from Disneyland, its staff and hotel are extremely wonderful. We enjoy staying here whenever in town. The rooms are always fresh and clean, and the walls seem to be well insulated considering its near Disneyland and well occupied by families. The staff has always went out of their way to accommodate your requests if possible and rooms are always clean and well appointed. Its near many restaurants and close to the main gate and I5 freeway.I have never had their breakfast as we enjoy the Ihop next door. I have at other locations and feel BW has really stepped it up!. Would absolutely recommend giving this location a try. Their very reasonably priced I feel for their location. I personally stay here and most of the time don't go to Disney, just enjoy
Manager Response: I glad you enjoyed your stay but disappointed you haven't tried our breakfast yet, maybe next time.

Summary: Every person, from my early check in until my late check out, was exceptional. Since my room wasn't ready early, they gave me a cold bottle of water and took my luggage so I could go out.  The room was recently refurbished, but from pictures, didn't look that different from the previous decor. Clean and comfortable room, and the bed was divine. I would have prefered a sink in the restroom, rather than outside the door, but I guess that's splitting hairs.  They had both a microwave and mini fridge. One of the best breakfasts I've had at a hotel!  Geez, they even had Nutella for my toast!  This will be my new "go to" hotel when I travel to Anaheim.  It's less expensive than BW Park Place Inn, which is only about 3 hotels closer to Disneyland Resort.  I don't like to walk a long
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments.  I'm so glad you enjoyed our new breakfast, complete with Nutella!

Summary: The hotel itself is pretty nice, and the free breakfast is decent.  However, they have possibly the most uncomfortable mattresses I have ever slept on.  They are so hard.  The pillows are also uncomfortably thick (and down) and they don't have any other options.  I slept horribly and will not be staying here ever again.
Manager Response: Beds and pillows are such a personal preference, I'm sorry you didn't like either. I don't know if we were given the opportunity to change the pillows during your stay but we would have been happy to that for you.  Again please accept my apologies.

Summary: Excellent place to stay.  Staff was outstanding and location is the best!  A very convenient place to stay within about 5 minutes to Disneyland Park.  Beautiful breakfast room and great breakfast choices.  Also had a really nice fitness center.   Very clean and well maintained.  Definitely will be back!
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband and I stayed at the Anaheim Inn for the first leg of our honeymoon vacation, which included a visit to Disneyland.   Our experience upon arrival was spectacular. We arrived to the hotel hours before check-in, but they allowed us to check-in early so that we could go to Disneyland and not have to worry about leaving the resort to check in at the appropriate time. We were able to pick up the keys to our room when we got back to the hotel that night. Plus, FREE parking at the hotel!  The hotel is only a five minute walk into the gates of the park, which was awesome! The location is by far the greatest perk of this hotel. They also have an awesome continental breakfast with a variety of options. You can grab a quick breakfast before heading over to Disneyland, or you can
Manager Response: I'd like to apologize for the noise level in the room you stayed in.  I am aware that there is noise that does come from the breakfast area but have never been told about the noise coming from the lobby doors.  We are working to resolve the problem.  I would like the opportunity to talk to you about your experience if you'd like to give me a call.  Thank you for your comments, I hope that you will consider staying with us again.

Summary: Excellent hotel, friendly staff, close to everything.. Housekeeping was very thorough, and room was spotless... Also, price is very reasonable.. Would definitely stay there again !! Beds were VERY comfortable, big spacious room.. Best Western is indeed the BEST !!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words we hope to see again soon.

Summary: The ONLY thing good about this place is he location. Stayed here in September, the air conditioner was horrible. We would come back to a humid room. So bad we had to leave the window open 24/7. The room wasn't getting cleaned every day and the vents we're disgusting like they've never been cleaned. The last night we returned to our hotel to find 2 black widows had crawled into our room through the ad vent and made themselves cozy right where my daughter was sleeping. When we told the front desk they called us liars and said there's no way. When I showed the manager pics she became very hostile and rude. It wasn't until I told her I was going to disputes charges and write this review did she decide to start being reasonable. We are season pass holders and will never be returning
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing me the opportunity to address your concerns and provide you with monetary compensation during your stay with us.  I can assure you that your comments were taken seriously and shared with not only our maintenance and housekeeping staff here at the hotel, but with our preventative maintenance service team at Orkin Pest Control.  Once again I'd like to express my sincere apology for a disappointing stay.

Summary Heading: Excellent value with an awesome location!
Summary: We stayed at the Best Western for 5 nights while visiting Disneyland. The best part about this hotel is the location, with a very easy and short walk into Disneyland and restaurants. The rooms were spacious and always clean, with a good sized bathroom. The complimentary breakfast was basic but it was free so can't complain! I would definitely stay here again if visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: I agree, our location is hard to beat, thank you for staying with us.

Summary Heading: You Just Can't Get Better Then This (well You Can But...)
Summary: Compared to other places in this proximity:  The Price and convenience from Disneyland is Awesome!!!   (could do without being charged for Parking but I understand)   The Breakfast bar, with limited Meat, was far better then some, Like the place that makes you go to the Buffet Across it's Parking Lot, but was horrible!!!  This place makes up for it!!!   Reserve Early cause the Rooms may be small, and double beds, but after a long day at the Parks...  A Clean Room And Bed will make you pass out!!!
Manager Response: I'm happy to hear that our clean room and breakfast worked for you.  I hope you'll be back soon.

Summary Heading: Short walk to Disneyland, has a heated pool
Summary: Stay here because it is across the street from Disneyland and has a heated pool for the kids to play in.  But, avoid this hotel if you have asthma - they use a spray all over the room which will gas you.
Manager Response: I'm sorry to hear that the air freshener we use effected you so much.  If we have been aware of that we wouldn't have used it in your room.  Please accept my sincere apololgy.

Summary: Aewsome place to stay. Staff is nice and friendly,Rooms are great.Breakfast is very delicious, Had indoor and outdoor seating. The fitness room was perfect. Just enough stuff to get a good work out in. The pool area was very nice and relaxing.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, We hope you'll be back

Summary Heading: Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn, Anaheim
Summary: Great location to Disney entrance.  Used family suite, very spacious, clean and comfortable. Breakfast was continental - good quality and help yourself, clean modern dining area.  Warm pool.  Onsite parking included.  Some noise from above due to inadequate sound proofing - however given its location you are probably getting up at a similar time to make the most of the Park across the street!  Thoroughly recommend venue as good value, great location for Disney
Manager Response: It's nice to hear you took advantage of one of our family suites,  I'm so glad you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: This hotel offers a great location, right across the street from Disneyland!  Several restaurants are also within walking distance.  I found the bed and pillows to be extremely uncomfortable, but my daughter and husband thought they were fine.
Manager Response: Beds and pillows are such a personal thing, I'm sorry they didn't work for you.  Softer pillows are available, but need to be requested.  Next time give the desk a call and we'll be happy to give them to  you.

Summary: Great hotel for multiway Disney adventure.  Clean, comfortable rooms great pool area and breakfast in the morning.  Location is really only 5 min walk to the park entrance.  We take our grand kids and they love the place too.  The property is top notch and the staff so attentive!!  We stay her 4 or 5 times a year.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty, keep bringing the grand kids to Disney!

Summary: Excellent hot breakfast, 5 minute walk to Disney entrance, clean, friendly, good price, and hot tub/pool to relax in at the end of the day.  What more could you ask for?  Loved it! We stayed the second week in January and the crowds were a dream.  I imagine if the hotel was full to capacity, the breakfast room and pool might feel crowded. Still worth it though!
Manager Response: You're lucky to have found a week when the Parks weren't too busy.  It seems that they're always busy.  Hope to see you next January if not before.

Summary: Great location outside of the Disney parks.  But here's to the bad:  washer and dryer not working (this was after a long rainy day before), spider and spider webs in shower corner, no fan in bathrooms, not upgraded rooms (outdated rooms), hot water went out second day here (after the long cold rainy day before), breakfast bland, needs more fresh fruit, linen on bed was itchy, rooms stuffy, and pool closed down earlier than 1030pm and didn't have a sign up.  We got kicked out at 1020pm.  Towels were never by pool.  We had to ask twice to get towels.  Also, with the upgraded rooms, we got the short end of the stick and didn't get an upgraded room.  My brother who was also with us had an upgraded room and I asked if we could switch and she said "we do not have any suites that are
Manager Response: I'd like to start by apologizing for a less than perfect stay.  You and your brother booked two different types of suites through Best Western Central Reservations and you are correct in saying that your brother's suite had been remodeled.  We were able to remodel 7 rooms and 2 suites in the front of the building when we added our breakfast room last year, unfortunately neither remodeled suite was the type you booked.  The other issues I do accept responsibility for and would be happy to talk to you and your other family member about them.  My sincere hope id that you give us another opportunity when you and your family return to the Anaheim area.

Summary: I loved everything about this hotel except for the doors to the adjoining rooms which could sometimes be noisy. Otherwise, our stay was excellent!. The breakfast was the best, especially for children, and the location was awesome.
Manager Response: We do have a few rooms that do not connect so next time give me a call prior to your arrival and I will see you get one of them.

Summary: Enjoyable stay at the Best Western PLUS Anaheim Inn.  Cannot not beat the closeness to Disneyland, just steps away from the front gate.    Rooms were very clean.  Included breakfast was excellent and very convenient.  Items included,  Scrambled eggs, sausage patties or ham, potatoes, waffles, toast, bagels, English muffins, donuts, pastries, cereal, milk, cream cheese, nutella, jam, peanut butter, apple juice, orange juice, coffee.  Breakfast area was very clean and always restocked, with much visitor turnover.  Kudos to the breakfast staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words, I will pass them on to our breakfast room staff.

Summary: We spent 5 nights here over NYE and had a very comfortable stay. Our room was a king suite that included a king bed in one room, and two doubles in the other. Both rooms had a large flat screen tv and the double bed room included a mini fridge and microwave.  It's definitely an older hotel that could use some updates, but the room was clean.  The included breakfast consisted of either ham or sausage, eggs, potatoes, pastries, breads, yogurt and cereals. It's definitely one of the better ones we have had in similar hotels in the immediate area.  The absolute selling points of the hotel are the proximity to Disneyland and the excellent customer service. We will definitely consider this property for our future trips.
Manager Response: Thank you for spending New Year's with us.  Hope you'll be back to ring in 2016!

Summary: The location is great and the breakfast is okay. IHOP is nearby which makes getting a quick breakfast easier. Customer service was friendly also. Rooms were big and worth the value. The hotel also has a pool. Would definitely come back to this hotel.
Manager Response: It's hard to compete with a full service restaurant like IHop, but you can't beat the price of our breakfast room.  Glad you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: We had 3 rooms, 2 of them connected making it an ideal family stay.  The rooms were very nice, staff was friendly and helpful.  Parking was a little tough being all rooms were sold out but there was still a few parking spaces available.  The breakfast layout was excellent, had a small gym available.  Best part is the location is a 5 minute walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: I so glad that you and your family had a good stay.  If you plan to return give me a call, we even have 3 rooms that connect!

Summary: Pros: The best thing about this hotel is the location. You're literally across the road from the entrance to the parks and next to the hotel is a Dennys and an iHop plus many other food options. Free parking and wifi were also very appreciated. Around the corner was an excellent Indian restaurant.   Cons: The room we got was very small and cramped. We saw the room next to us (we were staying with a group) and it was the same price but much bigger. We also didn't have access to the Disney Jnr channel or PBS kids which surprised us given most people staying here would have children.  Be aware the rooms are quite noisy and when the fireworks go off you hear it loud and clear! Also every time someone walks (or runs) past your room. The breakfast was merely adequate.  Overall,
Manager Response: You are correct, not all the rooms are the same size.  I'm sorry you felt cramped in one of the smaller ones but please know that we would have been happy to move you to another room during your stay if we had known you were uncomfortable.  I hope that you will decide to return so I can get you into a larger room.

Summary: We spent four nights, December 22-26, and enjoyed our stay. Great location, great service. Breakfast was good, plenty of options! Reasonably priced hotel, definitely stay here again About a 5 minute walk to Disney Downtown and theme parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for spending your Holidays with us.

Summary: This hotel is right in front of Disneyland.  You can have breakfast and the hotel and walk over to the park in 10 minutes.  You can even see the nightly fireworks from the park inside the hotel room windows. Awesome value.  Would definitely stay here again for Disneyland.
Manager Response: We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: The hotel was a great location from the main gate of Disneyland for when the kids needed a rest break before heading back out to the park for more fun. One problem if you have kids make sure you get the bottom floors because kids will be kids when they have a lot of energy they will run around causing thump noises on the floor and the person below will complain at 5 in the afternoon to the front desk saying you are to nosey(go figure?)
Manager Response: If we could bottle the energy of children.

Summary: This hotel is walking distance to Disneyland so we could leave mid-day to decompress, go swimming in the pool, and have dinner at Denny's (much cheaper than D-land) and return for fireworks. The breakfast is above average and in a nice big room with a balcony.
Manager Response: Thanks for your review.

Summary: This hotel is conveniently located across the Disney entrance.  Rooms are clean and the family suites are spacious. Complimentary breakfast includes eggs and other full breakfast side dishes which are great options. My only recommendation for improvement would be the comfort of the bed.
Manager Response: I'm sorry to hear you didn't like the beds.  I realize that they are personal choice, but would like to take a look at the room you stayed in to see if it needs replacement.  Please give me a call if it's convenient.

Summary Heading: Clean and Very Close to Disneyland
Summary: For a motel near Disneyland, this one is good.  It is across from the entrance to the park; perhaps a three minute walk to the entrance.  The rooms were clean and basic but a bit small.  The staff was great. Our hair dryer broke.  Within five minutes of my call, a repair person came to our room, assessed the situation and returned with a new hair dryer.   The breakfast was good enough; and there are a lot of restaurants within walking distance.
Manager Response: I glad we were able to replace the dryer so quickly.  Where would any of us be without our hairdryers?

Summary: We arrived at hotel at 1100am and our room wasn't ready as we expected. Our luggage was taken into storage and we arrived back at 1100pm exhausted and ourluggage had been put in our room. Lovely finish to the day. The staff were super helpful and the breakfast was quite good
Manager Response: Happy to hear we could be of service to you.

Summary Heading: Great location, okay place to stay.
Summary: This is in an excellent location to walk to Disneyland. We parked our car and left it there for the entire week. It has a few places to eat at within a few doors down (very convenient to the IHOP).  A few things I wasn't happy about:  I turned the AC on the first time in the room and it was very smoky. I had to call maintenance to check on it because I certainly did not want a fire started in our room.   The door to our room had gap around the door (particularly the bottom), so it let quite a bit of light and noise in.   The sounds are very loud. There were excited kids running up and down the walkway at 2am, which while I can understand the excitement, it made for a rough time getting any decent sleep (and I imagine most hotels in this area will be the same way).  The parking
Manager Response: I'm so sorry there were some things your weren't happy about during your recent stay.  It sounds like there are some things I can correct and some I can't, but would like the opportunity to talk you about them.  Hope to hear from you.

Summary: It's nothing fancy, but it's nice! The lobby was beautifully decorated for Christmas. The staff was friendly. The bathroom area had plenty of counter space and that was nice. The beds were small for sure, but we made it work with three people. The breakfast is nice and saves you a lot of money. The location is wonderful and it doesn't take long to walk over to the parks. I just wish I were still there!
Manager Response: I wish you were still here too!  Come back to see us any time.

Summary: Stayed for a few days while visiting Disneyland, which is down half a block and then right across the street. Perfect location for a visit to the parks! The front desk staff were super and let us park there our first day before we could check in. Rooms are clean and neat but could probably use some updating in the near future. The new breakfast room was great, with lots of choices (waffles, breakfast meat [sausage patties or Canadian bacon on our mornings there], scrambled eggs and breakfast potatoes, cereals, breads and rolls, hard boiled eggs, yogurt, juices and coffee or tea), and it was bright and cheery. The staff there were quick to clean and kept things looking spic-and-span and stocked well but not over-stocked, which we like. The fitness room looked nice, but we didn't
Manager Response: I glad to hear you enjoyed your stay and that you liked our newest additions.  The guest rooms will be our next project in 2016, but we hope to see you again before then.

Summary: I always stay at a Best Western while in Anaheim. It is usually the Anaheim Inn or Park Place Inn. The staff are always so nice and very helpful. The location to Disneyland is perfect.  The new breakfast area is inviting and a great place to watch the Disneyland fireworks at night.
Manager Response: What will it take to keep you here instead of the Park Place?  Just kidding, the Park Place is our sister property and we both appreciated your business!

Summary: The Best Western Anaheim Inn is directly across from the Disneyland resort and provides excellent value.  Their rooms are lovely with comfortable beds and a very helpful staff!  Now that breakfast and a gym are included the value is even more evident!
Manager Response: It's so nice to hear that you enjoyed our new addition, thank you so much.

Summary: What a super hotel. Not only is it right across the street from Disneyland (5 minute walk) but the service is the greatest.  Everyone from the front desk to housekeeping tries to make your stay the most comfortable.  They built a new breakfast room this year and what a start for the day- eggs, sausage, hashbrowns- the works to get you going in the morning. Would definitely stay again. This hotel is managed correctly and it shows.
Manager Response: Thanks for you kind words, we hope to see you back soon.

Summary: Basically, I picked this hotel because they had an option for a suite with a King-size bed and 2 Doubles.  It was nice to have the extra space even though we were not in our hotel room very much.  At first, I was worried because the room with the King bed wrapped around behind the elevators but we did not hear them - however we had the air conditioner on because of the extremely warm weather California has experienced this year.  There is one bathroom with this suite.  Overall our room was clean and I found the beds to be comfortable.  The staff graciously held our luggage for us when we checked in early.  I rated this hotel higher because of the new updates - the nice breakfast area (which was well stocked with a variety of items and friendly staff), the beautiful lobby,
Manager Response: I'm glad to hear you had time to use our fitness room.  It seems everyone takes advantage of the breakfast room but not too many have time to work out.

Summary: We only stay here when we come to Disneyland and we come once about every other month. The staff is amazing! The prices are great. The rooms are clean and nice. Great breakfast. Free parking. Best part your across the street from the entrance to the park.
Manager Response: Thanks for your loyalty, we're looking forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: The staff make you feel like you are at home and you can't beat the value of having breakfast, and a clean and comfortable room with great Internet across the street from Disneyland.  When you or the kids are tired in the middle of your day in the park you can walk to your room and take a rest, recharge, or eat and return the park ready to finish your day.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive review, I'm so glad you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 5 nights in November.  It was very close to Disneyland, which was the main reason we chose this hotel.  The breakfast area was clean and spacious and the breakfast itself was very good, eggs (scrambled or hard boiled), ham/sausage, bagels, waffles (pre-made), danishes, yougurt, cereal etc. This was great for us, since we filled up before we went to Disneyland, we then had a late lunch around 2pm.  The beds were very comfortable, but the pillows were a little on the firm side (we always take our pillows with us, so it wasn't a big deal).  The staff was friendly and called us on our first night to ensure all was OK.  My husband needed some toiletries, which the hotel provided for him and he was happy.  We did not use the pool or hot tub, although we saw
Manager Response: I'm happy to hear that the Anaheim Inn met your expectations and that you enjoyed our new breakfast room.  Thank you for staying with us.

Summary Heading: Not perfect but would give this place a try again
