Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights while visiting Disneyland. You can't beat the location. It's right across the street from the Disney entrance.  We usually stay at the BW next door.  However, I had heard this place was going to have a new breakfast room and the rates were lower, so I booked a room here instead.  Check-in was fast and friendly.  I got a room close to the front desk as I had requested.  The problem was when we stepped into the room, there was a distinct odor.  My husband, son and I joked that it smelled like someone had been eating curry in the room and it wasn't properly aired out.  I reported the smell to the front desk who sent a maintenance person over.  The maintenance man determined that the smell was from the cooling/heating unit which had just been turned on.
Manager Response: My apologies for the bad stay to your recent stay.  While I can't redo what went wrong, I am happy to hear you were relocated to another room.  I do hope that you give us another chance on your next trip to Disneyland.

Summary: This place is always clean and relatively quiet.  No view of fireworks, but easy walking distance from the park.  We‚Äôve stayed here several times w/ our daughter.  Nice pool.  Parking until 6 p.m. day of check out.
Manager Response: You can actually see the fireworks from our new breakfast room on the third floor, I'm sorry if my staff didn't make you aware that we open that room during the fireworks every night.  Next time you're here with your daughter be sure to take advantage of that.

Summary: We stayed at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn durng a recent trip to Disneyland. The staff were top notch.  The room was basic but met all our needs.  Very close to Disneyland (right across the street) with plenty of food choices within walking distance.
Manager Response: Nothing makes me happier than to hear that you liked my staff, thank you so much.

Summary: Cant beat the location if going to Disneyland.  The hotel was very clean, comfy beds, nice free breakfast saving us $70 per day over eating at IHop, and friendly people.  TV remote battery was dead and they sent someone right up to fix it.  We will stay there again on our next trip.
Manager Response: My apologies for the non working remote but I'm happy to hear they got it fixed for you.  Hope to see you on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: We had 2 rooms with 2 families. It was a great location..so close to Disneyland. Breakfast was great for being included in the cost. Pool and spa my kids swam in nightly. I also used the gym and laundry facilities. It is also next to a Denny's and a Tony Roma's. The rooms were spacious, clean and include a refrig and microwave which is great for snacks. Would stay there again!
Manager Response: It so nice to hear you were able to use our fitness room during your recent stay.  Most folks are too busy with the Parks!

Summary Heading: Fantastic Hotel VERY close to Disneyland
Summary: Rates were fantastic, breakfast was part of the fee so basically FREE.  Breakfast was VERY good (eggs, potatoes, sausage, ham in addition to many other thing's.  My kids loved the spa and heated pool which stayed open late.  Customer service was the best we have had in a long time.  We have stayed at other hotels across from Disney and this beats all of them.  Some hotels are choosing not to do breakfast which I think hurts their business.
Manager Response: I so glad we are now offering breakfast, it sounds like you enjoyed it.  Hope to see you again soon.

Summary: This hotel is situated right across the street from the entrance to Disneyland. It is also between many eateries and shops, which were very convenient. With very affordable prices, this hotel is a clear winner.  We stayed in a 2 queen bed room, and while the beds seemed unnaturally small, they were very comfortable and clean. The bathroom was large, and the two shower heads made bath time luxurious.  The hotel offered free wifi, and complimentary breakfast which was much appreciated. However, in the room that we stayed, the breakfast hall was situated directly above us. And with breakfast starting at 6am... we were woken up early every single morning.  All the staff were welcoming and friendly, and we greatly appreciate them keeping our bags after checkout (while we had a 12wait
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid comments.  It sounds like you were under or breakfast area which can be noisy in the morning, please accept my apology.  On the positive side they are the newly remodeled rooms.  When making reservations for your next trip just let us know you want to stay in a different area.

Summary: This Best Western is clean and nice.  It's not luxury, so don't expect that.  But the rooms are clean, the bathrooms have been redone and it's perfect for a trip to Disneyland.   It's only a 10 minute walk to the front gate...so easy to run back to your room in case that's needed.  I stay here very time I go to Disney and now they have added a great breakfast buffet!
Manager Response: Breakfast does make a difference, so glad you enjoy ours.

Summary: While planning our trip to Disney I was a little reluctant as to booking with a Best Western.  This hotel is located in an excellent location!  It is right across the street from the park.  Breakfast is included and served in the breakfast room on the third floor.  I requested a room on the third floor by the breakfast room.  At night all you had to do was open up your door to see the fireworks.  The breakfast was nothing to write about.  Typical breakfast buffet.  The beds and pillows were extremely comfortable.  After a long day at Disney this place was nice and didn't break the bank.  The women at the front desk were very helpful in guiding us with our other needs.
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid comments.  It's nice to hear we did not disappoint and even exceeded your expectations.  Thanks for giving us the opportunity.

Summary: We love looking forward to coming to this hotel.  It is so close to one of the happiest places on earth to spend time with family and friends and to escape the cares of the world for a few days.  It is a quick walk to the park and easy to return if needed.  The kids love to swim in the pool for a break.  The breakfast room is a great addition to this great location.  The staff is always helpful and accommodating.
Manager Response: Disneyland is truly a great place.  I'm so glad you chose to stay with us when you visit the Parks.

Summary: This hotel is a gem of a find. Great location adjacent to the Disney Parks. Clean comfortable room with friendly staff. Free parking,WiFi and breakfast really added value to this property.This will be our first choice should we visit Anahiem again.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your compliment, we look forward to seeing you again.

Summary Heading: Wonderful time across the street from Disneyland
Summary: Have stayed at the Candy Cane in the past, and loved it.  I now have a new favoritte.  Breakfast and location at Best Western is better.  Beds were comfortable, and decor very nice.  The hot breakfast was great, loved the potatoes.  Scrambled eggs and sausage was excellent.  Great way to start the morning.  Their new breakfast room is inviting.  We will be back.
Manager Response: How nice to hear that we are a new favorite.  We love stealing folks away from our neighbors!  Hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: They have no idea of what customer service is
Summary: The staff and management at the hotel were the worst that I have ever encountered.   I was told at check-in on November 9th that the pool would be closed the following day from 11am to 5pm to fix a critical issue. I figured this would be no problem as my primary purpose of the hotel was to sleep and take naps.   The next morning on the 10th as I was eating breakfast at the hotel, the manager of that area came by each table to remind us that the water for the entire building was going to be shut off. I asked her what she was talking about; telling her I was told it was just the pool that was being shut off.   I then called the front desk asking to explain what was going on. The person answering the phones said letters were left in the room explaining the work. I told her I never
Manager Response: Please accept my apology for any misinformation you received regarding the water shut off during your stay.  We had to do some emergency repairs and while there is no good time to do this, we tried to do it at a time where we thought our guests would be out for the day.  Letters were put in the rooms but it appears that we missed yours.  It ended taking less time than we had anticipated and we should have called to let you know. We clearly dropped the ball, I am so sorry.

Summary: Great place to stay.  Walking distance from Disneyland.  Great dining close to the hotel.  Easy check in and checkout and rooms were always ready upon our return.  Breakfast was more than expected.  Would stay there again !!
Manager Response: Thanks for you review, we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: After staying in a hotel in Glendale, CA that felt as if a Lysol bomb needed to go off in it, we were ecstatic the moment we walked in the door of our room at this Best Western. Our room ‚Äúfelt‚Äù and looked super clean. After planning and saving for months for a trip to California, and Disneyland in particular, it makes a big difference where you stay. Your accommodations can either add or take away from your vacation. This hotel definitely added to our experience.  Thank you Best Western! We spent three nights here and enjoyed every moment from the excitement of the parks, the easy trekking to and from Disney, and all the available restaurants and shops within walking distance. Our car remained in the lot the entire time.  Our room was on the first floor nearer to the lobby and
Manager Response: You are very welcome. We were happy to help make your trip to Disneyland memorable.

Summary Heading: Accross Street from DL entrance! + free breakfast!
Summary: this hotel is in a great location! literally accross the street from the entrance to Disneyland!. They also offer free parking for up to 1 car (which can save big $) PLUS---FREE breakfast! We even grabbed a few apples for a perfect snack inside park. This place was awesome!!! PERFECT for family Disney trip!!  CONS - Not a fan of hotel doors that are outside, as opposed to an inside hallway. But pretty sure most hotels in that area have same set up.
Manager Response: I am glad to hear that you liked our location and breakfast.  I hope you'll be back to see us.

Summary: Our home when we go to Disneyland! We go to disneyland two days a month (which is a we stay the night here ). We alway stay here. They just remodeled and add a breakfast room. Love the breakfast room and the breakfast in the morning. Then we just walk across the street we are at Disneyland. The staff have always been so friendly and helpful. We will never stay any where else. We will be back next weekend for the Avengers half marathon.
Manager Response: I'm glad you enjoy our new breakfast and appreciate the feed back.  See you at the next marathon.

Summary: This is the place to stay when you visit Disneyland.  As mentioned in other reviews, it's directly across the main entrance into Disneyland and Downtown Disney. My husband and I leave our car in the hotel parking lot and walk to the Magic Kingdom. This last time we stayed, we were able to "pre-check in" since we arrived at noon, leave our car, and spend the day at the park. We were also allowed to keep our car in the lot the next day after checking out for awhile. It was perfect!   The hotel includes complimentary breakfast in their new dining area. Unfortunately, we didn't have a chance to try it out. We decided to join our parents at a nearby restaurant. From what we saw, the breakfast looked pretty good. Next time we will save money and eat here.    Without a doubt, this is
Manager Response: My apologies for being slow with the crib, I do understand how important it is when the baby is ready to go to sleep.  We'll get it right next time.

Summary: We absolutely loved the location of this hotel. It took 5 minutes to get through the gates at Disneyland. We were able to go back and forth for naps and stuff with our kids at our hotel without losing much time. It was GREAT!  The pool was nice and warm and the bathrooms by the pool were super nice and clean. The outdoor shower was also nice.  The breakfast area was new and beautiful. You can watch the fireworks at night on the balcony off the breakfast area. They open it up. But honestly the fireworks are way better right in front of Dennys (next door). Just go downstairs and stand on the sidewalk in front of it and you have the perfect view.  The breakfast was pretty gross. The potatoes were soft and chewy. The waffles were pre-made and not good. The eggs were ok. But
Manager Response: I am sorry to hear that we didn't like up to your expectations.  While I couldn't have fixed everything you mentioned, I would have made every effort to change the things I could during your stay.  I would love the opportunity to have you as our guest on your next visit to the Disneyland Resort.

Summary: The hotel was in an excellent location. Right across the street from Disneyland.  Awesome staff! The complimentary breakfast had many options.  The room was very comfortable! Would highly recommend Best Western PLUS Anaheim Inn to friends and family. Can't wait to come back!
Manager Response: We look forward to your return.

Summary: This hotel is literally across the street from the entrance to Disneyland.  No worrying about parking - super convenient to walk back to hotel for a nap, etc.  They offer a breakfast at the hotel.  The pool and hot tub are very clean and relaxing to enjoy after a long day at the amusement parks.   The rooms are very clean, staff is very helpful, and hotel is priced right.  Great value.
Manager Response: Glad you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: This is a motel - it's not going to have the best decor and amenities. But, the staff is friendly, the free breakfast has a big selection and the rooms are clean. My nephew swam in the pool and he was perfectly happy. There are very few lodging options that are closer to Disneyland, and for that alone, it's worth the stay. One disappointing thing happened, though. I asked the woman in the lobby how I could have a cab pick me up the next morning. She said she would take care of it. The next morning, there was a man waiting for me in a SUV that was clearly not a licensed cab. Because we had to make our flight, I had to go with him. He charged $5 more than the cab ride to the hotel. I feel like it was the woman's husband and she set it up for them to make some extra money.
Manager Response: I'd like to apologize for any misunderstanding regarding your transportation to the airport.  My staff should have asked if you a private car was acceptable and told you the cost up front. The companies we use must be fully insured and licensed with the state of California just like the local cab companies.  Thank you so much for mentioning your concerns so that I can see that this doesn't happen again.  I do hope you will be back to see us in the future.

Summary: The biggest plus is the location. You cannot get nearer to the Disney parks unless you pay a lot more for a Disney hotel in the park. In addition, the rooms were spacious and comfortable and with good facilities. We liked the buffet breakfast that was provided right next door at Captain Kidds. We have previously stayed at the Fairfield inn a few doors away who have a Pizza Hut within the hotel. Thats good too.
Manager Response: While I'd love to say we had the location across from Disneyland, I believe you stayed at our sister property, the Best Western Plus Park Place Inn.  I'll pass on your kind words to them.

Summary: Wonderful hotel - very clean and comfortable.  The breakfast room is amazing.  There were quite a number of choices for breakfast.  The staff were very helpful and full of information on Disneyland and day trips to take in LA.  The hotel is a 5 minute walk from Disneyland. I plan to take my family to Disneyland next year and have already booked this wonderful hotel.
Manager Response: I look forward to seeing you and your family next year.

Summary: I have stayed at this Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn before and have waited for the Breakfast Room to be completed. I am very pleased with the service and quality of  food options. I would recommend this location to anyone going to the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive feed back on our new Breakfast Room, I'm so glad you like it.

Summary Heading: Great location and staff, but lacking in details
Summary: The location of this hotel with its incredibly close proximity to Disneyland is fantastic. The staff is also very helpful and friendly. Housekeeping does a great job turning over the rooms each day. The outside of the hotel looks great too. The free continental breakfast is plentiful and a great bonus!  However, there were a few things that just cannot be helped given the nature of the hotel. While the building seems to have been somewhat-recently been renovated, regrettably the negative little details are hard to ignore which beg the facility to be expertly renovated again. When we first opened the door to the room, we were taken aback by pretty heavy musty smell present in the room. While the beds seemed clean, the upholstered chairs in the for example room were heavily worn
Manager Response: I am sorry the Anaheim Inn did not meet you expectations.  Every effort is made to maintain the property and so I must apologize if your room was not up to our usual standards.  I do hope that your will give us another opportunity to serve you on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: This hotel was great. Clean and comfortable. We had 5 women in a 2 bedroom suite. There was plenty of room for all of us. I would highly recommend this hotel for families or a group of friends. It is right across the street from disneyland.
Manager Response: It sounds like the Girls had a good time at Disneyland.  We hope to see you all again soon!

Summary: this hotel was right across the street. easy access to the park. was actually very quiet. next to an IHOP for easy breakfast/dinner choices. pool area was clean and nice. only issues were each night on our return we had problems with our card key and needed someone to come let us in. I also think  that they should do something about allowing more than one vehicle per family park. my friend that was staying with us had to park her car 2 blocks over and pay $20 a night to park.
Manager Response: We would love to allow more than one car per room to park, but because of the size of the lot we must restrict parking to one space, to ensure that there is enough for all of our guests.  I'm sorry if this was a problem for you.

Summary: The bath backed up a few times they came to fix it right away all three times but the room was smally after that. They did not offer a new room or a discount. I did get the bill the next day and they took $28 off for inconvenience but never said a word to me about it.
Manager Response: I'd like to apologize for not offering to change your room during your stay.  I was unaware of the problem until after your checked out and wanted to acknowledge the problem by the adjustment.  I do hope you will accept my apology and stay with us again on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: This hotel is directly across from Disneyland. It has "suite" type rooms. The hotel was very clean, staff was very friendly. They let us park there early the morning we checked in so we could walk across the street to Disneyland (even though it was well before check in time). They also let us park there the day of check out well past the check out time so we could once again go to Disneyland. The breakfast was very good & so convenient especially when travelling with a family.
Manager Response: I'm happy to hear that our suite worked for you.  Glad you enjoyed your stay, thank you.

Summary: Room was clean and Staff was very friendly and professional.  The PLUS for us was that it was across the street from Disneyland.  Price was a little high.  Would recommend this hotel for cleanliness and service.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we look forward to your return.

Summary: Always enjoy our stays here...but, we stayed in room 201 this time, which is right below the breakfast area. When they started setting up, about 4:30-5:00 am, our room got very noisy from the chairs being moved around upstairs...other than that had a great time as usual!!
Manager Response: Glad you enjoyed your stay.  We are working on the three rooms below the breakfast area, we are aware that with a start time of 6 a.m. the noise is hard to avoid.  We'll get you in another area next time!

Summary: This is a very nice hotel. Last year I went, they were building their breakfast room and gym. I didn't use the gym, but I definitely had breakfast at the hotel. Nice hot food selection and other items. We would sit out on the balcony and eat, which was so wonderful. Room was very comfortable, staff was nice, lobby was beautiful,  and the hotel location right across Disney Land. They had everything I needed for my trip. Great job you guys!
Manager Response: Thank you for coming back to see the finished product.  I'm so glad you like it.

Summary: The hotel is EXTREMELY outdated, noisy, overpriced and worn out!  The parking is very limited.  The beds are uncomfortable, the shower is weak, tubs are peeling paint.  If you have any allergies, you will be miserable.  Window unit air conditioners and not a very helpful staff.  The first night there was noisy.  Around 4am, the room started vibrating from construction noise.   You DON'T want to stay at this hotel!!
Manager Response: Please accept my sincere apology for not meeting your expectations.  If I had been aware of how unhappy you were at the Anaheim Inn I would have correct any problems I could have at the time, or found you accommodations at another property close by.  If you plan to return to Anaheim, I would like the opportunity to change your opinion of the property and my staff.

Summary Heading: Comfortable, Great Breakfast & Close to Disneyland!
Summary: My sisters and I stayed here for three nights and a really great rate. As soon as we arrived the employees were very accommodating and made sure they answered all questions that I had. The breakfast was delicious and organized in their dining room which has just been remodeled. Very classy feel and the food was definitely fresh.  Plus points because it's right across the street from the parks.  And you get 10% off at Denny's!!
Manager Response: I'm glad to hear that you enjoyed our new breakfast room.  Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: Location A+, no seriously it is steps from the cross walk to the disneyland resort! We arrived in town much earlier than the check-in time but our room was ready and were allowed a very early check-in. The rooms look great! Breakfast is nicely done and the outdoor seating was so fun for the kids. The staff was so friendly with one exception. (Name spelling unsure?) Monse, was beyond friendly accommodating and a true asset to the Best Western staff!!   Why 4 stars? We stayed in room 203! It is directly under where they do breakfast prep! At 5 am every morning our entire family was rudely awakened by loud banging that lasted remainder if the morning so there was no chance of getting any rest passed 5 am for us or our young children! After a late night at the parks the last thing
Manager Response: I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with the exception of being under the Breakfast Room.  We are working on trying to resolve the noise issue starting at 6 a.m. when they start setup for breakfast, please accept my sincere apology.  Should you return to the Anaheim Inn we will be sure to put you in a different area.

Summary Heading: Excellent, unless you have young children
Summary: I love this hotel.  It's a wonderful place, the staff is great and the price is always good.  However, on this visit I had the misfortune to discover that the rail that goes along the second and third floors has a space of over 6 inches between each bar.  My 2 year old was able to stick his head through the bars and could have easily fallen from the third floor if I hadn't been standing with him.  I can't imagine how the City allows this.  Unless I can be guaranteed a first floor room, I just can't stay there until my kids are old enough to not try to stick their heads between things.  I would hate for a horrible accident to have to happen before this is fixed.  If you do not have young children, you should absolutely stay here!
Manager Response: I am so sorry to hear about your near accident.  Thank you for bringing it to my attention, I will be looking into the spacing on that rail.  Please fell free to give me a call when you are returning to Anaheim and I'll be sure to reserve a ground floor room you you.

Summary: They have recently remodeled and it looks great. We have stayed here multiple times and are very satisfied each time. You cannot beat the location. Steps away from Disneyland. I love that there is no parking fee like most the hotels near by and you can park your car until 6pm the day you check out.
Manager Response: I'm so glad you like our new look!  Thank you for your continued support.

Summary: This hotel was clean and comfortable.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  The location was very convenient and a short walk to Disneyland, California Adventure, and Disney Village.  The internet was quick.  The breakfast was nothing fancy, but good enough since it is free.  The only complaint I had was that the pillows were very firm and thick and were uncomfortable for me.  I would stay at this hotel again and would recommend it to others visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us a the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are happy you found our staff, location and free wifi helpful during your stay.  We hope to see you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: Love the Location, Location, Location Disney parks are just a short walk across the street!  Clean simple hotel.  Full breakfast is included, Also, FREE parking is a plus :) We stayed in a room with a king and two doubles, nice for a family.  We enjoyed our weekend at  Disney and spending the night at the Best Western!
Manager Response: Like you said location, location, location and boy do we have a great one.  We are pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to seeing you on your next trip to Anaheim.  Thank you for staying with us and your review.

Summary: This hotel is just across from the Disney entrance. Got to the hotel really late of our arrive night but they still had a room available for our reservation. Breakfast was nice and parking was free on the checkout day until 6pm. The air conditioning was great. Lots of restaurants are around the hotels. It was nice to come to a fresh room after a long day at disneyland. It was affordable for a family of four. We will return to this hotel for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are thrilled to hear this was your kids first time coming here and you found our hotel comfortable.  We hope you can make us a regular part of future visits.  Thank you again and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: This property is a great home base for a Disneyland trip.  We were able to park the van and not move it for four days.  The walk to the main enterance is about 10 mins.  The breakfast includes your standard continental breakfast options as well as several hot items such as scrambled eggs, waffles (would prefer the make-your-own variety but so be it), potatos and a hot meat item like ham or sausage.  We were able to eat a solid breakfast prior to going to the park.  When the weather is nice we ate on the outdoor patio.... very nice.  The hotel itself is aged but kept up well.  There was some water damage to our third floor ceiling that wasn't repaired well. The bed sheets felt a bit wierd because of blankets the hotel uses.  It's tough to explain.  The pool is heated and very
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed our location and our new Breakfast room.  We hope to see you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: Stayed here for 4 nights. Very close to Disneyland, great Breakfest very filling, and the Staff are very nice and helpful! Room was clean.  I would stay here again. I would recomend this Hotel to everyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are pleased you found our staff friendly and new Breakfast room helpful during your stay and we look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: This place is literally right across the street from Disneyland, has free parking and free breakfast. What more could you want? The military rate was attractive and the staff is very accommodating. The breakfast includes hot and cold items, fruit, yogurt, cereal, oatmeal, donuts and pastries, eggs, sausage, hash browns, coffee, juice and milk. We were there during a horrible over-100 degree heat wave and the air conditioning inside the rooms was BLISSFUL. Access to the pool was WONDERFUL. The pool is small and not for small kids unless adults are holding them (starts at 4 feet) but we enjoyed it regardless. They provide pool towels so you don't have to use your room towels. Maid service was wonderful. Can't say enough nice things about it... we increased our stay here from 2
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us a the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are happy you found our new Breakfast room, location and free parking helpful during your stay.  We hope to see you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: This hotel is very close to Disneyland.  If you love Disneyland and Disney California Adventure and enjoy the park from open to close this is a great hotel.  The breakfast includes eggs, ham and potatoes along with the regular continental breakfast items.  FREE parking included until 6pm on the day of check out This is great for the locals.  The pool is right in the parking lot so if your looking to relax at the pool you might want another location.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us a the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are happy you found our free parking, location and new Breakfast room helpful during your stay.  We hope to see you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: We made a quick trip to Disneyland. Love the convenient location, literally across the street from the main entrance. The walk is just long enough to enjoy your Best Western cup of coffee. Hotel is so clean and pretty makes you wonder why anyone would stay at the more expensive alternatives. Everything you need is here. Great for us as a couple but would be terrific for families also, pool was inviting and could see taking a break from the park with the grand kids.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us a the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are happy you found our rooms clean and our location helpful during your stay.  We hope to see you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: I wasn't sure what to expect from this hotel because it was pretty inexpensive for being so close to Disneyland but I was pleasantly surprised! It was clean, had great customer service and was VERY close to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We take great pride in our Customer Service and I am happy to hear we did not disappoint you.  We hope to see you on your next trip to Anaheim.  Thank you again.

Summary: We stayed here in 2007 and just as good or better. Very Clean, friendly staff, great location..Room was in great condition and again very clean! Parking was easy and felt secure. Beds were very comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us a the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are happy you found our Clean rooms, location and now new Breakfast room helpful during your stay.  We hope to see you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: Love this place!!!!! An now with breakfast too!!!!! Very close within a short walking distance to Disneyland, Tony Roma's and Denny's next door.  Shopping down the street.  Close to freeways for easy access.  Great staff ever so helpful and courteous.
Manager Response: "Now with breakfast too....." Thank you for staying with us and YES now with Breakfast too.  We are so pleased you enjoyed our new Breakfast room.  Thank you for your stay and we look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.

Summary: The Anaheim Inn was clean, comfortable, & had everything we needed.  The pool was refreshing & uncrowded. Hot breakfast on the terrace was a perfect way to get the day started.  I didn't want the hassle of having to catch a shuttle and this hotel was the answer.  It's a half block to the crosswalk then crossing Harbor Blvd we're at the shuttle drop off area at the esplanade between the park entrances.  There are two hotels that are closer and they're also $50 - $80 more per night. I preferred to walk the extra half block & have a few extra shopping dollars! A friendly staff & great location make the Anaheim Inn a winner in my book!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are happy to hear you  enjoyed our pool and new Breakfast Room.  We hope to see you on future trips to the Anaheim area and thank you again.

Summary Heading: Great location at a great price.
Summary: My wife and I like to stay at motels across the street from the entrance of the Disneyland Resort on S. Harbor Boulevard when we visit Disneyland (it‚Äôs really convenient and saves a lot of time and effort), and this is the first time we stayed at this motel. While there were a few very small ‚Äúnegatives‚Äù compared to the other sites where we have stayed, there are also some nice ‚Äúplusses‚Äù.   First, the ‚Äúnegatives‚Äù ‚Äì the room we had was a bit smaller and cramped to what we have had at other places and had fewer furnishings. Also, there is no on-site store for snacks, drinks, sundries etc. as some other motels do have. Another thing that was a little disappointing, but totally understandable, was that there was very little water pressure in the shower. This is due to the low-flow
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us a the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are happy you found our free parking, location and large beds helpful during your stay.  We hope to see you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: You can not beat the location of this hotel for a trip to Disneyland! It is right across the street from the park with easy access to Disneyland, California Adventure and Downtown Disney. We went to the parks in the morning, came back to the room for a nap, then headed back for the night time activities. Parking is free, but it is a tight squeeze. We had a room on the 3rd floor in the second building. It appears that the room has been remodeled, but there were a few oddities. There was a noisy room air conditioner stuck to the wall above the sink area and the microwave and coffee maker were on the counter also. An adequate free breakfast is offered on the 3rd floor above the lobby.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us a the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are happy you found our free parking and location helpful during your stay.  We hope to see you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary Heading: Great place, location to Disney and price
Summary: We stayed there Labor Day weekend to run in the Disneyland Half Marathon.  Right across the street from the park, hotel was nice and VERY clean!  The breakfast was really good, nice room to sit and eat, good food, etc.  I would definitely stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are thrilled to know you enjoyed our clean rooms and our new Breakfast Room.  We are pretty excited about that too.  We hope to see you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: Just completed the Disney Half Marathon weekend.  Excited to see the remodel of the motel and that breakfast is now provided.  A perfect place to stay.  Just a hop, skip and a jump to parks and Downtown Disney.  Will be back in January.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us a the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are happy you found our new Breakfast room, and location helpful during your stay.  We hope to see you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: We stay here every time we visit Disneyland! The beds are small but it is super close, an 8 minute walk to the entrance of the theme parks - its clean - people are friendly but slow sometimes to fixing things. But a great valuse and we had the suite so the whole family could be together!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed our staff and our rooms.  We hope to see you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: Clean room, comfy beds, nice staff, close to Disney and great price!! After the dump I had stayed the night before this place was amazing! It was on a great location off Katella where we were able to go to shopping and restaurants and right to highway.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us a the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are happy you found our beds, location and rooms helpful during your stay.  We hope to see you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: Perfect for Disneyland just across the street so could return to the room for a sleep in the afternoon before returning in the evening for parade and fireworks etc. Room was just what we needed to get your head down when tired from all the walking and had a nice surprise on checking in that breakfast was included as we had not realised this when making the booking. The room was serviced everyday during our 6 night stay with clean towels and beds made. The pool was always clean and we even enjoyed a view of the disney fireworks during our swim one evening. We were on the 2nd floor at the end of the second building and the wi fi always worked perfectly which was also a bonus when travelling with a teenager. Staff were always helpful and accommodating and would certainly recommend
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are happy you enjoyed your stay and our brand new Breakfast Room.  As you know location is everything and we sure do have a great one.  We look forward to seeing you next time you are in Anaheim.  Thank you again.

Summary: The entire staff were helpful, friendly and cheerful. One helped me with my bags, getting them to my second floor room. Checking in and out was quick and the staff were chatty, asking about my stay. The only issue I have was with the suite. There is no door separating the two bedrooms. I do not understand the reason for that. The new breakfast room is clean and comfortable. We enjoyed the Disney fireworks from the balcony. Overall, a great experience. This is my hotel of choice when visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and your review.  We are pleased you enjoyed your stay and our staff was friendly and helpful.  Just a tip when making your reservations for future stays we do have limited suites with a door and if available we can book those rooms for you.  We hope to see you on future trips to Anaheim.  Thank you again.

Summary: Great Location right across the street from Disneyland.  Clean rooms, good breakfast.  Kids loved the pool, we loved the jacuzzi.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.  We have stayed there several times.  You cannot beat the location.  If you are traveling with little ones this is a great place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay with us and your review.  I am pleased you enjoyed our pool and hot tub.  We are thankful to have repeat guest like yourself and we look forward to seeing you on future trips to Anaheim.

Summary: Right across the road from the gates of Disney land and downtown Disney.  Customer service was excellent.  Basic, clean accommodation, good breakfast included.  Best value in the disney area.  Seriously why would you pay 3 times more to stay elsewhere in the area, you only use it to sleep in.  Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are pleased to know you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to seeing you on your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Seven minute walk to the front gate of Disney. Atleast 5 places to get next to the hotel, outside of the park entrance. Breakfast is great. Staff was great. Rooms were decent sized. Didn't really hear the traffic on the street or from the parks. Highly recommend you stay at this hotel if you are visiting the Disney area.
Manager Response: Thank your for your kind review and we are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: This hotel does not charge for parking and now offers a hot full breakfast!  WE LOVE IT!  IT OFFERS A KING ROOM OR TWO DOUBLE BEDS. Free WIFI connection and a nice 40 inch flat screen TV with cable channels. three storys with great view of fireworks and a nice pool.  Two computers in the lobby for guests as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are thrilled to know you found our location, free wifi and lobby computers helpful and we look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay for Disneyland
Summary: We stayed here during our trip to Disneyland, and it was awesome!  It was right across the street from the entrance to Disneyland, it was easy to pop back and forth if we needed a break from the park, and the rooms were nice, my kids enjoyed the pool, and the breakfast was very good.  It was also nice, because we were able to keep our vehicle parked in their lot until 6:00 p.m. if we wanted to stay longer in the park than after check out time.  We were very pleased with our stay!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review and your recent stay with us.  We at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn are thrilled  to know you found our location, parking and breakfast enjoyable during your stay and we look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: My new husband and I stayed at this hotel 2 years ago when we went on vacation to Disneyland! It was perfect and met our needs, however we wished there was a continental breakfast. We booked this hotel for our honeymoon to Disneyland again because we loved the location (literally a 5 min walk or less!) and we were pleasantly surprised to see the great remodel this hotel had. Not only does it look more modern, but they added a whole breakfast area and workout room. The breakfast area is beautiful and large, with a nice patio to eat out on. The food was great as well! We were very happy with our experience here and would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone looking to stay close to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review and we are thrilled to know you enjoyed our renovations.  We look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Very Clean and close to Disneyland parks
Summary: We stayed here while visiting the Disneyland resort.  The location is great as it is practically across the street from the entrance to the parks.  The parking lot is a little cramped (there is no charge), but the room was pretty clean and the staff was very pleasant and accommodating.  The breakfast room is brand new and you can sit outside on the balcony to eat and watch everyone walk to the parks.  The swimming pool and hot tub is smaller, but towels are provided and the water and pool area was very clean.  Other than the Disneyland fireworks, the hotel was very quiet.  I would recommend an upper level room.  We'd stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review and your recent stay with us.  We at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn are happy to know you found our location and breakfast enjoyable during your stay and we look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: My family had a great stay in this hotel. Even in this busy area these folks were help and friendly. From the front desk, maintenance and room care. Every encounter was met with a smile and greeting. We accidently left our recharge cords and they mailed them to us.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are pleased you found our staff and lost & found helpful.  We look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Nice stay at the Best Western
Summary: Great place to stay if you are going to Disneyland. Great location and very clean. A very nice breakfast is available. The pool is small but very clean. Love that you can walk to Disneyland. My family has stayed here before and we will definetly return. Parking is very tight...be careful when you back up!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review and your recent stay with us.  We at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn are happy to know you found our location and breakfast enjoyable during your stay and we look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We need a place to stay for one night in Anaheim. And this is my go to hotel. Why stay at the Disney hotel when it is twice as much and same distance to the park.   Hotel is located across the street from the park. They do not charge for parking which is a plus for sure.  And their new breakfast area looks amazing. Hot and cold food.   Just a pleasure to stay at.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  As you know location is everything and we have a great one at a great price.  We hope to see you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: The Staff here are always fantastic!  They have always made us feel welcome and important. The Breakfast Room was excellent!  There was a great variety and selection.  We always stay at this hotel whenever we are in the Anaheim/DL area.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review and your recent stay with us.  We at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn are happy to know you found our staff and breakfast enjoyable during your stay and we look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: I just spent three nights and 4 days here with two young teen children and another adult. Having done the Disney hotel strip over the years I have found myself usually disappointed in the cleanliness and upkeep of the hotel. Not the case with this property. The lobby smells brand new and is updated chic and modern, I was greeted very kindly and every encounter with any of the front desk staff was courteous and professional.  Our room was located downstairs near the elevator and I was worried I would hear it moving all night, yet I never heard it once. The furnishings were all in good condition, very clean and comfortable bed and bedding. Plenty of towels provided so showering twice a day was no problem. It was nice having a fridge and microwave to feed hungry teens on demand.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us and your very kind review.  We are thrilled to know you enjoyed our renovations and we look forward to seeing you on your next trip the Anaheim area.

Summary: I was nicely surprised with this motel. Everything here was excellent, there was only one small problem that I found and that is the parking. It seems that there are not enough parking spots for this motel. I was lucky that when I checked in there was one spot left (around 5:00 PM in the afternoon. I did not move my car again until it was time to leave a few days later. Also the A/C unit is in the back of the room (its a wall unit) and they place it in front of a large cabinet so the room does not cool that much. Other than those two issues this place would get an excellent rating from us. The room is very roomy, all the people that work there are extremely friendly, the breakfast is very good, its continental plus eggs, bacon, potatoes. It is super close to the entrance of
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn and your review.  We look forward to seeing you on your next trip the Anaheim area.

Summary: I have been here several times. Every trip we plan to Disneyland we stay here. The Front Desk is very frinedly. They give a Military Discount of 10% that is helpful. Disneyland s literally a Hop, Skip and a Jump from Hotel room to front gate. The Fitness Room and Breakfast place was still being done while we were there last April. Well it is done now and looking forward to seeing it for the first time for our trip planned for Oct. We do not stay anywhere else but here whne we come to Disnelyland and we comes three times a year. Room is clean and they let us park there in the A.m. and we go back to check In in the PM and we do not have to pay for parking for move our car.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review and your recent stay with us.  We at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn are happy to know you found our Fitness Room and Breakfast Room enjoyable during your stay and we look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Great Hotel if you want to stay close to Disneyland. Pool was great and the new breakfast area. Great place for kids. Restaurants close by and all within walking distance. Renovated lobby and breakfast area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and kind review.  We are happy to know you enjoyed our renovations and location.  We look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We stayed here for 8 nights during our visit to Disneyland. The location can't get any better, about 100 steps from the maingate. Perfect if you have younger kids and need to take breaks during the day. The room was clean, quite (except for the fireworks), the staff was amazing and very friendly. The pool is clean as well as the surrounding pool area. It isn't really good for younger children or children who can't swim well as it starts out deep - around 3 feet and continues to over 7 feet. The breakfast room was brand new when we stayed and offers plenty of seating. The food was good, it is a hot breakfast so waffles, eggs, sausage, hashbrowns as well as oatmeal, toast, english muffins, donuts, yogurt, cererals, coffee, teas and juices - something for everyone. The laundry room
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review and your recent stay with us.  We at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn are happy to know you found our location, laundry, parking and breakfast enjoyable during your stay and we look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We stayed here the beginning of July for a week and it was perfect! Everyone was absolutely wonderful.  The front desk girls are as sweet as can be.  They helped with all our needs and were very accommodating.  They took the time with the customers on a more personal level,  even remembering the movie my son came in with the first night.  Everything we asked for,  they got it done right away and with a smile.  We have a young child so Disneyland will be a place we visit often and from now on,  we will be staying here!! Breakfast was great also! We want to thank each of you all for making our vacation that much better.  Your all wonderful,  keep up the great work
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review and your recent stay with us.  We at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn are happy to know you found our location, staff and breakfast enjoyable during your stay and we look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: easy walk to disney; free breakfast has protein choices to get you thru a long day of walking; quiet at night; 2 room "suite" a little snug; free parking is also a plus;  didn't go to pool (small, on parking level)
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review and your recent stay with us.  We at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn are happy to know you found our location, parking and breakfast enjoyable during your stay and we look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Must stay if you sont intend on traveling to downtown la daily...very close to dysney and good property.. Staff was courteous and very kind. Having a starbucks in the property was a plus.. Washing machine is also present for those who want to wash as they go
Manager Response: Thank you for your review however I am unsure if you stayed at our property as we do not have a Starbucks in our hotel.

Summary: This is a hotel I will definitely be returning to for future visits to Disneyland. For the peak time of year, the rates were fair and its just a five minute walk to Disneyland, California Adventure and Downtown Disney. The rooms seem to be newly renovated and I could tell that they take the time to thoroughly clean each room everyday which, when youre staying for any extended period of time, makes all the difference. The beds were really comfortable as well.     The only thing I would have liked to have seen was a fresher breakfast, maybe with healthier options but coming to the States, the standard continental breakfast is usually less than desirable. Luckily there are other options close by including a Dennys and an IHop. La Brea Bakery is another place in downtown Disney I
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are happy you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: We love staying at this Best Western
Summary: We always stay at this location.  Everyone in the lobby are so friendly and helpful. Love that they added the exercise room and breakfast area. So many choices for breakfast now. Eggs, sausage, potatoes, waffles, hot and cold cereals, donuts, Danish, toast, juices, yogurt and fruit. Housekeeping does a great job, however when we returned to our room to relax at 2:30 in the afternoon the room had not been cleaned yet. We had to sit outside so it could be cleaned. Just a 10 minute walk to Disneyland entrance. A perfect view of Disneyland fireworks right outside our door. (Room 208)  Very quiet. Did not hear a lot of noise. Would DEFINITELY stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review and your recent stay with us.  We at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn are happy to know you found our location, staff and breakfast enjoyable during your stay and we look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: This hotel was perfectly located across the street from the Disneyland resort entrances. The walk over never took longer than 5-10 minutes and was convenient enough that my husband and I would walk back and forth from the park and the hotel several times a day. The staff was accommodating and even let us park our car in the lot early at 10:00am so we could visit Disneyland and not pay for parking before we checked into the hotel later that afternoon. The room was clean, comfortable, and a good size and the pool and hot tub were nicely kept as well. You can't beat the price (we got a AAA discount) for the location and convenience! Only downside was that there is a fair amount of noise (lots of crying/screaming children), but what can you expect when staying at a hotel across the
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review and your recent stay with us.  We at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn are happy to know you found our location, pool and staff enjoyable during your stay and we look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Very pleasantly surprised with this pick. I wanted to stay as close as possible & the Inn certainly qualified. Third floor room with a close elevator was ok. The room was smaller than our neighbors - 2 adult & 3 kids felt pretty cramped. Room was very clean. The continental breakfast was pretty good - lots of choices (eggos instead of the traditional hotel batter-style waffles). Held in a good size room with plenty of seating including outdoor overlooking the tourists. Pool is pretty small. Jacuzzi was nice. Purchased as part of a Disney package. I'd stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review and your recent stay with us.  We at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn are happy to know you found our location and breakfast enjoyable during your stay and we look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: This hotel is highly recommended for travelers, especially if you are planning to go to Disneyland.  I recently stayed here on July 14-17,2014.  I stayed on a third floor room.  For a price below $150/night, this hotel is a bargain.  I highly recommend it because it is so near to the entrance of Disneyland.  It is just across the street from the Main Entrance.  It has free parking, which is a bargain in itself in this tourist area.  The high speed internet included in the hotel price, is really fast.  You can hook up all your ipad, iphone and laptop to the internet connection that they provide.  The room contains fridge, microwave and complimentary coffee and tea.  The free breakfast is a steal!  Breakfast is on the third floor above the reception area.  Breakfast includes
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review and your recent stay with us.  We at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn are happy to know you found our location, free wifi, and breakfast enjoyable during your stay and we look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Everything you need for a magical experience.
Summary: This hotel is literally just across the street from Disneyland Resort.  The walk to the gates took less than 5 minutes.  The pool wasn't huge, but big enough to provide that mid-day break to cool off and relax before heading back to the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and review.  We are thrilled to hear you found our location and pool helpful.  We hope you think of us on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: I stayed for one night when visiting Disneyland.  The location is good for that purpose--about a ten minute walk to the main entrance (including walking along the area where the buses gather). The motel itself is very ordinary, with a small pool area with little charm.  But the room was clean and had all the basic requirements.  The air conditioning system was older and noisty, but kept the room cool.  Front desk staff were helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn and we are happy to hear you found our location helpful and the rooms clean.  We look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: I stayed in the room that was disability accessible. This room was huge. Had two queen beds, very clean. I have stayed at hotels across from Disneyland for years and have NEVER seen a room as nice as this. Well worth it.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are thrilled to know you enjoyed the size of your room and we look forward to seeing you on your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: This was an awesome hotel with a GREAT location. Loved that it was so close to the entrance of the Disneyland park and we didn't need to rely on a shuttle or the Monorail. The beds were comfy and we all slept really good at night. The breakfast area is so huge and there's so many tables which makes for a very pleasant eating experience. There were so many food choices and the employees did a wonderful job keeping up with the crowd. I'd definitely stay here again on my next trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review and your recent stay with us.  We at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn are happy to know you found our location, beds and breakfast enjoyable during your stay and we look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: If its available book it, great location, great rate, friendly staff , despite overcrowded look, well that's Disneyland area. Good breakfast selection, quite rooms, clean property. Was able to checkin early, I appreciated the courtesy call I received the first evening, asking if I needed anything.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review and your recent stay with us.  We at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn are happy to know you found our location and breakfast enjoyable during your stay and we look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Closer to Disneyland's main entrance than the Disneyland Hotel
Summary: The Best Western Anaheim Inn is one of the most convenient places to stay when visiting Disneyland/California Adventure them parks.  It is literally across the street from the entrance to both parks.  The rooms were nice sized, the furnishings modern and in good condition, the beds were comfortable, the bathroom clean and well stocked.  The front office staff were very nice and had all of our preferences confirmed and in order when we arrived.  After a long drive down from San Francisco this was especially gratifying.  Parking is free and convenient.  Unfortunately when we were there, the front office area which contains the breakfast room (free continental breakfast) was undergoing renovation.  There was a temporary front office in place and the staff provided snack bags for us
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn and we are thrilled to advise you that our Breakfast Room, new Lobby and Fitness Room are completed.  We look forward to showing you our upgrades on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: This hotel was a Magical Stay for my family and I.  Not only the location of it being in front of DisneyLand, but the people and hotel made it amazing.  The breakfast area faces Disney parks, yup great view for the fireworks. My room was clean and felt just like being at home.  I have to give this BestWestern 100% quality!  I plan to return in 2 weeks and this is thye hotel I plan on staying from now on.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and hopefully we can be your home away from home.  We are thrilled you enjoyed our new Breakfast Room and we look forward to your return visits.

Summary: Just across form the front gate to Disney made the walk from this hotel shorter than the Walk through the Grand California. Add a free breakfast, free wifi, free parking and coin op-washing machines to dry swim suits before a flight all for half the price of the cheapest disney property and it's a no brainer.  The ubiquitous microwave, fridge, coffee maker, and hair dryer all there and pool is heated, the rooms clean and up to date.  There is that motel feel as the cars are parked just outside the rooms but I consider that a feature for reasons of accessibility. The floors and walls are a little thin and you can hear the other guest bumping around getting ready for Disney but it's the wake up call so can't complain. No Kid's suites but we only have the one so the two double
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we are glad you found our location, breakfast and free wifi helpful.  We look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Less than 5 minute walk to Disneyland. The staff were very friendly and helpful. A mini fridge and microwave were convenient. The bed was comfortable after a long day walking. The pool was relaxing. Due to construction, we were given a grab bag that consisted of a small bottled water, a muffin, a granola bar, and apple. The breakfast room should be ready for our next visit. Our new favorite Disney hotel.
Manager Response: The breakfast room is finished, can't wait for you to come back for breakfast!

Summary: I Love everything about this hotel and the staff. This is the only hotel we stay at when we go to Disneyland and we go once every month to every other month. Can't wait for the amazing breakfast room and new room to be finished this week.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Ecellent stay! The staff was very friendy and make our arrival and stay contable. The room was clean when we got there and everyday that we stay there. There were repairs to the front desck, but even with repairs the staff made it so easy during during our stay. Thanks!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are happy to announce the completion of the construction and we hope you will come visit us on your next trip to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary Heading: Great location to stay at when visiting Disneyland
Summary: The hotel was clean and well appointed, the bed was very comfortable, and despite the fact that the reception area was under renovations, the staff was very helpful and flexible in dealing with a less than easy environment.  Can hardly wait to see it when the renovations are done!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  I am happy to announce the completion of the construction.  We hope you will come visit us on your next trip to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary Heading: Best Western Anaheim under construction good potential
Summary: Under construction, good bones, Great staff, really friendly and helpful!! A few minor flaws related to the costruction, noise currently at 8am, sawing, drilling etc. not super loud though if you are a light sleeper be aware. The usual operations of the hotel have some adjustments, items such as rollaways are stored next to guest rooms creating some noise in the morning and mid-morning hours. The pool is nicely heated, and kept clean  with towels available there for dry off. My first two experiences with clerks in the office were extremely excellent! The checkout clerk was not even acceptable she did not even recognize I was there. With the construction (looking to  be a great set of improvements!!) The breakfast is a brown bag with a mini water bottle, muffin, granola bar and a
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  I am glad you found our pool and brown bag breakfast enjoyable.  I am happy to announce the construction is complete and would love for you to visit us on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: hotel is ok - not that bad. just if you have to interact with a night manager in your travels avoid at all cost. parking is a nightmare and they are perpetually under construction making this such a hot mess.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim.  I do apologize if we did not meet your expectations.  Staying open during construction can be a challenge and we are pleased to announce our construction is complete, it's been a long 6 months.  I hope you will come visit our property on your next trip to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: We really enjoyed are stay and every we go to Disneyland we stay at this hotel. Great service and always great!! My family and I stay at this hotel just a walk away to Disneyland. This is a great location we you have little ones. Great price and love that we don't  have to worry about parking.Also perfect location with lots of places to eat in walking distances. I really like that we are able to have more than one room connecting rooms. This is great with little ones and family members makes you feel right at home and lots of privatcy.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are happy you found our location and hotel enjoyable.  As you know staying open during construction can be a challenge so thank you.  We look forward to your next trip to Anaheim and showing you all the upgrades to the property.

Summary: Easy walk to Disneyland.  Huge renovations going on causing some irritation.  No breakfast room while renovation was happening and their "Brown Bag Breakfast" was very disappointing......Granola bar, Apple, Muffin and small bottle of water.  They pressure washed the side of the building during our stay and we were notified that it would be happening, however, they made no allowance for the thru wall air conditioners and the water sprayed in through the aircon soaking the basin area which also contained the microwave, coffee maker and all of our charging iPhones and iPads. Parking was accessed via the side of Denny's and was policed by security men, we did manage to park every day for the 5 nights we were there even though the parking lot was quite full. Right next door to
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay, I do apologize if we did not meet your expectations.  Staying open during construction can be a challenge and I do apologize again if it caused you any troubles during your stay.  We do always guarantee parking for one car per room and during the construction we did have a parking attendant to assist you.  Our construction is now over and would love for you to see our property on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Very Near to Disneyland, average rooms
Summary: Room is spacious, parking lots are ample, breakfast buffet is delicious. And walking distance to Disneyland. However, rooms' furnitures looked tired, aircon produces sound when in work and the lightings in the room are too dim.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are happy you found our hotel and location helpful and we look forward to seeing you on your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: I needed a room for a rendezvous with family in Disneyland. I'd been in San Diego for my husband's business trip and took Amtrak to Anaheim to meet up with family who were visiting Disneyland for Mother's Day. I normally stay at the Best Western Park Place Inn as it is right at the stop light on Harbor to cross over to D-land. They had no availability so offered up the Anaheim Inn. All I needed was a bed for the night so I went for it. It was perfect for what I needed. I checked in early and as I expected, my room wasn't ready. The hotel is under construction and I knew that from the get-go, so I was fine with that. Lara at the front desk made me feel so welcome, stowed my bag, offered me a key to the pool area so that I could use the restroom there before heading across the way
Manager Response: Thank you for such a glowing review.  We always try to meet and exceed the guest needs and I am happy we did during this visit.  As you know location is everything and not only are we close to Disneyland but we are close to the Amtrak Station as well.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim and if you return to the Best Western Plus Park Place we hope you at least stop in and say hi.

Summary: We love to travel for short visits within Canada and USA for a break from our work.   We can trust that Best Western Hotels whether style, Plus or Premium always offer the best of service.  Nice amenities such as swimming pools, laundry, etc. and lovely venues.   We are members of Best Western Hotels associations and look forward to many more years of travel around the country and possibly overseas using this brand.   It gives us a real feeling of confidence to arrive at the hotel.  Thank you Best Western for making our holidays relaxing and comfortable in every way.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and for being a loyal Best Western Rewards member.  We hope you stay with us again on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Only place to stay if going to Disneyland!
Summary: Yes it's under construction, and at 7:00 a.m. it's all about getting work done. But hey you gotta get up and leave for parks anyway so who cares right :)   these folks are very sweet! The price is too much, the room is too small LOL, but hey it's convenience! You are literally across the street from the main gate!!! 5 minutes to walk! So much better than worrying about buses!!!! You gotta stay here!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are happy you found our location helpful. Staying open during construction can be a challenge but well worth the outcome.  We hope you stay with us again and give us the opportunity to show you our improvements.

Summary: Great location, near so many attractions. Very nice staff and clean comfortable rooms. Always stay here when we are in the area. The new flat screen tvs are a great upgrade. Great place  to recharge and get ready for the next days activities.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are so happy you found the hotel and staff helpful and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: This is the 3rd time we have stayed at this Best Western. The hotel itself is under going some remodeling so parking is even tighter than it used to be. This is one of, if not the most affordable of the hotels across the street from Disneyland. The hotel staff has always been pleasant, and the rooms are clean and have been well maintained. The only real knock is the beds are hard, but that seems to be standard issue at most hotels like this. They could also use a little work on their wireless network, if they are going to advertise free wifi for guests. Otherwise its a nice hotel, with a good staff, that puts you right next to the park so you don't have to ride the bus or drive, without breaking the bank.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  Good news we have changed our wifi provider so on your next visit with us it will not be an issue.  We are making lots of improvements and we look forward to sharing them with you on your next trip to Anaheim.  Thank you again for your stay and review.

Summary: I read all the reviews before staying here so i was not upset by the construction. My sister and I stayed 2 nights and spent 2 days at the Disney parks -- very convenient. The room was very clean and housekeeping was great. This was during the heat wave with santa ana winds so it was wonderful how well the air conditioning unit worked. The only down side with that is that it makes a lot of noise. Since it's like white noise i didn't mind but i forgot that it turns off when it reaches the lowest temp so it turned on and off all night. You might want earplugs if you face that situation. Also heard construction equipment with the back up beeping noise early in the am. But really the place was so affordable, friendly, comfortable, and convenient that a little noise should not
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn and we are please you enjoyed your stay.  As you know location is everything and we have a perfect location.  We look forward to your next visit and showing you what all the construction was about.  Thank you again.

Summary Heading: Cross the street and you're at Disneyland.  No shuttle needed!
Summary: My adult children, my husband and I stayed in one of the three-bed-suites, which has a queen bed in a separate room (no door) and two double beds.  We had a perfect stay on the third floor right by the elevator.  The hotel must have been full, but our room was quiet.  The price was right, too.  Comfort is most important to me.  The beds were perfect and we all slept very well.  The room was adequately roomy, with a tiny bathroom, and a long sink counter, so several people could brush their teeth at once.  The room had two flat screened TVs and a microwave.  The room was very, very clean.  The "lobby" is actually in one of the hotel rooms during the construction, so checking in was a bit crowded, but the staff was very accommodating.  We arrived at about 10:30 a.m. and we were
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn and we are happy to hear you had a great stay.  Our family suites are quite roomy and give that extra little bit of space a family traveling together needs without breaking the pocket room.  Once our construction is complete we will have a full hot breakfast and a fitness room for you to enjoy.  We hope to see you again on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: We were looking forward to a Spring Break vacation stay at Disneyland.  When we arrived, the hotel was doing renovations and we had no idea this was happening.  They did not inform us in advance to let us know, so we would have the option of going to another hotel.  We had to endure the paint smell, the early morning construction time and overall inconvenience.  The hotel wasn't cheap (because it was Spring Break), and not worth the stay.  The internet was very slow and sometimes you couldn't even get on the wi-fi.  They did not offer continental breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and I do apologize your stay was not satisfactory.  We do our best to notify all guest of the construction at the time of reservation and we also have the information posted on our website.  Staying open during construction can be a challenge and I do hope you give us another shot on your next trip to Anaheim.  Thank you again.

Summary Heading: Hope rates don't go up after remodel
Summary: Excellent location, hard beds,  definately not pillowtop, ugly view of roof of hotel across from the hotel but nice staff and security patrolling the parking lot.  High room rates for no breakfast but, still great location.  7 minute walk to Disneyland and clean room.  would visit again if rates were lower.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  Being across from the street from Disneyland we are a very short walk and we are happy you found that useful.  Our rates do vary by season as do the other hotels in the area and a great time to come is January and September.  Please call the hotel directly for the best available rates.

Summary: The Best Western in Anaheim is right across the street from Disneyland and even closer to it than the Disneyland Hotels itself, that's the best thing of the hotel. The rooms were clean and it was ok for a few nights but everything was really small! The breakfast is not really good either, but it's ok to get through the morning. My advice: there are breakfast restaurants just around the corner and probably a lot better. Have a fun trip but don't have too high expectations.
