Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are happy you found our location helpful.  As you know we are almost complete with building our Breakfast Room and on your next trip to Anaheim we will have a full hot breakfast available for you.

Summary: When our family goes on trips to Disneyland, we almost always stay at the Best Western Park Place Inn (three doors down). It's as close as you can get to the parks, right at the crosswalk, without having to pay the insane bucks to stay at a Disney hotel (which, aside from the Grand Californian, probably are a farther walk).  This time around, Park Place was all booked up so we got redirected to this hotel. When making our reservations, we were told that they didn't have any rooms with two beds, but they'd provide us with a rollaway bed. We were also told that we'd have to change rooms during our time there. Not ideal, but not horrible either.   We actually ended up arriving in Anaheim earlier than originally planned and the staff was so nice and accommodating. They let us park
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn and I am so tickled you enjoyed your stay.  We do always try to make every stay memorable and satisfy the guest.  When making a reservation we always try to put notes and any request regarding bed type so everyone is comfortable.  We hope to see you again on your next trip back to Anaheim.

Summary: After spending 3 nights in San Diego we took our party north to the land of the Mouse, The anaheim inn was to be our home for the next 3 days. One of our party forgot to make reservations and at the last moment called and got a room at the hotel. the hotel  had blocked all our rooms so we could stay on the same floor, thank you for tha special treatment. Now for the down side construction continues, and the parking is limited. When I said redneck parade I ment it .we arrived in 6 one ton trucks and three suv, we need parking, all in all the mouse got fed the kids and grand kids had a ball.I would recommend the BEST WESTERN ANAHEIM INN to any one going to DISNEYLAND.
Manager Response: We love family reunions and we are happy you stayed with us.  We always try to get large families and groups blocked together and do our best to make sure your stay is enjoyable.  We look forward to your next stay.

Summary Heading: Great Place For A Family Visiting Disneyland!
Summary: This is a awesome hotel for families visiting the Disneyland park. Great value room is wonderful and is in close walking distance to park even w/ small children. Also very close to local restaurants. We stay here every year when visiting the Happiest Place On Earth! See you Next Year!!!
Manager Response: Welcome back and thank you for your kinds words.  We are lucky enough to be across from the Happiest Place on Earth and have return guest like you, looks like we're the big winners.  See you next time.

Summary: Great location for Disneyland, Room was clean and comfortable -- after all you are just there to sleep otherwise out at Park all day. The bagged breakfast was rather pathetic -- consisted of an apple, water, muffin thing of some sort (that no one likes).  But you are close enough to get breakfast at McDonalds or the opposite direction for donuts.   I think they will be having a better breakfast once the remodeling is done.  I would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are happy you found our rooms comfortable and clean. We look forward to seeing you on your next trip back to Anaheim.

Summary: It is called a BW Plus, but it is not a plus. The location is excellent across the road from the entrance to Disneyland. The majority of the rooms have 2 double beds for families, but we only needed one bed for 6 nights and couldn't get a bigger bed. The walls are thin and other guests can heard in their rooms, the shower noise transfers, and it is easy to hear excited children upstairs running around waiting to go to Disneyland. The beds were comfortable to lie on, but were too small for adults accustomed to a queen bed. I can't comment on breakfast as that section was under renovation. Being at the park all day we only slept in the room, but if we had spent more time in the room we would have considered it too small.
Manager Response: I am sorry to hear you were not satisfied with your recent stay with us.  Being we are a family hotel we do have limited rooms with just one king size bed.  If you would consider staying with us again please call the hotel direct and we will do our best to accommodate your request.  Once again I do apologize that you were less then satisfied with your stay.

Summary Heading: Value for money and great location
Summary: I've read the reviews and to be honest we weren't inconvenienced by the hotel renovations. Room was fine and clean and across the road from Disney. Parking was convenient. Plenty of good options and I'd recommend the cold stone ice cream place. And don't forget a tip and that'll get you a song!  I'd recommend this place to stay.
Manager Response: Who doesn't love ice cream.  We are pleased you found our property's location and parking helpful during your trip to Anaheim and we thank you for staying with us.  Not only are we across the street from Disneyland but we are within walking distance to several restaurants and shops.

Summary: Staff did as well as they could during refurbishment/construction. Bag breakfast was tolerable at best. The fruit was very marginal and the yogurt bar was fine. Could have had juice instead of water. Location is the best for visit to the Disney Resorts and the parking policy excellant.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are happy you found our location and parking helpful.  We are excited about our Breakfast Room opening and will be able to offer a full hot breakfast on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Nice room! Breakfast not so hot.
Summary: I stayed here with my daughter and myself. The room was big, fairly modern and clean with very comfortable beds. There is a wall mounted air conditioner above the vanity which did channel noise from the outside to the room inside very easily, heard a lot of trucks and cars idling and kept me awake in the early morning hours.  Breakfast was included but not great, it consisted of a apple, granola bar, packaged muffin and a small bottle of water ( in a brown bag ), this was due to the renovation of their breakfast area ( opening sometime this June 2014 ). There was a pool and hot tub, but the pool was rather small, hot tub was nice! Staff were great overall, kept our rooms very clean and front desk staff were very helpful. The elevator was super slow!! Excellent location to both
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are happy you found our location helpful and our rooms clean and comfortable.  We are excited about our Breakfast Room opening and look forward to offering a breakfast for the first time at this location.  We hope to see you again on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: We have stayed in three different hotels around the Disneyland property and while they have all been nice, nothing beats the proximity of this hotel!  It was so nice to walk right across the street to the park in the morning and walk right back across the street at night.  No waiting on a bus or van to pick us up when we were already exhausted from a long, fun day!  Our room was exactly what we needed.  We pushed two full sized beds together to make one giant bed, and the floor underneath the beds was spotless!  To me, this shows what a clean hotel this truly is!  We will absolutely stay here for our future visits to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are glad to hear you found our hotel and location helpful and our rooms clean.  Our Housekeeping staff takes great pride in our rooms.  We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: experience was very good. close to Disney plenty of places to eat. I recommend Mimis  cafe and thai tangerine very good.  Rooms are clean, the interner was slow, we had prloblems with the tv, but overall I would come back to this hotel.
Manager Response: Glad to hear you had a good experience with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  As you know location is everything and we indeed have a great location if you are going to Disneyland or our local shopping and restaurants.  Thank You again for your recent stay and we look forward to seeing you on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: Clean, safe, close to Disneyland/California Adventure main gate, and decent pool/hot tub... just what we were looking for. Not high end and no frills, but the hotel had the basic necessities we needed for our family trip to Disneyland and was very low cost.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are glad you found our location and property helpful.  We aim to be a clean and safe hotel for your traveling needs to Anaheim and our location is an added bonus.  Thank you again and we look forward to seeing you on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: We wanted to be close to Disneyland and we were.  I had read the reviews before our visit so my hopes werent too high, however the hotel was clean, the bed was super comfy and we were the only people ever at the pool.  Everyone else must have been at Disneyland, which was less than a 10 minute walk.  Exellent trip!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We are happy to hear you found the pool and beds enjoyable.  We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: An ideal spot just across the street from Disneyland and two blocks away from the the Anaheim Convention Center. All around the hotel are a variety of restaurants, plus you can shop and eat at Downtown Disney just minutes walking distance. Great accommodations for the value.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are pleased you found our location helpful.  As you know location is everything and we do indeed have a great location if you are going to Disneyland, the Anaheim Convention Center or enjoying the local shops and restaurants.  Thank you again for your recent stay and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Clean, friendly staff, pool clean and adequate.  Very happy with the stay.  Most convenient location to Disneyland.  Just walked right across the street.  No waiting for shuttles.  Would highly recommend this hotel for anyone. They gave us a bagged breakfast that included water, fruit, muffin and granola bar....just picked up and walked to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your staying with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are happy to hear you found the location and brown bagged breakfast helpful.  Our Housekeeping staff takes great pride in our rooms and we are pleased you were happy with them as well.  We look forward to seeing you on your next trip to Anaheim.  Thank you again.

Summary Heading: Room good... Was not aware of construction.
Summary: Room was just OK.  Mattresses are better at Best Westerns Pavillions, just a short ways away... Parking is better at Pavillions; however, it is an easy walk from Anaheim Inn to Disneyland, from Pavillions a bus or car would be suggested with small kids or any adult less than 100% fit.     Parking is a challenge, room clean, staff friendly.
Manager Response: I would like to apologize for the miscommunication on the construction.  We do advise each guest when you book your reservation and we have the information posted on your website.  Staying open during construction can be a challenge however we look forward to the outcome.  Thank you again for your stay

Summary: Highly recommended. Construction at first building facing harbor did not at all affect my experience. (We were in the second building). Each room is guaranteed one parking spot and there were ample spaces with a parking attendant on property during busy times. Thanks especially to Martha at the front desk for being so helpful. Rooms are clean and good-sized, nicely appointed. The pool was nice/adequate, heated and jacuzzi worked as well at 102 degrees. Elevators made it nice and 10 minute walk to Disney gates, just across the street. Very nice guest laundry facility too. Thank you for a lovely time. My expectations were surpassed and this is a bit of a rarity. Highly recommended.Grab and go bag (in lieu of full breakfast to come after renovation in June I think) was helpful and
Manager Response: I am so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us at the Best Western Anaheim Plus Inn.  We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: Granted it is currently under construction so the workers start before the sun comes up, I can understand that. However, to charge full rate during this time is unacceptable. Our room was located downstairs next to the maintenance room where the staff entered/exited, rolled noisy carts way too early in the AM. Bangs, pops, rattles before the sun comes up resulted in restless nights. The sound insulation between floors is horrible so insist on a top floor room if possible. The carpet is nasty and in dire need of replacement. The beds were not bad and the d√©cor was acceptable. The bathroom had a little mold and the rooms are quite small for the price. Proximity to Disneyland is the only positive. The staff however were excellent and were doing the best they could with what they
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Best Western Plus Anaheim as you know staying open during construction is a challenge. Our construction staff as well as housekeeping are not allowed to start before 8am and I do apologize if you were woken up earlier.  I am happy to hear you enjoyed the staff and housekeeping.  We hope you stay with us again on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: I do recall seeing an advisory on the website about remodeling the breakfast room, which I have since then checked and honestly believe has been altered since there to state more clearly that the hotel is actually under construction. Needless to say I was quite disappointed and frustrated when we arrived to check in.
Manager Response: I do apologize for any inconvenience the construction might have caused during your stay.  We have tried to be proactive and advise our guest via our website and other travel sites.  We also advise the guest when you make reservation thru the hotel directly.  Being that we are adding a breakfast and fitness room it is quite a bit of construction since we are building a whole new floor of the hotel.  I hope you give us another chance on your next visit to Anaheim so we can show you the upgrades we are making.  Thank you again for your recent stay.

Summary: It's a decent place, just the construction is a issue,I'm sure once it is completed it will be fine.clean,comfy and decent walking distances., can't complain to terribly much:) I think perhaps warning the guests via online or while booking would be a bit less deceiving to most, just my opinion: )
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us during Expo West.  Staying open during construction can be a struggle and we apologize for any inconvenience.  We do have the information posted on our website along with other travel sites and advise guest as they call and book their reservations.  I do apologize this information was not passed on to you thru the convention.  I hope you think of staying with us next year for the convention and see our new additions.  Thank you again.

Summary: This was the second time we have stayed at this hotel. Both times leaving disappointed. Location next to Disneyland was great. Wifi was inconsistent. Beds felt small and cramped. The in room fridge froze our food. The room was hot and stuffy.
Manager Response: I would like to apologize for not meeting your expectations on your stay with us.  We are making some upgrades to our property and we are looking into new internet providers. I hope you are willing to give us another chance to prove your last stay was not the norm at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.

Summary: We reserved two rooms for three nights at this property ‚Äì the rooms adjoined which was a plus.  Both rooms were very comfortable and clean.  We‚Äôre not fond of places which the doors open right to the parking lot (no hallway) yet we had no issues or noise - we were on the second floor.  It‚Äôs a great location to walk to-from Disneyland.  We parked the car when we arrived and called it done.  Parking is tight and there are a few spots better than others.  I might suggest keeping an eye out for a better spot and moving your car to it.  We found the better spots near the front across from the office and all the way to the rear where one can parallel park next to the adjacent property building.  You're here for a great Disneyland adventure, not necessarily a great hotel unless you
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  I am glad you found the connecting doors useful for you family and the complimentary parking for one car per room.  We hope to see you on your next trip back to Anaheim.

Summary: The place was under renovation during our stay, so we were woke up every morning with the sound of the machines and workers repairing the ceilings. The hotel is just across Disneyland, so if you are here for Disneyland vacations this is the place where you have to stay. Good price for a medium size room. Includes wifi (extremely slow) and parking. Warm pool and hot tub. Due the hotel was building their restaurant, they gave us every morning a complimentary bag with a small water, an apple, a cereal bar and a cake. It is a good place for stay, but I would appreciated if they had informed us about the renovation during the reservation process (booked through hotels.com)
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim.  Staying open during construction can be a challenge however the outcome will be worth it.  I do hope you stay with us again on your next trip to Anaheim

Summary: We stayed there 4 nights and what a mistake.. Location was ideal for Disney, the room was quite big and comfortable however we had no notice regarding the construction going on and starting before 7am everyday..though we booked 4 months ahead and were called the day before to confirm reservation. A heads up would have been nice! Breakfast was supposedly included however due to the renovation we were offered vouchers for Denny's which we were told would be charged back to our room for $9 per day per meal.. Only to realise upon check out that they were included in the room rates!! What a waste of money!! We wished they had informed us better and clearer! Also this hotel being popular with families, be prepared for crying babies and yelling kids noise which you can hear through the
Manager Response: I would first like to thank you for your past stays and apologize for the inconvenience of the construction.  Staying open during construction can be a challenge and we do try to noitfy everyone and we do have it posted on our website.  In regards to the Denny's breakfast it is a package that can only be booked online and there is a fee per person added to the room rate.  Once again I do apologize that we didn't meet your expectations.

Summary: When our original hotel reservations did not work out we decided to stay at Best Western PLUS. We are so happy that we were able to find a room for two nights. The Best Western Plus in Anaheim was also under construction; however, the management made every effort to make the parking convenient and the location to the temporary office accessible.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are excited about the new things coming our way and look forward to sharing it with you.

Summary: Great for couples with kids.  Not suggested for older  couples traveling alons.  Hoter parking is difficult to find.  Hotel was under some construction so breakfast bar was not up to standards.  No coffee at the so-called breakfast area.  Staff was a little worn out and short on answers  No disclosure on sur-chrges and so called resort taxes.  I would not stay here again unless no other options were available.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  Staying open during construction can be a struggle however we are excited to be offering breakfast at this property for the first time soon.  With our temporary lobby being small we are only able to offer in-room coffee and apologize for any incovenience.

Summary: This is an older Best Western facility with a very 60's look to the outside, but the rooms are nicely appointed and comfortable, and the location is about as good as it gets for a non-Disney hotel.  Reasonably priced rooms and pleasant staff members.  There's an elevator in each building, so you don't need to haul your luggage up the outside staircases.  The hotel's lobby and breakfast room were being renovated while we were there (looked like a pretty major project, due to be done by April 2014), so the hotel provided a bagged breakfast snack of fruit, bottled water, granola bar, and packaged muffin.  It gave us some snacks to take into the park; we used the hotel's 10 percent discount at the adjoining Denny's for a more satisfying breakfast.  Can't ask for a better location
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are happy to hear you found our rooms comfortable and the snack bags helpful.  Being across the street from the parks makes the walk over very easy and quick. We look forward to your next visit and thank you again.

Summary: This hotel has become our home away from home when visiting one of the happiest places on earth with our family.  It is within a short walking distance of the park and with all the walking anyway, nice to conserve steps along the way.  The staff are exceptional and very helpful and accomdating.  Perhaps I shouldn't recommend this hotel as I may want to keep it our secret.  :)
Manager Response: We are glad you think of us as a second home and your secret is safe with us (and the internet). We look forward to seeing you again on your next visit and thank you again for your review.

Summary: I love this hotel.  It's as close as you can possibly get without staying in Disneyland and it's just what we need.  The pool is small but nice, the rooms are comfortable and best of all, they let you park your car there until 6pm!  It makes all the difference in the world when you want to enjoy your last day at the parks.  We are Annual Pass holders and we always stay here!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for always staying with us on your trips to Anaheim.  I am happy to hear you are able to enjoy the 6pm parking on the day of your departure.  We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Thanks for the accommodation. This hotel is within walking distance to Disneyland. I would highly recommend this hotel for your next Disney adventure. I will be coming back for sure. Kind and caring staff was able to meet our need with grace and a smile.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are pleased to know you found our staff and location helpful and we look forward to your next visit to the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.

Summary: We have stayed here numerous times over the past few years to visit the Disneyland Resort.  The room is an average room.  We get the 2 double bed room.  I wish they had 2 queens, but those are not available at this property.  The staff has always been at least pleasant if not very helpful.  We have had minor issues with tub blockage and things like that, but they have normally been taken care of promptly.    The main advantage is being right across the street from Disneyland.  It is very convenient and soon the hotel will have a breakfast room as well.    This hotel is similar to most of the hotels on Harbor Boulevard across the street from Disneyland, but their rates are on the lower end in comparison.  We like the fact that the room has a fridge and microwave as we will go to
Manager Response: Thank you for always staying with us on your trips to Anaheim.  We are pleased to know you find our staff and location helpful.  As you said "location location location" is everything.  We are building a breakfast room which will only improve our hotel for you future visits.  We look forward to your next stay.  Thank you again.

Summary: Pros: Friendly staff, security guard on parking lot, maid services were great, pool was clean and towels were available poolside, quick walk to Disneyland.  Cons: Bed was too hard, pillows were so stiff that they were hard to sleep on, funky smell every time we used the water from the sink, the remote barely worked and when it did it was SLOW!!, The internet was pretty much unusable, construction started at 7 or 8AM, walls were thin.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review and we are glad to hear you found the staff and the pool helpful.  I do apologize for the slow remote and drain issues.  I do hope you give us another chance on your next stay in Anaheim.

Summary: The hotel is opposite Disneyland gate so very convenient.  At the moment the hotel has major construction (much more than mentioned on the website), so until that is complete I would not say it is a PLUS Best Western.  The room was clean and a decent size but the parking was very difficult due to the construction and no breakfast room as that is what they are building at the moment
Manager Response: Staying open during construction can be a challenge however we are excited about the changes happening here at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are looking forward to our breakfast and fitness room being open in May of this year and hope you come check them out.  Thank you again for your stay with us.

Summary: All you need for a family trip to Disneyland. Two minute walk to the front gate, couple of restaurants right by (do NOT go to Captain Kidds!). Room not fancy, but not needed. Clean rooms, comfortable beds, fridge, Internet. Lots of kids and families, so lots of running around, etc. Pool and hot tub are welcome diversions. Price is right on. Lots of parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your room and found it clean and comfortable and our location helpful. We look forward to your future stays with us.

Summary Heading: In the row of hotels for Disneyland
Summary: The hotel is under construction at this time. The staff was courteous and did as much as they could given the circumstances. Breakfast was a brown paper bag. Rooms are old but clean. The beds were comfortable and had a nice TV. It's located across from the main gate of Disneyland which makes the stay very worth while.
Manager Response: Staying open during construction can be a challenge however I'm glad to hear you found our staff and location helpful.  I hope you think of us on your next trip to Anaheim and Disneyland and see our new breakfast and fitness room coming in May of this year.  Thank you again for staying at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.

Summary Heading: A must stay if going to Disneyland.
Summary: This hotel is very nice and right across the street from Disneyland. It is a 2 min walk and very handy location.  I love this hotel, the price is good, the rooms are nice but not fancy.  I do not require fancy when going to Disneyland because our family stays at the parks all day.  I love the location because we can go back to the room if we need to and grab something or rest.
Manager Response: Glad to hear you find our location and property convenient for your family trips to Disneyland.  We look forward to the next visit and showing you our new breakfast and fitness rooms.  Thank you again for staying at the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn.

Summary: For a short trip and not planning to spend significant time at the hotel, this hotel fit the need. Our plan was to visit Disney Land for a day. Hotel was in walking distance to main entrance, and we did not need to worry about parking,even though the parking spots are tight.
Manager Response: Glad to hear you found our location and free parking convenient but I do wish we impressed you more.  We are making upgrades and changes to the property and we hope you give us another chance to "wow" you.

Summary: Not a 4-star hotel but clean, comfortable, affordable, and professional staff.  Construction in work through May 2014 makes the front desk a little cramped but staff was great and got us right to our room.  Beds were very comfortable and the room was clean. Easy access from the freeway and a 7-minute walk to Disneyland's main gate with two restaurants in route.  Plan to  stay here again in the summer.
Manager Response: Staying open during construction is a challenge but the outcome is going to be exciting.  We look forward to your visit this summer and showing you our upgrades.

Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights while visiting Disneyland.  SUCH a short walk to the parks!  The room was much bigger than expected. Very clean and the beds were super comfortable.  Even though construction was going on it didn't affect us.  Because of the construction we had only brown bag breakfasts but they were nice to have instead of getting nothing.  Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay with us and glad to hear you found our location and brown bag breakfast handy.  Our Housekeeping staff takes great pride in our rooms and we are glad you enjoyed your stay with us.  We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: Great home base to walk to Disneyland and California Adventure. Clean and comfortable. Being remodeled, but no inconvienence at all due to this. Free parking was a plus and they let you keep your car there until 6:00 p.m check out day. We've gone there twice now on our Disneyland trips and will definetly stay there on the next trip.
Manager Response: Staying open during construction is a challenge and we are glad to hear it didn't effect your stay with us.  Our breakfast room and fitness room open in May 2014 and we look forward to showing you our upgrades on your next visit.

Summary Heading: Close to the Parks, but bad internet connection
Summary: We've stayed here the past two time we've visited Disneyland Park. We love that it's right across the street, free parking, free breakfast, and free internet. Figured we would be spending the whole day in the parks and only come back to sleep so we didn't need anything fancy. The only big con would be the internet connection. We were unable to connect to their free wi-fi or if we did it would be for a minute and then we would lose it.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we are glad to hear you enjoyed our location and breakfast snack bags.  I am sorry to hear about the poor internet connection and we are currently looking into change internet providers. Hope to see you again soon

Summary: This hotel is excellent for its price range. Yes, there is ongoing construction out front that blocks the regular entrance and temporarily relocates the lobby. But that's really the end of any possible negatives.  The positives? Nice and clean room. Comfortable bed. Clean bathroom with instantly hot showers. Air conditioner unit worked well and wasn't too loud. Fridge and microwave proved very useful during our trip. We never heard any noises from our neighbors. The staff were all very friendly. This includes the front desk, security, and housekeeping.  Of course, the main reason you would book this place is for its proximity to Disneyland Resort. Depending on the crosswalk light, you can be at the Disneyland or California Adventure turnstiles within about 10 minutes. This is
Manager Response: Staying open during construction can be a challenge and thank you for working with us on it. We are excited about the changes coming our way and look forward to you staying with us again.  Glad you found the rooms and bathrooms clean and our beds comfortable.  Thank you again for a wonderful review.

Summary Heading: I hope there will be kosher meals available
Summary: Although I haven't traveled yet, I'm impressed with what I'm reading, and I am considering staying at your hotel in December 2014 with my children. We would be traveling from Israel. Since by that time your breakfast room will be open, do you think that you will provide kosher breakfast meals?
Manager Response: Thank you very much for inquiring about our property.  We are indeed building a breakfast room but unfortunately it will not be kosher.  However we are more then happy to assist you with local grocery stores.  Thank you again and we look forward to seeing you in December.

Summary: This is the fifth time I've stayed at the Best Western Anaheim Inn.  The rooms are clean, the beds are comfy and the hotel staff are always friendly.  It is very conveniently located across the street from Disneyland and, there are a few restaurants very close by.  This hotel is always my first choice when I visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for making us your first choice when coming to Anaheim and Disneyland.  We are glad to hear you find our rooms clean and comfortable and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you again.

Summary Heading: nice place for rest after disney visit
Summary: some part is under construction and it blocks entrance to parking lot breakfast is far from 'meal' and the front clerk recommends denny's besides, everythings perfect !! rooms are clean, good air conditioner and shower booth close proximity to disneyland we got fully satisfied
Manager Response: Glad you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to you visiting us again once our breakfast room and fitness room are open May 2014.

Summary: Instead of being there during a renovation, It didn't seems to be. The staff was very nice. The location is great!!! I'm addicted to Disney. I've already stayed at many Disney Resorts. But they are expensive and sometimes, they don't accomplish what you want. In this case, Best Western was great: we went by foot to parks, many restaurants around, big rooms, good cleaners, good assistance from the staff, quiet rooms(I stayed on the second floor) and good price. They offer breakfast ( a very lite one during the renovation), parking, heated pool, laundry and many friendly smiles!!!
Manager Response: How could we not smile being across the street from the Happiest Place on Earth?  Thank you very much for staying with us and we look forward to your return.

Summary: This motel's location is closer even than the Disneyland hotels. We traveled last April during Spring Break to see my niece march in the Disneyland parade with her high school band. Even though it was crazy busy everywhere, we were comfortable at this hotel. We were able to park right outside our rooms. Each morning, we left early to get to the park before it opened and then came back in the early afternoon for lunch and pool time. Then back to the park for more fun and the parade. We were thrilled with this motel and will stay here whenever we come to Disneyland and they have room. The area is rife with reasonably priced chain restaurants, though the prices are generally higher than elsewhere. Still, it's just a great value.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your response.  We are so happy to hear you found our location helpful and we look forward to your future stays with us.  Our new breakfast room and fitness room open in May of this year so you'll have to come check us out.  Thank you again.

Summary Heading: no frills, great service, excellent location
Summary: On an extended family trip to Disneyland we booked four rooms and choose the hotel because of its proximity to the theme parks. We weren't disappointed. It was a very easy walk to Disneyland - even for the four year old. There were building works at the front so the lobby was in a converted room and the entrance was though the ca rpark, but this didn't take away from the stay and the staff were excellent. this was really important for us as we were visiting from Australia and didn't know our way around. The rooms were a good size and clean, although a little outdated. If it wasn't for the exceptional location you could say the rooms were expensive for what you got. overall though, a great option if you want to visit Disneyland but not pay resort prices.
Manager Response: Glad to hear you found our location and staff helpful during your family vacation.  We always love having groups and large families stay with us.  Our new breakfast room and fitness room open in May of this year and we look forward to showing you what all the fuss was about.  Thank you.

Summary Heading: No frills, but location makes it totally worth the price
Summary: This hotel is pretty pricey for what you get, until you consider the convenience factor of staying directly across the street from DisneyLand Park... and that factor, for us, was huge. We came to town for the Tinker Bell Half Marathon and with a 5am starting time, we didn't want to have to deal with parking or any sort of bus at 3am. It was also super nice being able to stop back at the room before heading to dinner and being able to drop off purchases. I'd say it takes about 7 minutes to be from your hotel door to the front gates of the park. The bed was nice, it was very clean, it had plentiful towels, PLUS a microwave AND a mini-fridge. We didn't have any problems with the parking. We arrived early on a Friday and then didn't move the car until we left to go home. However,
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us when you came down for the marathon this January.  We look forward to seeing you for future marathons once our new breakfast room and fitness room is open May of this year. Thank you

Summary Heading: Hotel was nice, close to Disneyland
Summary: This was a good hotel because of the ability to walk to /Disneyland which was the reason we came to Anaheim.  The only problem at this time was the remodeling going on.  We would come back but only when the remodel is done.  Othewise I would rate this as a good hotel to stay for the price.
Manager Response: Staying open during construction is a challenge and we thank you for your patience.  We look forward to you returning and enjoying our new breakfast room and fitness room opening in May.  Thank you

Summary: This hotel went above and beyond to make our trip fun and accommodating. I really enjoyed our stay as well did my children. The location was second to none and the staff was more then friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: So happy you and your family had a great time staying with us.  We look forward to having you return and checking out the new breakfast room opening May of this year.  Thank you

Summary: Just across the street to Disneyland. Nice hotel. Reasonable amount of room. One of the few places that actually set-up out third person, triple share roll-away. (So many leave it up to you.) Once again though we did have to request it as it was not in the room. Comfy standard beds. The shower operated with one of those pull out handles. It was a two-hand job. Hate to have been elderly and trying to make it work. Helpful staff though. Cute brown paper snack bag to take with you on your day out.  Be warned though, Best Western is in a couple of places in Anaheim. Make sure you have the right place before you book and make sure your GPS has the right address when you head out. We drove all over the place trying to track this one down.  Nice place. If I went to Disneyland again I
Manager Response: Glad you found our location and the brown bag breakfast helpful.  Disneyland is surrounded by Best Westerns and we are glad you stayed with us.  Please come see us again once our breakfast room is open early summer.  Thank you

Summary: Older, musty hotel... unfortunately because the rooms are off the parking  lot you can't leave your windows open to air it out. But the location was great. They were remodeling the lobby, so we didn't experience breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us, I hope you'll be back to experience our Breakfast in May.

Summary: Right across the street from Disneyland- 5 minutes to the front gate cannot get any easier than this.  We pulled in, 5 minute check in, get your parking pass and you are on your way to having fun.  You get tired at Disneyland- five minute walk back to your hotel.   The hotel was under contruction when we were there but they made it as easy for their guests as possible.  Room was fine- had all the amennites.
Manager Response: As we work through this construction process, I'm happy to hear that guests like you are so understanding.  I do hope you be back to see the finished product!  Thanks for staying with us.

Summary: Staff was extremely helpful both at check in and check out.  Called to confirm our reservation, and had luggage in our room when we returned from the park..   It is located directly across from Disneyland.
Manager Response: I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed your visit, thank you for staying eith us.

Summary Heading: Needs upgrade...but great location for Disneyland
Summary: A great location for Disneyland. This place sits just behind Denny's in which is just a half block from the entrance. Though, they are under construction there rooms looked decent but look like they need a major overhaul. When we turned on the displaced AC unit because of the 80 degree weather, dust came flying out over me and the counter. If you are a person who loves firm beds well this is the place for you. The floors could use a good carpet cleaning. We did expect more for the price we paid, but I assume we are paying for the location. The staff was wonderful and helpful. They did provide us with a baby crib at no cost. The parking is not very pleasant here, not much room unless you have a compact, but it was restricted with a guard to make sure there was a spot for every
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid review.  I'm sorry we didn't live up to your expectations.  As you stated, we are under construction to upgrade the property.  I hope you will consider staying with us again after the project is complete in May.

Summary Heading: Right outside the gate of Disneyland
Summary: Right across the street to Disneyland you can come back to your room for lunch or bring the kids back for a nap. Denny's and IHOP right next door for breakfast before going to the park.  Friendly staff, nice pool, super clean rooms!  We've stayed there several times and will continue to stay there on our trips to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Can't wait for you to come back when our breakfast room is finished in May so you won't have to go to Denn'y or IHOP.  Thanks for your loyality.

Summary: In short, good location, rest is meh. When we visited, the hotel is under construction. It was loud and inconvenient. The room didn't even have slippers. I was happy about the location, but the quality of the hotel is really bad.
Manager Response: I'm sorry that you were inconvienced by our construction.  We have made every effort to keep it at a minimum but know that it's not for everyone.  Thank you for staying with us during this time.

Summary: can't get any better with this hotel's location.  almost directly across from the disneyland entrance.  free parking.  dennys and ihop steps away.  it doesnt get any better if you're going to disneyland.  the rooms themselves are pretty average but if you're just using it to sleep, who cares!
Manager Response: Location is important, glad you liked ours.  I hope you'll be back to see us.

Summary: I just stayed here and they are doing construction, so there is no breakfast, construction noise, weird street access, crowded parking, internet that drops out every 30 seconds, very dated room styling (think That 70s Show) and all for the low low price of $130/day! If you're going to Disneyland and your other option is to sleep on the street, go ahead and stay here, but $130 a night for this, seriously? The best thing about this location is the TV channel lineup.
Manager Response: I am sorry that you didn't enjoy you stay at the Anaheim Inn.  We are under construction at this time to improve the property and the services we offer.  I do hope that  you will reconsider staying with us once the project is complete in April.

Summary: Great hotel - wonderful staff - very helpful - right across the street from Disneyland - perfect for familys with kids and anyone who wants a convenient quick easy way to stay at Disneyland without the cost of the resort hotels - parking is provided and monitored as well - they provide free breakfast and discounts to restaurants right next to the hotel - the rooms are comfortable and the in room internet works well and is free!  You can't beat the value for the price!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words, I'm so glad to hear you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: Been here multiple time due to the close proximity to Disneyland. The stay is always pleasant and the hotel chain listens to suggestions. For example they allow us to stay parked in the lot for several hours more after check out. They also are now constructing a food hall for a continental breakfast. My family and I are happy to have stayed here.
Manager Response: We are happy that you and your family choose to stay with us, thank you for your loyality.

Summary Heading: Price is right, location is right, level of comfort is right.
Summary: You get a lot for what you pay.  The location is great right across the street from the pedestrian entrance.  The amount of time you save walking or parking is like money in the bank.  The hotel is under renovation right now as they are adding a breakfast area.  The bagged breakfasts they give you are ok but don't rely upon them for a real breakfast or for nutrition for that manner.  They had a parking lot attendant so if you are moving your car you don't have to be worried about not finding spots.  Room was spacious (two full beds) shower had good water flow and was clean.  I would stay here again if the price was similar.
Manager Response: You are correct, nothing replaces a good hot breakfast.  Hope to see you when we start serving one in May of 2014.

Summary: I arrived late on November 20th and my driver had a job finding the way in due to a lack of signage because the entrance has been blocked off during it's building works.  However, that was the only minus (albeit a smallish one) that I would give this hotel.  As everyone says, the location is paramount, it was terrific, a very short walk to the park)  My room was well located, just down from the temporary reception office, which I appreciated as a lone female traveller, as to whether this was a thoughtful action or just coincidence, who knows, but, Disney could learn from this (more on that later) the staff I dealt with were all lovely and friendly too. The room was large (by British hotel room standards) clean, comfortable and it was nice having a microwave as well as a coffee
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us, I'm so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay.  Hope to see you in 2014!

Summary: We visit Disneyland multiple times a year and usually stay at 3-4 star hotels further away from the park and take a shuttle or walk because the value seems a bit better.  However this time I decided to book a place closer to the park because we were travelling with an older family member who gets tired easily.  I'm glad we did because it is so nice to have a respite in the middle of your fun-filled day. In a nutshell, the Best Western Plus Anaheim Inn checks most of the boxes, but the rooms are a little tired- especially the bathrooms. However,  the management team spends their budget wisely in all of the areas that count. Comfort and good service.  Pros: -LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION! 5 min walk to Disneyland gates. -Service! The staff was very friendly. -Beds, pillows and TV
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid comments, pros and cons.  While we continue to make improvements, we are aware that it is never ending.  I do hope you will come back to see us when our breakfast and fitness rooms are complete in May of 2014.

Summary: Overall a good place to stay. Nice staff and nice room and very close to DisneyLand. It would have been much better if they had also provided the breakfast. The Denny's nearby is ok, not that good. Anyway a good place to sleep.
Manager Response: I am happy to say that the construction going on now will result in breakfast in 5 months. Starting May 2014 the Anaheim Inn will be serving a hot breakfast.  I hope you'll be back to enjoy it.

Summary Heading: Serviceable Motel Type Accommodation 5 Minutes From Disney
Summary: Location, location, location - that's why you stay here. That, and the free parking!  On the other hand, you normally pay $70 to $80 for this sort of accommodation, not double that. The rooms are decent enough, but being 5 mins from Disney just across the road is clearly the attraction here.  So given that the rooms are clean and functional, it really is worth the money because it's so close to Disney that it might as well be on property. And we all know how overpriced Disney property hotels are!
Manager Response: I'm glad to hear that our location work out so well for you.  Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: A very good stay turned into an average or poor stay because my credit card was billed for $25.00 over my confirmed room rate. My total with tax and resort fee (haha) was suppose to be $161.90, when I logged onto my bank today, they charged me $186.90. Have not phoned the hotel yet, will do later today.
Manager Response: I do hope your credit card charges have been cleared up.  Our system does authorize $20 over anticipated charges and the $5 resort fee.  This will always drop off when the final charge goes through at check out.  If it hasn't been resolved please contact me as soon as possible.

Summary: We stayed in the room when we went to Disneyland. The hotel room we had on the 1st floor was small. It was clean and the people who worked there were nice. The beds were kind of hard but, for a night or two its worth it. Very close to Disneyland, I would recommend it and would love to stay there again.
Manager Response: We would love to have you stay here again.  Hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: A great motel (but undergoing renovations right now)
Summary: I usually stay in this motel when visiting Disneyland. Its main advantage is that it is directly opposite Disneyland's main gate. This means you can walk in and out and not have to wait for a shuttle to the park.  For its proximity, it is very reasonably priced. The rooms are standard Best Western Plus rooms, which mens they are clean and relatively spacious. You can get adjoining rooms if you're travelling in a group. Parking on site is tight, but I've never experienced a problem getting a spot. The bathrooms are a little dark, but it's something that most motels suffer from.  At the moment the motel is undergoing renovations. This means that the breakfast area is currently shut and the entrance is through the Denny's carpark (right next door). This is current advice as of Nov
Manager Response: You may have gotten us confused with another Best Western, we have never had a breakfast. During construction we are offering the "brown bad breakfast snack" until the completation of the Breakfast Room in April 2014.  I hope you'll be back to enjoy our new hot breakfast then.

Summary: Save your steps and stay at this location.  Perfect, short walk to one of the happiest places on earth, especially if you are with those you love! Close to restaurants, freeway, shopping, bus routes.  Safe, friendly accommodating and always helpful staff, Clean!!!!!! Comfortable beds, can't wait for the breakfast addition early next year.  We only stay here when visiting the mouse more than once a year.
Manager Response: April 2014 is our target date for the completion of the Breakfast & Fitness Room, hope to see you then or soon after.

Summary: We had stayed at the other Best Western that's nearby previously but it was full so we chose this one instead and now I don't want to ever go back!  It's really clean and we were not bothered by the construction at all.  There's currently no breakfast, but you can pick up a continental breakfast in a brown bag between 7-10AM at the front desk if you want it.  SUPER clean, well maintained, and so close to Disneyland.  Nice flat panel TVs and free wifi.  Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: I'm so glad the other Best Western was full so that you could stay with us!  We look forward to you staying with us again.

Summary: We take our grandchildren to Disneyland when they turn 6.  The last 3 trips we have chosen to stay at the Best Western Plus Anaheim.  This hotel is very convenient to the main entrance to the park.  We have been on the third floor each time and have been able to see the fireworks from the balcony.  There was construction going on during our last stay in early October but it in no way posed a problem for us.  We were disappointed at not being able to book a room during Thanksgiving week when we are planning another Disney trip, and will be staying elsewhere.  There is a Denny's and IHOP just steps from the hotel but our experience was to go directly to the park and have breakfast at the Carnation Cafe inside Disneyland.  The price was about the same but the preparation and
Manager Response: I am sorry to hear that you were not able to stay with us this coming week but hope that you'll return for the next birthday trip.  I agree with you, breakfast at Disneyland is the best!

Summary: Short walk to Disneyland where hotel parking is free, wifi, morning snack bag, but $5/day resort fee.  They are building a breakfast room above the existing office, so they will be eventually providing breakfast.  No word if this will impact the resort fee.
Manager Response: The Resort Fee will remain at $5 but you'll now have a hot breakfast as well as a fitness room above the new lobby.  Hope to see you again.

Summary: Hotel was under construction and didnt receive an notice or prior warning. The lobby was put in one of the hotel rooms and parking was limited to maybe 40 or so. Lots of random construction workers roaming and office staff was short with me and no help at all. For the price I paid, I expected a lot better!
Manager Response: I'd like to apologize for not living up to your expectations.  We have made every attempt to contact every guest of the construction being done, as well as having it on all sites.  I'm sorry you were unaware of it.   There is no excuse for the staff being short, I am so sorry.  I hope that you will consider staying with us once the work is complete in April 2014.

Summary: Clean hotel, very well kept. Nice pool. Rooms were very clean and tidy, even everything in the restroom. No rusty faucets or gross surfaces to be found, everything was glimmering white. Literally one minute's walk from the traffic light where you cross into Disneyland. It was worth staying there just for the convenience of the walk and not having to deal with Disney parking and cramming into a shuttle bus with all your belongings and kids.   The ONLY negative was that the air conditioner in our room was slightly lethargic and took several hours to cool the room off. We did not bring this up to them, they more than likely would have done something about it. The staff went above and beyond to take care of guests, even allowing us to remain parked there AFTER checkout while we
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments on your recent stay.  I wish you had mentioned your A/C unit during your stay because we are in the process of replacing our older units.  Thanks again for your comments, we look forward to your next stay.

Summary: The best thing this hotel has going for it is the location (directly across the street from Disneyland.) Beds were small and uncomfortable, bathroom toilet in our room was very noisy and ran for about an hour after each flush.
Manager Response: Please accept my sincere apology for not living up your expectations.  We value your business and hope that you will give us another opportunity in the future.

Summary: I cannot express how much I enjoyed staying at this hotel.  Who knew that the staff would be so friendly and helpful, and that the value would be so great.  Steps from the main gate of Disney (other hotel advertise 'steps from Disney' but are steps from the fence, not the entrance)
Manager Response: I'm so glad you enjoyed your recent stay with us.  I hope that it will be the first of many.

Summary: We stayed here during a trip to Disneyland - the access to the park is fantastic, with no complaints about that! They were doing construction at the time, but had warned us before we got there so we were prepared and the noise from that wasn't too bad. The beds were NOT Queen size as we had been told and, as it is a Disney hotel, there was a lot of noise in the morning with families having their kids running around before heading to the park
Manager Response: I'd like to apologize for any misunderstanding regarding the size of our beds.  As much as we'd like to have queen beds, the Anaheim Inn has only doubles.   As much as you enjoyed the location, it does bring with it excited young children that can be loud, I'm sorry if they disturbed you in the mornings.  I do hope you'll come back to see us when our construction is complete in April 2014.

Summary: Its disney and your needing close and clean accom with a good bed,  this is it..  Its my 2nd time and I was delighted when I opened the door to the room.  Just lovely, simple yet really nice, very homey.  Its not expensive accomodation but you look forward to going back to your room to sleep. Would highly recommend this accomodation to anyone going to disneyland.
Manager Response: I'm so glad you enjoyed your second stay with us.  I look forwad to your third.

Summary: Location is literally across the street from Disneyland, so it's a great location. We had the Suite and it was very spacious. Only downside was the separate bedroom didn't have a door to allow privacy from the main area with kids beds. The hotel is currently being remodeled, so the lobby was in a temporary hotel room. The breakfast was just a bag with granola bar and an apple. It made for a nice mid morning snack at the parks! This should improve as the remodel is complete.
Manager Response: You are correct, once our construction is complete we will be offering a hot breakfast as well as a fitness room.  I hope you'll come back to see it.

Summary: We have been staying here for the last 3 years, sometimes two or three times a year.  The staff here is among the very best.  Ask for Lara, Monse or Susan.  Or anyone for that matter for superb service.  They put the Four Seasons to shame!  The location is very close to Disneyland, literally across the street.  Perfect for taking  an afternoon break from the parks before the fireworks shows!  There are many restaurants close by within walking distance, and a Target with a pharmacy is a short bus ride.  They have wonderfully remodeled accessible rooms with wonderful showers for people with disabilities.  They are adding a fitness room and free continental breakfast room.  This is our go to destination for accommodations when we go to Disneyland.  They really make us feel at home.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  I'm so pleased to hear that we are your choice of accomodations in Anaheim.  Hope to see you again soon.

Summary: This is an older hotel/motel that has been fairly well maintained.  They are in the process of rebuilding the lobby, so construction was going on.  The rooms are average but very clean.  There is no breakfast offered, but a 10% discount at the Denny's right in front.  The best advantage of this BW is it's location to the Disney Parks.  We were able to walk with our 1¬Ω year old granddaughter easily to the parks, so we never moved our car.  The price is a bit high for this kind of place, but given the location, makes it acceptable.
Manager Response: Happy to hear you enjoyed our great location.  We hope you'll come back once our construction is complete and we are serving breakfast.

Summary: I have stayed here before.  It is definitely overpriced for what you get, but unfortunately most hotels directly by Disneyland have this problem.  This stay was unfortunately my worst- issues with the smell in the room, a clogged bathroom drain, and no housekeeping service to clean our room (despite the fact that we left the room by 9am and specifically asked for extra assistance in unclogging the drain).  I was disappointed with the response we got back from the staff (which I politely addressed to them).  I wouldn't swear off this place yet, but it definitely will make me seriously look into other options during my next stay instead of having this place be my "go-to" for Disneyland.
Manager Response: It sounds like you had some real issues while staying with us, I apologize.  I know my General Manager, Sue Edwards, would like to hear more about your stay if you have a minute to call her.  We really value your business and would like to have you stay with us again.

Summary: We stayed here in early October with our 18 month old daughter. As we were only doing Disneyland for two days while in LA we were just looking for something close by. We could not have had a better location! Its literally about 3 hotels down from the main park entry, perfect for going home for nap time after a big morning at Disneyland. The rates were good and the staff ever so accommodating. Can highly recommend Tony Romas Restaurant right next door for there delicious ribs and jacket potatoes! YUM! Not so much Denny's burger place, it was always so busy, but SO average. Our daughter was a little big for the cot they gave us, so that would be the only complaint. She just ended up in our bed.Otherwise would stay again if returning to Disneyland. To the hotel is around 45 mins
Manager Response: We hope to see you and your  daughter on all your future trips to Disneyland.

Summary: We just recently stayed at this hotel, this is our 3rd time staying here and we will definitely be back!  The staff is super friendly and helpful! The rooms are clean, the beds are comfortable!  They are updating the front of the hotel to include breakfast, so this will be a nice feature!  It's across the street from Disneyland so it's super convenient, especially for families with small children who have strollers (then you don't have to fold stroller down to get on a shuttle!!)
Manager Response: I'm delighted to hear that you're stayed with us three times, and all the way from Wisconsin!  I hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: No frills, but best value for the location
Summary: This hotel has been reviewed hundreds of times so let's just get to the main points: The hotel doesn't look like a lot from the outside.  It's one of the closest hotels to the park (~5-10 minute walk to the ticket booths).  It's a motel - as in, all the doors seem to face to the outside -- no hotel hallways.  But despite its no frills and few amenities, it was worth it to us because of the proximity to Disneyland -- we were able to easily walk back to the room mid-day for a nap which was really important to us.  With budget hotels like this, I always worry about cleanliness but this place totally met my expectations.    Don't expect the most beautiful hotel in the world -- but expect a good price hotel with a great location.  Glad we stayed here.
Manager Response: We do take pride in having a clean property across from Disneyland, and by March of next year we will look a little different when our new Lobby and Breakfast Room are completed.

Summary: Simple hotel right across the road from Disneyland! It's a couple minutes walk which you'll take through another hotel at Disneyland to get there, which is nothing to the amount of walking you'll be doing throughout your days at the theme park! The service was great and the room was modern and very comfortable except for the cupboard draws which refused to stay closed. I think the floor was slightly uneven but was a very small convenience as we were hardly in the room. The breakfast buffet was surprisingly good for such a basic inn. Very packed in the mornings so get in early to get a table. Highly recommend for those that don't want to spend an arm and a leg but want to stay close to the theme park.
Manager Response: It sounds like you enjoyed your stay but I don't think it was at the Anaheim Inn.  We are in the process of building our Breakfast Room so you couldn't have had breakfast here.  I do hope you'll choose to stay with us next time you visit Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel next door to Disneyland
Summary: Very nice, simple hotel next to Disneyland. The room was clean and well furnished. The staff was very helpful and polite. Just across the street from Disneyland and a couple nearby off resort restaurants next door. Parking is a bit tight, but that describes all the hotels nearby, so you want to check in early in the day if possible. Overall, I was very happy with the stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Anaheim Inn, I'm glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: Good inexpensive place next to Disneyland.  Very clean and rooms are a great value.....Has a couple of good coffee shops within walking distance of hotel.  Best Western is an excellant value for the money....
Manager Response: Thanks for staying with us.

Summary: I was very happy with how clean and well maintained the rooms and hotel were. The location is great and the value for your money is significant. I really liked the little bagged snacks to take to the park with you and I was amazed that we comfortably fit 3 adults and 1 child in the very comfortable beds (not uncomfortable sofa beds) and the very spacious King and 2 double bed room. I would stay there again and recommend it to anyone, especially families.
Manager Response: It sounds like you stayed in one of our suites, I'm so glad you and your family enjoyed it.  Thanks for staying with us.

Summary: This was our 6th stay (10 days this time) and once again it was a great stay.  There were some issues on the outset, but we always give the hotel a chance to work them out and they did with the exception of one.  I had booked our stay nearly a year in advance and asked for the King bed room. Unfortunately when we arrived they had us in a standard room. This is only an issue for us because my husband is 6'6" and I am 6'0", so naturally we need a wee bit more room than the average guest. The hotel could only give us the King room for 3 days in the middle of our stay which would have meant that we would have had to change rooms 3 times, so we opted to just keep the standard room. We ended up sleeping in separate beds, which of course is not very romantic. The microwave in our room
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyality.  Before your next visit, please give me a call so that I can be sure you get a king, sorry it didn't work out this time.  You'll be happy to hear we are working on improving our WiFi so that will not be an issue either.

Summary: Good location across the street from main gate of Disneyland but that's about it.  Air condition is very loud the only way of turning it off is by unplugging it.  Walls are very thin you can hear everything from next door.  So if you want a good night sleep after being at the park this is not the hotel to stay.  Rooms with two beds have full size beds (small) wish they would have been queens. They do not offer breakfast not even coffee in the lobby.  I will never stay here again.
Manager Response: Knowing that we can't be everything to everybody, I'd like to apologize for not living up to your expectations. I hope you were able to enjoy your time at Disneyland.

Summary: We went to Disneyland for 3 days and we chose this hotel on the advice from a friend. It was a really good location. Just about a 1/3 of a block from the lights heading into the park. Denny's was right beside it and Tony Roma's just on the other side. No current breakfast but we got a snack bag that you could pick up in the lobby. Breakfast amenities is soon coming according to their poster. Rooms were good and clean. Rooms were cleaned and beds made while we were at the park. I believe the pool was heated, at least the kids said so. There was always staff around and in view, night staff guy on the second floor was friendly and always said hello. It felt safe there. I would stay there again.
Manager Response: The kids are correct, the pool is heated.  Glad to hear you enjoyed your stay, hope you'll come back next year for breakfast.

Summary: Great location for Disneyland, with reasonable price. We knew beforehand that the breakfast area is currently out of commission, but it would be nice if there was coffee (and maybe juice?) in the lobby in the morning. You do get a paper bag with a small water, fruit, granola bar and a piece of fruit. All staff were very helpful.   Pool and spa were both warm/hot as appropriate (nice surprise). Plenty of towels at the pool.   Internet was slow (couldn't play Facebook games very well, aw). AC/Heater in room is loud, which is great for tuning out the sound of children (hey, it's right next to Disneyland, expect some noise at any hotel). By the way, the controls for the AC/heater are on the front of the unit (no thermostat in the room).   We carry a few very important meds. The
Manager Response: Thank you for you kind comments.  It's nice to hear you enjoyed your stay with the exception of being too close to a smoking room.  I hope you'll be back to see us.

Summary: Me and 3 friends decided to take a quick trip to Disneyland/California the weekend of Sept 20 2013. We stayed 2 nights.   I originally booked online but had to call the hotel about a price change.  They were amazing.  They quickly fixed my issue and even made it better than before.  They also accommodated our room request for 3rd floor.  We arrived after our long 6.5 hr drive and were checked into our room.  The room was perfect for what we needed (which was a clean quiet place to sleep and shower).  The bed was a little hard and it would have been nice to have queen size beds but they were double.  The following morning they had brown bag breakfast that we could take with us.  They are in the process of building and opening a breakfast area which should be open in the spring of
Manager Response: I'm glad to hear we were able to accommodate your requests, and that you and your friends enjoyed your stay.  Hope to  see you again when our new Breakfast Room is complete in 2014!

Summary: We stayed here for the Disneyland Half Marathon.  It was right across the street from the park, close to places to dine and was the perfect place to stay.  Its more of a family place to stay.  Each room had a microwave and fridge.  There was no included breakfast, but the rooms where the perfect size.  I would stay there again.
Manager Response: I am happy to inform you that we will start serving breakfast in March 2014, in time for Disney's Half Marathon next year.  Hope you'll join us.

Summary: Our 4 night stay was comfortable and convenient to Disneyland. Room was clean, & fridge was very useful. We used the pool & hot tub everyday, and also found the washers & dryers to be very handy & very clean. The only negative was that the air conditioning unit left the room feeling damp. We would stay again.
Manager Response: I am glad to hear you had time to enjoy some of our amenities.  With Disneyland across the street, that's not always the case.  Thanks for staying with us.

Summary: The staff at this hotel is incredible! They have been part of our family for the last 7 years. We stay here exclusively 4-6 times a year when we visit Disneyland. I cannot begin to express how amazing Martha, Monse, Elizabeth and all the girls (and the boys) are. We noticed very early on they remembered our names and even my children's names as we have added one since we started staying there. They have always gone above and beyond to make sure we had everything we needed for an amazing experience. We honestly do consider the staff family as they made us feel that way almost immediately. I cannot stress enough if you are visiting Disneyland and want a clean and friendly hotel this is your place. It is literally across the street. The rooms are nice and well maintained, they are
Manager Response: You are family!  We all look forward to your visits, hope to see you soon.

Summary: My husband and I stayed there for 2 nights whilst we came over to visit Disney. The hotel is in a brilliant location, 5 minutes walk to Disney.  The hotel itself was very clean, comfortable and I would definitely book this for longer next time. ; ) . We particularly enjoyed watching the fireworks from the pool ; )
Manager Response: I have to agree, we do have a great location.  Thanks so much for staying with us!

Summary: This hotel is always excellent, the staff are warm, caring, and professional. I will continue to stay at the Anaheim Inn Plus Best Western. I give the hotel a rating of 5 with 1 as poor and 5 as great.
Manager Response: Thank you for your continued patronage!

Summary: This hotel being across the street from Disney entrance gives easy access and entry into the parks with just a short walk. Once they get the Breakfast Room remodeled, it will be like all the others that serve "breakfast".
Manager Response: Construction starts in two weeks for the Breakfast Room, hope to see you when it's complete.

Summary Heading: Service could be a little better, and NO breakfast
Summary: We stayed her to visit Disneyland. My 21 yr old daughter, my 15 yr old son and 14 yr old nephew. Pluses: Hotel was very close to Disneyland and very convenient and easy to walk. Pool was nice, rooms were ok. Could watch the fireworks from the belcony. Minuses: They have little cards to fill out so you can request the kind of service you want. EG: full room clean, refresh towels and empty garbage, or NO service. So we filled out that we just needed towels refreshed daily and garbages empty as we  were only sleeping with sheets anyways. We put it on the door when we left and several hours later when we came back the door hanger was gone and our room wasnte done. We went back to Disney and when we returned that night, it still wasnt cleaned. This was quickly rectified with a phone
Manager Response: I'd like to apologize for the problems your boys experienced with obtaining an extra key. The policies we have in place for our guest's security don't always make sense and exceptions should be made.  I do hope that you will consider staying with us again when our Breakfast Room is complete in March 2014.

Summary: The best customer service...special needs child. Kind interest and accommodation to make sure our daughter was safe during her stay.  I have stayed here before and came back because of the great location and service...and I'm not disappointed!  They aren't only GREAT, they are consistent!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words.  We  all look forward to your next visit.

Summary: This hotel has one of the best locations for the price if you are visiting Disneyland and you don't want to pay the high prices of the Disneyland Resorts.  The hotels are convenient and I really think it is located closer than the Disneyland Hotel.
Manager Response: I have to agree we do have a great location, thanks for staying with us!

Summary: This hotel was clean, affordable, friendly staff and the best part - 5/6 minute walk and you are at the main gate to Disneyland and California Adventure!!!! The pool was small but still we used it a few times, even when busy. Request the second building (further from Harbour Blvd) because it's quieter and there is more parking :) The only thing that would make this better would be a free breakfast, but they are working on that, apparently opening a breakfast room sometime in 2014. In the meantime they send you on your way with a small bag of goodies - small water bottle, muffin, apple and granola bar :) Would definitely return to this hotel.
Manager Response: A hot breakfast will be served in March 2014, hope to see you then!

Summary: The room was ok. Nothing special. Service was again ok except for check in when the lady was rude and treated me like i was stupid. They also charged my credit card without telling me. It was the correct amount but ive always paid for rooms ive stayed in at the end of the stay and this place charged the morning i was to check in before i even got there. The pool... tint tiny. it worked and cooled us off but was crowded due to the size. Its also a short walk if you are staying to visit Disneyland. Over all experience was ok but I wont staying there again.
Manager Response: I'd like to apologize for any misunderstanding regarding your payment.  We get an approval for the entire stay at check in and charge the card at check out, I am sorry if that was not made clear when you checked in.  I do hope that you will reconsider staying with us again.

Summary: Great location, great value and super employees! Martha, hotel mgr, is very accommodating : )  If you are not at Disneyland for fireworks, you can see them from the hotel. Slight issue with noise from non-insulated air conditioning unit, but overall a positive experience!
Manager Response: Glad to hear you enjoyed your stay, thanks for staying with us.

Summary: My family was very happy with our stay at the Best Western Anaheim. It was clean, quiet (mostly) and within walking distance to Disneyland. It was exactly what we were looking for this trip. We would recommend it and would absolutely stay here again. We did not use the pool or any of the other on-site amenities.
Manager Response: With Disneyland across the street it's very common for our guests to spend more time there, leaving little or no time to enjoy our pool.  Thanks for choosing the Anaheim Inn.

Summary Heading: Clean and good location for Disneyland
Summary: Hotel is located very close (almost in front) to Disneyland entrance. It is only 5 minutes walk to Disneyland gates. Room is clean and staff are friendly. Parking spot is limited. There are many restaurants where you can just walk to. Denny's, Ihop, Tony Romas, McDonald, Mini's and etc.
Manager Response: I am happy to say that in March of 2014 we'll we'll be serving a hot breakfast. There will be no need to visit the restaurants you mentioned, at least  for breakfast.

Summary: We planned a trip to go to Disneyland and choose this one because it is a walk to Disneyland and very convenient. The hotels beside it are much more expensive. There was no fee for parking. There is a Denny's next door so we didn't buy food in Disneyland, which I heard is either very expensive or average in taste.  There were two double beds available for us. It was on the third floor so I suggest you ask for lower floors if you find the stairs too difficult to drag your luggage up to your room. All in all, we were very happy with the room.
